[03] evamettha ^a^V1.0344^ea^ anupadavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni yasmā tathāgato paṭhamaṃyeva ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇena veneyyasattānaṃ āsavakkhayādhigamassa ceva anadhigamassa ca ṭhānāṭṭhānabhūtaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati, lokiyasammādiṭṭhiṭṭhānadassanato niyatamicchādiṭṭhiṭṭhānābhāvadassanato ca. atha nesaṃ kammavipākañāṇena vipākāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati, tihetukapaṭisandhidassanato. sabbatthagāminīpaṭipadāñāṇena ^a^P2.0032^ea^ kammāvaraṇābhāvaṃ passati, anantariyakammābhāvadassanato. evaṃ anāvaraṇānaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇena anukūladhammadesanatthaṃ cariyavisesaṃ passati, dhātuvemattadassanato. atha nesaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena adhimuttiṃ passati, payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi adhimuttivasena dhammadesanatthaṃ. athevaṃ diṭṭhādhimuttīnaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ indriyaparopariyattañāṇena indriyaparopariyattaṃ passati, saddhādīnaṃ tikkhamudubhāvadassanato. evaṃ pariññātindriyaparopariyattā pana te sace dūre honti, paṭhamajjhānādīsu vasībhūtattā iddhivisesena te khippaṃ upagacchati. upagantvā ca nesaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena pubbajātibhāvanaṃ, dibbacakkhuñāṇānubhāvato pattabbena cetopariyañāṇena sampati cittavisesaṃ passanto āsavakkhayañāṇānubhāvena āsavakkhayagāminiyā paṭipadāya vigatasammohattā āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ deseti. tasmā iminā anukkamena imāni dasabalāni vuttānīti veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^taṃ, sāriputta, vācaṃ appahāyā^eb^tiādīsu puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmīti vadanto taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma. puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmīti cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma. puna evarūpaṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmīti pajahanto diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati nāma, tathā akaronto neva pajahati, na paṭinissajjati. ^b^so yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye^eb^ti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito, evaṃ niraye ṭhapitoyevāti veditabbo.

[03] idānissa ^a^M1.0338^ea^ atthasādhakaṃ upamaṃ dassento ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sīlasampanno^eb^tiādīsu lokiyalokuttarā sīlasamādhipaññā veditabbā. lokuttaravaseneva vinivattetumpi vaṭṭati. ayañhi sammāvācākammantājīvehi sīlasampanno, sammāvāyāmasatisamādhīhi samādhisampanno, sammādiṭṭhisaṅkappehi paññāsampanno, so evaṃ sīlādisampanno bhikkhu yathā diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aññaṃ ārādheti arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ, sāriputta, vadāmi imampi ^a^V1.0345^ea^ kāraṇaṃ evarūpameva ^a^P2.0033^ea^. yathā hi maggānantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva phalaṃ nibbattati, evameva imassāpi puggalassa cutianantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva niraye paṭisandhi hotīti dasseti. sakalasmiñhi buddhavacane imāya upamāya gāḷhataraṃ katvā vuttaupamā nāma natthi.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ^b^vesārajjānī^eb^ti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkho vesārajjaṃ, catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato^eb^ti ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhāti evaṃ paṭijānato tava. ^b^anabhisambuddhā^eb^ti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā. ^b^tatra vatā^eb^ti tesu vata anabhisambuddhāti evaṃ dassitadhammesu. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sahetunā sakāraṇena vacanena sunakkhatto viya vippalapanto appamāṇaṃ. ^b^nimittameta^eb^nti ettha puggalopi dhammopi nimittanti adhippeto. taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi, yo maṃ paṭicodessati, taṃ dhammaṃ na passāmi, yaṃ dassetvā ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddhoti maṃ paṭicodessatīti ayamettha attho. ^b^khemappatto^eb^ti khemaṃ patto, sesapadadvayaṃ imasseva vevacanaṃ. sabbañhetaṃ vesārajjañāṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. dasabalassa hi ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddhoti codakaṃ puggalaṃ vā codanākāraṇaṃ anabhisambuddhadhammaṃ vā apassato sabhāvabuddhoyeva vā samāno ahaṃ buddhosmīti vadāmīti paccavekkhantassa balavataraṃ somanassaṃ uppajjati. tena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^vesārajjaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ sandhāya ``khemappatto''tiādimāha. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^antarāyikā dhammā^eb^ti ettha pana antarāyaṃ karontīti ^b^antarāyikā,^eb^ te atthato sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā. sañcicca vītikkantañhi antamaso dukkaṭa-dubbhāsitampi maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti. idha pana methunadhammo ^a^M1.0339^ea^ adhippeto. methunaṃ sevato hi yassa kassaci nissaṃsayameva maggaphalānaṃ antarāyo hoti. ^b^yassa kho pana tesu atthāyā^eb^ti rāgakkhayādīsu yassa atthāya. ^b^dhammo desito^eb^ti asubhabhāvanādidhammo kathito ^a^P2.0034^ea^. ^b^tatra vata ma^eb^nti tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme maṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[06] dasabalañāṇādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``aṭṭha ^a^V1.0346^ea^ kho imā sāriputtā''ti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanatthaṃ. yathā hi byattaṃ parisaṃ ajjhogāhetvā viññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādhanasamatthāya kathāya dhammakathikassa chekabhāvo paññāyati, evaṃ imā aṭṭha parisā patvā vesārajjañāṇassa vesārajjabhāvo sakkā ñātunti vesārajjañāṇassa balaṃ dassento, ^b^aṭṭha kho imā sāriputtā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^khattiyaparisā^eb^ti khattiyānaṃ sannipatitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ, esa nayo sabbattha. mārakāyikānaṃ pana sannipatitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ māraparisā veditabbā, na mārānaṃ. sabbāpi cetā parisā uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena gahitā. manussā hi ``ettha rājā nisinno''ti pakativacanampi vattuṃ na sakkonti, kacchehi sedā muccanti. evaṃ uggā khattiyaparisā. brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesu kusalā honti, gahapatayo nānāvohāresu ceva akkharacintāya ca. samaṇā sakavādaparavādesu kusalā honti. tesaṃ majjhe dhammakathākathanaṃ nāma ativiya bhāro. amanussāpi uggā honti. amanussoti hi vuttamattepi manussānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ saṅkampati, tesaṃ rūpaṃ vā disvā saddaṃ vā sutvā sattā visaññino honti. evaṃ amanussaparisā uggā. tāsupi dhammakathākathanaṃ nāma ativiya bhāro. iti uggaṭṭhānadassanavasena tā gahitāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^ajjhogāhatī^eb^ti anupavisati. ^b^anekasataṃ khattiyaparisa^eb^nti bimbisārasamāgama ñātisamāgama licchavīsamāgamasadisaṃ. aññesupi cakkavāḷesu labbhatiyeva. kiṃ pana bhagavā aññāni cakkavāḷānipi gacchatīti? āma gacchati. kīdiso hutvā? yādisā te, tādisoyeva. tenevāha ``abhijānāmi ^a^M1.0340^ea^ kho panāhaṃ, ānanda, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā, tattha yādisako tesaṃ ^a^P2.0035^ea^ vaṇṇo hoti, tādisako mayhaṃ vaṇṇo hoti. yādisako tesaṃ saro hoti, tādisako mayhaṃ saro hoti. dhammiyā kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi. bhāsamānañca maṃ na jānanti `ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā'ti. dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi ^a^V1.0347^ea^. antarahitañca maṃ na jānanti `ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā'''ti (dī0 ni0 2.172).

[01] khattiyā keyūraṅgadamālāgandhādivibhūsitā nānāvirāgavasanā āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā moḷidharā honti. kiṃ bhagavāpi evaṃ attānaṃ maṇḍeti? te ca odātāpi honti kāḷāpi maṃgulacchavīpi. kiṃ satthāpi evarūpo hotīti? satthā attano pabbajitavaseneva gacchati, tesaṃ pana tādiso hutvā upaṭṭhāti, gantvā rājāsane nisinnaṃ attānaṃ dasseti, tesaṃ ``ajja amhākaṃ rājā ativiya virocatī''ti hoti. te ca bhinnassarāpi honti gaggassarāpi kākassarāpi. satthā brahmassareneva dhammaṃ katheti. tādisako mayhaṃ saro hotīti idaṃ pana bhāsantaraṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ. manussānaṃ pana taṃ sutvā ``ajja rājā madhurena sarena kathetī''ti hoti. kathetvā pakkante ca bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā ``ko nu kho aya''nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati.

[03] idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ko nu kho ayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurena sarena kathento antarahito, kiṃ devo, udāhu manussoti? kimatthaṃ panevaṃ ajānantānaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti? vāsanatthāya. evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hotiyevāti anāgataṃ paṭicca desetīti.

[03] ^b^sannisinnapubba^eb^nti saṅgamma nisinnapubbaṃ. ^b^sallapitapubba^eb^nti ālāpasallāpo katapubbo. ^b^sākacchā^eb^ti dhammasākacchāpi samāpajjitapubbā. ^b^anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisa^eb^ntiādīnampi soṇadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena ceva aññacakkavāḷavasena ca sambhavo veditabbo.
[06] aṭṭhaparisavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ^b^catasso^eb^ ^a^M1.0341^ea^ ^b^kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^yonī^eb^ti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ. ``catasso nāgayoniyo catasso supaṇṇayoniyo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.342, 392) ettha ^a^V1.0348^ea^ hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma. ``yoni hesā ^a^P2.0036^ea^ bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā''ti (ma0 ni0 2.227) ettha kāraṇaṃ. ``na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava''nti (ma0 ni0 2.457; dha0 pa0 396) ettha passāvamaggo. idha pana khandhakoṭṭhāso yonīti adhippeto. tattha aṇḍe jātā ^b^aṇḍajā^eb^. jalābumhi jātā ^b^jalābujā^eb^. saṃsede jātā ^b^saṃsedajā^eb^. vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppatitvā viya nibbattā abhinibbattāti ^b^opapātikā. abhinibbhijja jāyantī^eb^ti bhinditvā nikkhamanavasena jāyanti. ^b^pūtikuṇape vā^eb^tiādīhi aniṭṭhaṭṭhānāneva dassitāni. iṭṭhesupi sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīsu sattā jāyanti eva. ^b^devā^eb^tiādīsu cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā opapātikāva honti. bhūmadevā pana catuyonikā. ^b^ekacce ca manussā^eb^ti manussesu keci devā viya opapātikā ca honti. yebhuyyena panete jalābujāva, aṇḍajāpi ettha kontaputtā dvebhātiyattherā viya, saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhe nibbattapokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatidevīādayo viya, evaṃ vinipātikesu nijjhāmataṇhikapetā nerayikā viya opapātikāyeva, avasesā catuyonikāpi honti. yathā te evaṃ yakkhāpi sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayopi sabbe catuyonikāyeva.
[06] catuyonivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo^eb^ti ettha sukatadukkaṭakammavasena gantabbāti gatiyo. apica gatigati nibbattigati ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma. tattha ``taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī''ti (a0 ni0 4.184) ca, ``yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā''ti (dha0 pa0 420) ca ayaṃ ^b^gatigati^eb^ nāma. ``imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi gatiṃ vā agatiṃ vā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.508) ayaṃ ^b^nibbattigati^eb^ nāma. ``evampi kho te ahaṃ brahme ^a^M1.0342^ea^ gatiṃ ca pajānāmi jutiñca pajānāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.503) ayaṃ ^b^ajjhāsayagati^eb^ nāma. ``vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī''ti (pari0 339) ayaṃ ^b^vibhavagati^eb^ nāma. ``dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ^a^V1.0349^ea^ anaññā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.258; 2.34) ayaṃ ^b^nipphattigati^eb^ nāma. tāsu idha gatigati adhippetā.

[03] ^b^nirayo^eb^tiādīsu ^a^P2.0037^ea^ niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena ^b^nirayo^eb^. tiriyaṃ añchitāti ^b^tiracchānā^eb^. tesaṃ yoni ^b^tiracchānayoni^eb^. peccabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ visayoti ^b^pettivisayo^eb^. manaso ussannattā ^b^manussā^eb^. pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano attano ānubhāvehi ca dibbantīti ^b^devā. nirayañcāhaṃ, sāriputtā^eb^tiādīsu nirayoti saddhiṃ okāsena khandhā. ^b^tiracchānayoniṃ cā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^maggaṃ paṭipada^eb^nti ubhayenāpi vuttagatisaṃvattanika kammameva dasseti. ^b^yathā ca paṭipanno^eb^ti yena maggena yāya paṭipadāya paṭipannoti ubhayampi ekato katvā niddisati. ^b^apāya^eb^ntiādīsu vaḍḍhisaṅkhātā sukhasaṅkhātā vā ayā apetattā ^b^apāyo^eb^. dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti ^b^duggati^eb^. dukkaṭakārino ettha vinipatantīti ^b^vinipāto. nibbānañcāha^eb^nti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ gatigatimeva, gatinissaraṇaṃ nibbānampi jānāmīti dassanatthamāha. idha ^b^maggo paṭipadā^eb^ti ubhayenāpi ariyamaggova vutto.
[06] pañcagativaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 154^b^.^eb^ idāni yathāvuttesu sattasu ṭhānesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu attano ñāṇappavattākāraṃ dassento ^b^idhāhaṃ, sāriputtā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ekantadukkhā^eb^ti niccadukkhā nirantaradukkhā. ^b^tibbā^eb^ti bahalā. ^b^kaṭukā^eb^ti kharā. ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādīni opammadassanatthaṃ vuttāni. tattha ^b^kāsū^eb^ti āvāṭopi vuccati rāsipi.
[21] ``kinnu santaramānova, kāsuṃ khaṇasi sārathi.
[22] puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ kāsuyā karissasī''ti.. (jā0 2.22.3) --
[25] ettha ^a^V1.0350^ea^ hi āvāṭo kāsu nāma.
[22] ``aṅgārakāsuṃ ^a^M1.0343^ea^ apare phunanti, narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā''ti.. (jā0 2.22.462) --

[25] ettha rāsi. idha pana āvāṭo adhippeto. tenevāha ``sādhikaporisā''ti. tattha sādhikaṃ porisaṃ pamāṇaṃ assāti ^b^sādhikaporisā,^eb^ atirekapañcaratanāti attho. ^b^vītaccikānaṃ vītadhūmāna^eb^nti etaṃ pariḷāhassa balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, acciyā vā sati dhūme vā sati, vāto samuṭṭhāti, tena pariḷāho na balavā hoti. ^b^ghammapareto^eb^ti ghammānugato ^a^P2.0038^ea^. ^b^tasito^eb^ti jātataṇho. ^b^pipāsito^eb^ti udakaṃ pātukāmo. ^b^ekāyanena maggenā^eb^ti ekapatheneva maggena, anukkamaniyena ubhosu passesu nirantarakaṇṭakarukkhagahanena. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patthanā nāma natthi, aṅgārakāsuṃ ārabbha pana iriyāpathassa ṭhapitattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- aṅgārakāsu viya hi nirayo daṭṭhabbo. aṅgārakāsumaggo viya nirayūpagaṃ kammaṃ. maggāruḷho viya kammasamaṅgī puggalo. cakkhumā puriso viya dibbacakkhuko bhagavā. yathā so puriso maggāruḷhaṃ disvā vijānāti ``ayaṃ iminā maggena gantvā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patissatī''ti, evamevaṃ bhagavā pāṇātipātādīsu yaṃkiñci kammaṃ āyūhantaṃ evaṃ jānāti ``ayaṃ imaṃ kammaṃ katvā niraye nibbattissattī''ti. yathā so puriso aparabhāge taṃ aṅgārakāsuyā patitaṃ passati, evameva bhagavā aparabhāge ``so puriso taṃ kammaṃ katvā kuhiṃ nibbatto''ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā olokento niraye nibbattaṃ passati pañcavidhabandhanādimahādukkhaṃ anubhavantaṃ. tattha kiñcāpi tassa kammāyūhanakāle añño vaṇṇo, niraye nibbattassa añño. athāpi ``so satto taṃ kammaṃ katvā kattha nibbatto''ti olokentassa anekasahassānaṃ sattānaṃ majjhe ṭhitopi ``ayaṃ so''ti soyeva satto āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ``dibbacakkhubalaṃ nāma eta''nti vadanti.

[03] dutiyaupamāyaṃ yasmā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ viya gūthakūpe pariḷāho natthi, tasmā ``ekantadukkhā''ti avatvā ``dukkhā''tiādimāha. etthāpi purimanayeneva opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ ^a^V1.0351^ea^. imampi hi puggalaṃ bhagavā hatthiyoniādīsu ^a^M1.0344^ea^ yattha katthaci nibbattaṃ vadhabandhanāakaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanādīhi mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamānaṃ passatiyeva.

[03] tatiyaupamāyaṃ ^b^tanupattapalāso^eb^ti na abbhapaṭalaṃ viya tanupaṇṇo, viraḷapaṇṇattaṃ panassa sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^kabaracchāyo^eb^ti viraḷacchāyo. ^b^dukkhabahulā^eb^ti pettivisayasmiñhi ^a^P2.0039^ea^ dukkhameva bahulaṃ, sukhaṃ parittaṃ kadāci anubhavitabbaṃ hoti, tasmā evamāha. etthāpi purimanayeneva opammasaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] catutthaupamāyaṃ ^b^bahalapattapalāso^eb^ti nirantarapaṇṇo pattasañchanno. ^b^santacchāyo^eb^ti pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya ghanacchāyo. ^b^sukhabahulā vedanā^eb^ti manussaloke khattiyakulādīsu sukhabahulā vedanā vedayitabbā hoti, tā vedayamānaṃ nipannaṃ vā nisinnaṃ vā passāmīti dasseti. idhāpi opammasaṃsandanaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] pañcamaupamāyaṃ ^b^pāsādo^eb^ti dīghapāsādo. ^b^ullittāvalitta^eb^nti anto ceva ullittaṃ bahi ca avalittaṃ. ^b^phusitaggaḷa^eb^nti dvārabāhāhi saddhiṃ supihitakavāṭaṃ. ^b^gonakatthato^eb^ti caturaṅgulādhikalomena kāḷakojavena atthato. ^b^paṭikatthato^eb^ti uṇṇāmayena setāttharaṇena atthato. ^b^paṭalikatthato^eb^ti ghanapupphakena uṇṇāmayāttharaṇena atthato. ^b^kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo^eb^ti kadalimigacammamayena uttamapaccattharaṇena atthato. taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbetvā karonti. ^b^sauttaracchado^eb^ti saha uttaracchadena, uttaribaddhena rattavitānena saddhinti attho. ^b^ubhatolohitakūpadhāno^eb^ti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno. idhāpi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ayaṃ panettha aparabhāgayojanā, yathā so puriso maggāruḷhameva jānāti ``ayaṃ etena maggena gantvā pāsādaṃ āruyha kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā pallaṅke nisīdissati vā nipajjissati vā''ti, evamevaṃ bhagavā dānādīsu puññakiriyavatthūsu yaṃkiñci kusalakammaṃ āyūhantaṃyeva puggalaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ imaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattissatī''ti jānāti. yathā so puriso aparabhāge ^a^M1.0345^ea^ ^a^V1.0352^ea^ taṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā pallaṅke nisinnaṃ vā nipannaṃ vā ekantasukhaṃ nirantarasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ passati, evamevaṃ bhagavā aparabhāge ``so taṃ kalyāṇaṃ katvā kuhiṃ nibbatto''ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā olokento devaloke ^a^P2.0040^ea^ nibbattaṃ passati, nandanavanādīsu accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamānaṃ.
[06] ñāṇappavattākāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] āsavakkhayavāre ``dibbena cakkhunā''ti avatvā ``tamenaṃ passāmī''ti vuttaṃ. taṃ kasmāti ce? niyamābhāvā. imañhi puggalaṃ dibbacakkhunāpi passissati, cetopariyañāṇenāpi jānissati, sabbaññutaññāṇenapi jānissatiyeva. ^b^ekantasukhā vedanā^eb^ti idaṃ kiñcāpi devalokasukhena saddhiṃ byañjanato ekaṃ, atthato pana nānā hoti. devalokasukhañhi rāgapariḷāhādīnaṃ atthitāya na ekanteneva sukhaṃ. nibbānasukhaṃ pana sabbapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamāya sabbākārena ekantasukhaṃ. upamāyampi ``yathā pāsāde ekantasukhā''ti vuttaṃ. taṃ maggapariḷāhassa avūpasantatāya chātajjhattatāya pipāsābhibhūtatāya ca na ekantameva sukhaṃ. vanasaṇḍe pana pokkharaṇiyaṃ oruyha rajojallassa pavāhitattā maggadarathassa vūpasantatāya bhisamūlakhādanena ceva madhurodakapānena ca khuppipāsānaṃ vinītatāya udakasāṭakaṃ parivattetvā maṭṭhadukūlaṃ nivāsetvā taṇḍulatthavikaṃ ussīsake katvā udakasāṭakaṃ pīḷetvā hadaye ṭhapetvā mandamandena ca vātena bījayamānassa nipannattā sabbākārena ekantasukhaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- pokkharaṇī viya hi ariyamaggo daṭṭhabbo. pokkharaṇimaggo viya pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. maggāruḷho viya paṭipadāsamaṅgīpuggalo. cakkhumā puriso viya dibbacakkhu bhagavā. vanasaṇḍo viya nibbānaṃ. yathā so puriso maggāruḷhaṃ disvāva jānāti ``ayaṃ iminā maggena gantvā pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe rukkhamūle nisīdissati vā nipajjissati vā''ti, evamevaṃ bhagavā paṭipadaṃ pūrentameva nāmarūpaṃ ^a^V1.0353^ea^ paricchindantameva paccayapariggahaṃ karontameva lakkhaṇārammaṇāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karontameva jānāti ``ayaṃ imaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā sabbāasave khepetvā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttinti evaṃ vuttaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ upasampajja ^a^M1.0346^ea^ viharissatī''ti. yathā ^a^P2.0041^ea^ so puriso aparabhāge tāyaṃ pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā nisinnaṃ vā nipannaṃ vā ekantasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ passati, evameva bhagavā aparabhāge taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikatvā nirodhasayanavaragataṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā ekantasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamānaṃ passati.
[06] āsavakkhayavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgata''nti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? pāṭiyekkaṃ anusandhivasena āraddhaṃ. ayaṃ kira sunakkhatto dukkarakārikāya suddhi hotīti evaṃ laddhiko. athassa bhagavā mayā ekasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ dukkaraṃ kataṃ, dukkarakārako nāma mayā sadiso natthi. dukkarakārena suddhiyā sati ahameva suddho bhaveyyanti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. apica ayaṃ sunakkhatto dukkarakārikāya pasanno, so cassa pasannabhāvo, ``addasā kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ catukkuṇḍikaṃ chamānikiṇṇaṃ bhakkhasaṃ mukhena khādantaṃ mukhena bhuñjantaṃ. disvānassa etadahosi `sādhu rūpo vata, bho, ayaṃ samaṇo catukkuṇḍiko chamānikiṇṇaṃ bhakkhasaṃ mukheneva khādati, mukheneva bhuñjatī'''ti evamādinā ^b^pāthikasutte^eb^ (dī0 ni0 3.7) āgatanayena veditabbo.

[03] atha bhagavā ayaṃ dukkarakārikāya pasanno, mayā ca etasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ dukkaraṃ kataṃ, dukkarakāre pasīdantenāpi anena mayi pasīditabbaṃ siyā, sopissa pasādo mayi natthīti dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tatra ^a^V1.0354^ea^ ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti dānampi veyyāvaccampi sikkhāpadampi brahmavihārāpi dhammadesanāpi methunaviratipi sadārasantosopi uposathopi ariyamaggopi sakalasāsanampi ajjhāsayopi vīriyampi vuccati.
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^M1.0347^ea^ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[27] kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[26] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22] idañca te nāga mahāvimānaṃ..
[21] ahañca ^a^P2.0042^ea^ bhariyā ca manussaloke,
[27] saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā.
[26] opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi,
[22] santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca..
[21] taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[27] tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko.
[26] iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22] idañca me dhīra mahāvimāna''nti.. (jā0 2.22.1592, 1593, 1595) --
[25] imasmiñhi puṇṇakajātake dānaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
[21] ``kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo.
[22] kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati..
[21] tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo.
[22] tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī''ti.. (pe0 va0 275) --

[25] imasmiṃ ^a^V1.0355^ea^ aṅkurapetavatthusmiṃ veyyāvaccaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ. ``evaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī''ti (cūḷava0 311) imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ. ``taṃ kho pana me pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya, yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā''ti (dī0 ni0 2.329) imasmiṃ ^b^mahāgovindasutte^eb^ brahmavihārā brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ. ``ekasmiṃ brahmacariyasmiṃ, sahassaṃ maccuhāyina''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.184) ettha dhammadesanā brahmacariyanti vuttā. ``pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.83) sallekhasutte methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuttā.
[21] ``mayañca ^a^M1.0348^ea^ bhariyā nātikkamāma,
[27] amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti.
[26] aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma,
[22] tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare''ti.. (jā0 1.10.97) --
[25] ^b^mahādhammapālajātake^eb^ sadārasantoso brahmacariyanti vutto.
[21] ``hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati.
[22] majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī''ti.. (jā0 1.8.75) --

[25] evaṃ ^a^P2.0043^ea^ nimijātake attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho brahmacariyanti vutto. ``idaṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya...pe0... ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.329) ^b^mahāgovindasutta^eb^smiññeva ariyamaggo brahmacariyanti vutto. ``tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita''nti (dī0 ni0 3.174) pāsādikasutte sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanaṃ brahmacariyanti vuttaṃ.
[21] ``api ^a^V1.0356^ea^ ataramānānaṃ, phalāsāva samijjhati.
[22] vipakkabrahmacariyosmi, evaṃ jānāhi gāmaṇī''ti.. (jā0 1.1.8) --

[25] ettha ajjhāsayo brahmacariyanti vutto. idha pana vīriyaṃ ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti adhippetaṃ. vīriyabrahmacariyassa hi idameva suttaṃ. tadetaṃ ekasmiṃ attabhāve catubbidhassa dukkarassa katattā caturaṅgasamannāgatanti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tapassī sudaṃ homī^eb^ti ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, tapanissitako homīti attho. ^b^paramatapassī^eb^ti paramo tapassī, tapanissitakānaṃ uttamo. ^b^lūkho sudaṃ homī^eb^ti lūkho homi. ^b^jegucchī^eb^ti pāpajegucchiko. ^b^pavivitto sudaṃ homī^eb^ti pavivitto ahaṃ homi. ^b^tatrāssu me idaṃ, sāriputtā^eb^ti tatra caturaṅge brahmacariye idaṃ mama tapassitāya hoti, tapanissitakabhāve mayhaṃ idaṃ acelakāditapassitakattaṃ hotīti dasseti.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0349^ea^ ^b^acelako^eb^ti niccelo naggo. ^b^muttācāro^eb^ti visaṭṭhācāro, uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito, ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karomi, passāvaṃ karomi, khādāmi bhuñjāmi ca. ^b^hatthāpalekhano^eb^ti hatthe piṇḍamhi ṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalikhāmi, uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalikhāmīti dasseti. te kira daṇḍakaṃ sattoti paññapenti, tasmā tesaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento evamakāsi. bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ ehi bhaddanteti vutto na etīti^b^ na ehibhaddantiko^eb^. tena hi tiṭṭha bhaddanteti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti ^b^na tiṭṭhabhaddantiko^eb^. tadubhayampi ^a^P2.0044^ea^ titthiyā evaṃ etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatīti na karonti. ahampi evaṃ akāsinti dasseti. ^b^abhihaṭa^eb^nti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ. ^b^uddissakata^eb^nti idaṃ tumhe uddissa katanti evaṃ ārocitabhikkhaṃ. ^b^na nimantana^eb^nti asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthāti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyāmi na gaṇhāmi.

[03] ^b^na kumbhimukhā^eb^ti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāmi. ^b^na kaḷopimukhā^eb^ti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā. tatopi na gaṇhāmi. kasmā? kumbhikaḷopiyo ^a^V1.0357^ea^ maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantīti. ^b^na eḷakamantara^eb^nti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāmi. kasmā? ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatīti. daṇḍamusalesupi eseva nayo. ^b^na dvinna^eb^nti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāmi. kasmā? kabaḷantarāyo hotīti. ^b^na gabbhiniyā^eb^tiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati, pāyantiyā dārakassa khīrantarāyo hoti, purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāmi. ^b^na saṃkittīsū^eb^ti saṃkittetvā katabhattesu. dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti. ukkaṭṭhācelako tatopi na paṭiggaṇhāti.

[03] ^b^na yattha sā^eb^ti yattha sunakho piṇḍaṃ labhissāmīti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāmi. kasmā? etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti. ^b^saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī^eb^ti samūhasamūhacārinī, sace hi acelakaṃ disvā imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmāti mānusakā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti. tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti. tato ^a^M1.0350^ea^ āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāmi. kasmā? maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jātoti, ahampi tathā akāsiṃ. ^b^na thusodaka^eb^nti sabbasassasambhārehi kataṃ loṇasovīrakaṃ. ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ, ayaṃ pana sabbesupi sāvajjasaññī.

[03] ^b^ekāgāriko^eb^ti yo ekasmiññeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati. ^b^ekālopiko^eb^ti yo ekeneva ālopena yāpeti. ^b^dvāgārikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^ekissāpi dattiyā^eb^ti ekāya ^a^P2.0045^ea^ dattiyā. ^b^datti^eb^ nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā ṭhapenti. ^b^ekāhika^eb^nti ekadivasantarikaṃ. ^b^addhamāsika^eb^nti addhamāsantarikaṃ. ^b^pariyāyabhattabhojana^eb^nti vārabhattabhojanaṃ. ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena aḍḍhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena ābhataṃ bhattabhojanaṃ.

[03] ^b^sākabhakkho^eb^ti allasākabhakkho. ^b^sāmākabhakkho^eb^ti sāmākataṇḍulabhakkho. ^b^nīvārā^eb^dīsu ^b^nīvārā^eb^ nāma tāva araññe sayaṃjātavīhijāti. ^b^daddula^eb^nti cammakārehi cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ. ^b^haṭaṃ^eb^ vuccati silesopi sevālopi kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi. ^b^kaṇa^eb^nti kuṇḍakaṃ ^a^V1.0358^ea^. ^b^ācāmo^eb^ti bhattaukkhalikāya laggo jhāmaodano, taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gahetvā khādati. ``odanakañjiya''ntipi vadanti. ^b^piññākā^eb^dayo pākaṭā eva. ^b^pavattaphalabhojī^eb^ti patitaphalabhojī.

[03] ^b^sāṇānī^eb^ti sāṇavākacoḷāni. ^b^masāṇānī^eb^ti missakacoḷāni. ^b^chavadussānī^eb^ti matasarīrato chaḍḍitavatthāni. erakatiṇādīni vā ganthetvā katanivāsanāni. ^b^paṃsukūlānī^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍitanantakāni. ^b^tiritānī^eb^ti rukkhattacavatthāni. ^b^ajina^eb^nti ajinamigacammaṃ. ^b^ajinakkhipa^eb^nti tadeva majjhe phālitaṃ. sakhurakantipi vadanti. ^b^kusacīra^eb^nti kusatiṇaṃ ganthetvā katacīraṃ. ^b^vākacīraphalakacīresu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^kesakambala^eb^nti manussakesehi katakambalaṃ. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``yāni kānici, bhikkhave, tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikuṭṭho akkhāyati. kesakambalo, bhikkhave, sīte sīto, uṇhe uṇho, dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphaso''ti (a0 ni0 3.138). ^b^vālakambala^eb^nti assavālādīhi katakambalaṃ. ^b^ulūkapakkhaka^eb^nti ulūkapattāni ganthetvā katanivāsanaṃ. ^b^ubbhaṭṭhako^eb^ti uddhaṃ ṭhitako. ^b^ukkuṭikappadhānamanuyutto^eb^ti ukkuṭikavīriyaṃ anuyutto, gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā ^a^M1.0351^ea^ uppatitvā gacchati. ^b^kaṇṭakāpassayiko^eb^ti ^a^P2.0046^ea^ ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karomīti dasseti. ^b^seyya^eb^nti sayantopi tattheva seyyaṃ kappemi. sāyaṃ tatiyamassāti ^b^sāyatatiyakaṃ^eb^. pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmīti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharāmīti dasseti.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ^b^nekavassagaṇika^eb^nti nekavassagaṇasañjātaṃ. ^b^rajojalla^eb^nti rajamalaṃ, idaṃ attano rajojallakavatasamādānakālaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^jegucchismi^eb^nti pāpajigucchanabhāve. ^b^yāva udakabindumhipī^eb^ti yāva udakathevakepi mama dayā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti, ko pana vādo aññesu sakkharakaṭhaladaṇḍakavālikādīsu. te kira udakabinduṃ ca ete ca sakkharakaṭhalādayo khuddakapāṇāti paññapenti. tenāha ``yāva udakabindumhipi me dayā paccupaṭṭhitā hotī''ti. udakabindumpi na hanāmi na vināsemi, kiṃ kāraṇā. ^b^māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesi^eb^nti. ninnathalatiṇaggarukkhasākhādīsu visamaṭṭhāne gate udakabindusaṅkhāte khuddakapāṇe saṅghātaṃ ^a^V1.0359^ea^ vadhaṃ mā āpādesinti. etamatthaṃ ``satova abhikkamāmī''ti dasseti. acelakesu kira bhūmiṃ akkantakālato pabhuti sīlavā nāma natthi. bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantāpi dussīlāva hutvā gacchanti, upaṭṭhākānaṃ gehe bhuñjantāpi dussīlāva hutvā bhuñjanti. āgacchantāpi dussīlāva hutvā āgacchanti. yadā pana morapiñchena phalakaṃ sammajjitvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdanti, tadā sīlavantā nāma honti.

[03] ^b^vanakammika^eb^nti kandamūlaphalāphalādīnaṃ atthāya vane vicarantaṃ. ^b^vanena vana^eb^nti vanato vanaṃ, esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^saṃpatāmī^eb^ti gacchāmi. ^b^āraññako^eb^ti araññe jātavuddho, idaṃ attano ājīvakakālaṃ sandhāya vadati. bodhisatto kira pāsaṇḍapariggaṇhaṇatthāya taṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbaji, niratthakabhāvaṃ pana ñatvāpi na uppabbajjito, bodhisattā hi yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upenti, tato anivattitadhammā honti, pabbajitvā pana mā maṃ koci addasāti tatova araññaṃ paviṭṭho. tenevāha ``mā maṃ te addasaṃsu ahañca mā te addasa''nti.

[03] ^b^goṭṭhā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0047^ea^ govajā. ^b^paṭṭhitagāvo^eb^ti nikkhantagāvo. ^b^tattha catukkuṇḍiko^eb^ti vananteyeva ṭhito gopālakānaṃ gāvīhi saddhiṃ apagatabhāvaṃ disvā ^a^M1.0352^ea^ dve hatthe dve ca jaṇṇukāni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā evaṃ catukkuṇḍiko upasaṅkamitvāti attho. ^b^tāni sudaṃ āhāremī^eb^ti mahallakavacchakānaṃ gomayāni kasaṭāni nirojāni honti, tasmā tāni vajjetvā yāni taruṇavacchakānaṃ khīrapāneneva vaḍḍhantānaṃ saojāni gomayāni tāni kucchipūraṃ khāditvā puna vanasaṇḍameva pavisati. taṃ sandhāyāha ``tāni sudaṃ āhāremī''ti. ^b^yāvakīvañca me^eb^ti yattakaṃ kālaṃ mama sakaṃ muttakarīsaṃ aparikkhīṇaṃ hoti. yāva me dvāravaḷañjo pavattittha, tāva tadeva āhāremīti attho. kāle pana gacchante gacchante parikkhīṇamaṃsalohito upacchinnadvāravaḷañjo vacchakānaṃ gomayāni āhāremi. ^b^mahāvikaṭabhojanasmi^eb^nti mahante vikaṭabhojane, apakatibhojaneti attho.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrāssudaṃ, sāriputta, bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hotī^eb^ti. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti purimavacanāpekkhanaṃ. ^b^suda^eb^nti padapūraṇamatte nipāto. ^b^sāriputtā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. ayaṃ panettha atthayojanā -- ^b^tatrā^eb^ti yaṃ vuttaṃ aññataraṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ vanasaṇḍanti, tatra yo so bhiṃsanako vanasaṇḍo ^a^V1.0360^ea^ vutto, tassa bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hoti, bhiṃsanakakiriyāya hotīti attho. kiṃ hoti? idaṃ hoti, yo koci avītarāgo...pe0... lomāni haṃsantīti.

[03] atha vā ^b^tatrā^eb^ti sāmiatthe bhummaṃ. su iti nipāto. kiṃ su nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇātiādīsu viya. ^b^ida^eb^nti adhippetamatthaṃ paccakkhaṃ viya katvā dassanavacanaṃ. ^b^suda^eb^nti su idaṃ, sandhivasena ikāralopo veditabbo. cakkhundriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ kiṃ sūdhavittantiādīsu viya. ayaṃ panettha atthayojanā, tassa, sāriputta, bhiṃsanakassa vanasaṇḍassa bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ idaṃsu hotīti. ^b^bhiṃsanakatasmi^eb^nti bhiṃsanakabhāveti attho. ekassa takārassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. ``bhiṃsanakattasmi''ntiyeva vā pāṭho ^a^P2.0048^ea^, bhiṃsanakatāya iti vā vattabbe liṅgavipallāso kato, nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. tasmā evaṃ sambandho veditabbo, bhiṃsanakabhāve idaṃsu hoti, bhiṃsanakabhāvanimittaṃ bhiṃsanakabhāvahetu, bhiṃsanakabhāvapaccayā idaṃsu hoti. yo koci avītarāgo taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati. yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti ^a^M1.0353^ea^ bahutarāni lomāni haṃsanti, uddhaṃ mukhāni sūcisadisāni kaṇṭakasadisāni ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti, appāni na haṃsanti, bahutarānaṃ vā sattānaṃ haṃsanti, appakānaṃ atisūrapurisānaṃ na haṃsantīti.

[03] ^b^antaraṭṭhakā^eb^ti māghamāsassa avasāne catasso, phagguṇamāsassa ādimhi catassoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ antare aṭṭharatti. ^b^abbhokāse^eb^ti mahāsatto himapātasamaye rattiṃ abbhokāse viharati, athassa lomakūpesu āvutamuttā viya himabindūni tiṭṭhanti, sarīraṃ setadukūlapārutaṃ viya hoti. ^b^divā vanasaṇḍe^eb^ti divā himabindūsu sūriyātapasamphassena vigatesu assāsopi bhaveyya, ayaṃ pana sūriye uggacchanteyeva vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati, tatrāpissa sūriyātapena paggharantaṃ himaṃ sarīreyeva patati. ^b^divā abbhokāse viharāmi rattiṃ vanasaṇḍe^eb^ti gimhakāle kiresa divā abbhokāse vihāsi, tenassa kacchehi sedadhārā mucciṃsu, rattiṃ assāso bhaveyya, ayaṃ pana sūriye atthaṃ gacchanteyeva vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati. athassa divā gahitausme vanasaṇḍe aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pakkhitto viya attabhāvo paridayhittha. ^b^anacchariyā^eb^ti anuacchariyā. ^b^paṭibhāsī^eb^ti upaṭṭhāsi.

[03] ^b^sotatto^eb^ti ^a^V1.0361^ea^ divā ātapena rattiṃ vanausmāya sutatto. ^b^sosinno^eb^ti rattiṃ himena divā himodakena suṭṭhu tinto. ^b^bhiṃsanake^eb^ti bhayajanake. ^b^naggo^eb^ti niccelo. nivāsanapārupane hi sati sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā na atibādheyya, tampi me natthīti dasseti. ^b^na caggimāsino^eb^ti aggimpi na upagato. ^b^esanāpasuto^eb^ti suddhiesanatthāya pasuto, payutto. ^b^munī^eb^ti, tadā attānaṃ munīti katvā katheti.

[03] ^b^chavaṭṭhikānī^eb^ti upaḍḍhadaḍḍhāni aṭṭhīni. ^b^upadhāyā^eb^ti yathā sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañca paññāyati, evaṃ santharitvā tattha seyyaṃ kappemīti dasseti. ^b^gāmaṇḍalā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0049^ea^ gopāladārakā. te kira bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā, sumedha, tvaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kasmā nisinno, kathehīti vadanti. bodhisatto adhomukho nisīdati, na katheti. atha naṃ te akathetuṃ na dassāmāti parivāretvā ^b^oṭṭhubhanti^eb^ sarīre kheḷaṃ pātenti. bodhisatto ^a^M1.0354^ea^ evampi na katheti. atha naṃ tvaṃ na kathesīti ^b^omuttenti^eb^ passāvamassa upari vissajjenti. bodhisatto evampi na kathetiyeva. tato naṃ kathehi kathehīti paṃsukena okiranti. bodhisatto evampi na kathetiyeva. athassa na kathesīti daṇḍakasalākā gahetvā kaṇṇasotesu pavesenti. bodhisatto dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā adhivāsento kassaci kiñci na karissāmīti matako viya acchati. tenāha ``na kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, abhijānāmi tesu pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetā''ti. na mayā tesu pāpakaṃ cittampi uppāditanti attho. ^b^upekkhāvihārasmiṃ hotī^eb^ti upekkhāvihāro hoti. vihāro eva hi vihārasminti vutto. teneva ca ``idaṃsu me''ti etthāpi ayaṃsu meti evaṃ attho veditabbo. iminā nayena aññānipi evarūpāni padāni veditabbāni. iminā ito ekanavutikappe pūritaṃ upekkhāvihāraṃ dasseti. yaṃ sandhāyāha --
[21] ``sukhapatto na rajjāmi, dukkhe na homi dummano.
[22] sabbattha tulito homi, esā me upekkhāpāramī''ti..
[06] dukkarakārikādisuddhivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ^b^āhārena^eb^ ^a^V1.0362^ea^ ^b^suddhī^eb^ti kolādinā ekaccena parittakāahārena sakkā sujjhitunti evaṃdiṭṭhino honti. ^b^evamāhaṃsū^eb^ti evaṃ vadanti. ^b^kolehī^eb^ti padarehi. ^b^kolodaka^eb^nti kolāni madditvā katapānakaṃ. ^b^kolavikati^eb^nti kolasāḷavakolapūvakolaguḷādikolavikāraṃ. ^b^etaparamo^eb^ti etaṃ pamāṇaṃ paramaṃ assāti etaparamo. tadā ekanavutikappamatthake pana na beluvapakkatālapakkapamāṇo kolo hoti, yaṃ etarahi kolassa pamāṇaṃ, ettakova hotīti attho.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhimattakasimāna^eb^nti ativiya kisabhāvaṃ. ^b^āsītikapabbāni vā kāḷapabbāni vā^eb^ti yathā āsītikavalliyā vā kāḷavalliyā vā sandhiṭṭhānesu milāyitvā majjhe unnatunnatāni honti, evaṃ mayhaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni hontīti dasseti. ^b^oṭṭhapada^eb^nti ^a^P2.0050^ea^ yathā oṭṭhassa padaṃ majjhe gambhīraṃ hoti, evamevaṃ bodhisattassa milāte maṃsalohite vaccadvārassa antopaviṭṭhattā ānisadaṃ majjhe gambhīraṃ hoti. athassa bhūmiyaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ sarapoṅkhena ^a^M1.0355^ea^ akkantaṃ viya majjhe unnataṃ hoti. ^b^vaṭṭanāvaḷī^eb^ti yathā rajjuyā āvunitvā katā vaṭṭanāvaḷī vaṭṭanānaṃ antarantarā ninnā hoti, vaṭṭanaṭṭhānesu unnatā, evaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭako unnatāvanato hoti, ^b^jarasālāya gopānasiyo^eb^ti jiṇṇasālāya gopānasiyo, tā vaṃsato muccitvā maṇḍale patiṭṭhahanti, maṇḍalato muccitvā bhūmiyanti; evaṃ ekā upari hoti, ekā heṭṭhāti oluggaviluggā bhavanti. bodhisattassa pana na evaṃ phāsuḷiyo, tassa hi lohite chinne maṃse milāte phāsuḷantarehi cammāni heṭṭhā otiṇṇāni, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^okkhāyikā^eb^ti heṭṭhā anupaviṭṭhā. tassa kira lohite chinne maṃse milāte akkhiāvāṭakā matthaluṅgaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu, tenassa evarūpā akkhitārakā ahesuṃ. ^b^āmakacchinno^eb^ti atitaruṇakāle chinno, so hi vātātapena saṃphusati ceva milāyati ca. ^b^yāvassu me, sāriputtā^eb^ti, sāriputta, mayhaṃ udaracchavi yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnā hoti. atha vā yāvassu me, sāriputta, bhāriyabhāriyā ahosi dukkarakārikā, mayhaṃ udaracchavi yāva piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnā ahosīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. ^b^piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃyeva pariggaṇhāmī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0363^ea^ sahaudaracchaviṃ gaṇhāmi. ^b^udaracchaviṃyeva pariggaṇhāmī^eb^ti sahapiṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ gaṇhāmi. ^b^avakujjo papatāmī^eb^ti tassa hi uccārapassāvatthāya nisinnassa passāvo neva nikkhamati, vaccaṃ pana ekaṃ dve kaṭakaṭṭhimattaṃ nikkhamati. balavadukkhaṃ uppādeti. sarīrato sedā muccanti, tattheva avakujjo bhūmiyaṃ patati. tenāha ``avakujjo papatāmī''ti. ^b^tameva kāya^eb^nti taṃ ekanavutikappamatthake kāyaṃ. mahāsaccakasutte pana pacchimabhavikakāyaṃ sandhāya imameva kāyanti āha. ^b^pūtimūlānī^eb^ti maṃse vā lohite vā sati tiṭṭhanti. tassa pana abhāve cammakhaṇḍe lomāni viya hattheyeva lagganti, taṃ sandhāyāha ``pūtimūlāni lomāni kāyasmā patantī''ti.

[03] ^b^alamariyañāṇadassanavisesa^eb^nti ^a^P2.0051^ea^ ariyabhāvaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ lokuttaramaggaṃ. ^b^imissāyeva ariyāya paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya anadhigamā. ^b^yāyaṃ ariyā^eb^ti yā ayaṃ maggapaññā adhigatā. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā etarahi vipassanāpaññāya adhigatattā maggapaññā adhigatā, evaṃ ekanavutikappamatthake ^a^M1.0356^ea^ vipassanāpaññāya anadhigatattā lokuttaramaggapaññaṃ nādhigatosmīti, majjhimabhāṇakattherā panāhu, imissāyevāti vuttapaññāpi yāyaṃ ariyāti vuttapaññāpi maggapaññāyeva. atha ne bhikkhū āhaṃsu ``evaṃ sante maggassa anadhigatattā maggaṃ nādhigatosmīti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, bhante''ti. āvuso, kiñcāpi dīpetuṃ na sakkomi, dvepi pana maggapaññāyevāti, etadeva cettha yuttaṃ. itarathā hi yā ayanti niddeso ananurūpo siyā.
[06] āhārasuddhivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃsārena suddhī^eb^ti bahukaṃ saṃsaritvā sujjhantīti vadanti. ^b^upapattiyā suddhī^eb^ti bahukaṃ upapajjitvā sujjhantīti vadanti. ^b^āvāsena suddhī^eb^ti bahūsu ṭhānesu vasitvā sujjhantīti vadanti. tīsupi ṭhānesu saṃsaraṇakavasena ^b^saṃsāro^eb^. upapajjanakavasena ^b^upapatti^eb^. vasanakavasena ^b^āvāso^eb^ti khandhāyeva vuttā. ^b^yaññenā^eb^ti bahuyāge yajitvā sujjhantīti vadanti. ^b^muddhāvasittenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0364^ea^ tīhi saṅkhehi khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisittena. ^b^aggipāricariyāyā^eb^ti bahuaggiparicaraṇena sujjhantīti vadanti.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^yuvā^eb^ti yobbanena samannāgato. ^b^susukāḷakeso^eb^ti suṭṭhu kāḷakeso. ^b^bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato^eb^ti imināssa yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā, taṃ yobbanaṃ bhaddaṃ laddhakanti dasseti. paṭhamena vayasāti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni, tena samannāgatoti attho, ^b^paññāveyyattiyenā^eb^ti paññāveyyattibhāvena. ^b^jiṇṇo^eb^ti jarājiṇṇo. ^b^vuddho^eb^ti vaḍḍhitvā ṭhitāṅgapaccaṅgo. ^b^mahallako^eb^ti jātimahallako. ^b^addhagato^eb^ti bahuaddhānaṃ gato cirakālātikkanto. ^b^vayo anuppatto^eb^ti vassasatassa tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ pacchimavayaṃ anuppatto. ^b^āsītiko me vayo vattatī^eb^ti imaṃ kira suttaṃ bhagavā parinibbānasaṃvacchare kathesi. tasmā evamāha. ^b^paramāyā^eb^ti uttamāya. ^b^satiyā^eb^tiādīsu padasatampi padasahassampi vadantasseva gahaṇasamatthatā ^a^P2.0052^ea^ ^b^sati^eb^ nāma. tadeva ādhāraṇaupanibandhanasamatthatā ^b^gati^eb^ nāma. evaṃ gahitaṃ dhāritaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ ^a^M1.0357^ea^ samatthavīriyaṃ ^b^dhiti^eb^ nāma. tassa atthañca kāraṇañca dassanasamatthatā ^b^paññāveyyattiyaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^daḷhadhammā dhanuggaho^eb^ti daḷhaṃ dhanuṃ gahetvā ṭhito issāso. ^b^daḷhadhanu^eb^ nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ vuccati, dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati. ^b^sikkhito^eb^ti dasa dvādasa vassāni ācariyakule uggahitasippo. ^b^katahattho^eb^ti koci sippameva uggaṇhāti. katahattho na hoti, ayaṃ pana katahattho ciṇṇavasībhāvo. ^b^katūpāsano^eb^ti rājakulādīsu dassitasippo. ^b^lahukena asanenā^eb^ti anto susiraṃ katvā tūlādīni pūretvā katalākhāparikammena sallahukakaṇḍena. evaṃ katañhi ekausabhagāmī dve usabhāni gacchati, aṭṭhausabhagāmī soḷasausabhāni gacchati. ^b^appakasirenā^eb^ti nidukkhena. ^b^atipāteyyā^eb^ti atikkameyya. ^b^evaṃ adhimattasatimanto^eb^ti yathā so dhanuggaho taṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulachāyaṃ sīghaṃ eva atikkameti, evaṃ padasatampi padasahassampi uggahetuṃ upadhāretuṃ sajjhāyituṃ atthakāraṇāni ca upaparikkhituṃ samatthāti attho. ^b^aññatra asitapītakhāyitasāyitā^eb^ti asitapītādīni hi bhagavatāpi kātabbāni honti, bhikkhūhipi. tasmā tesaṃ karaṇamattakālaṃ ṭhapetvāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^apariyādinnāyevā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0365^ea^ aparikkhīṇāyeva. sace hi eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati, añño vedanānupassanaṃ, añño cittānupassanaṃ, ayyo dhammānupassanaṃ. iminā puṭṭhaṃ ahaṃ pucchissāmīti eko ekaṃ na oloketi. evaṃ santepi tesaṃ vāro paññāyati. evaṃ buddhānaṃ pana vāro na paññāyati, vidatthicaturaṅgulachāyaṃ atikkamato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ, navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ, soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ, pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ katheti. tiṭṭhantu vā tāva ete cattāro. sace hi aññe cattāro sammappadhānesu, aññe iddhipādesu, aññe pañca indriyesu, aññe pañca balesu, aññe satta bojjhaṅgesu, aññe aṭṭha maggaṅgesu pañhaṃ puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā ^a^P2.0053^ea^ katheyya. tiṭṭhantu vā ete aṭṭha. sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhaṃ ^a^M1.0358^ea^ puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā tāvadeva katheyya. kasmā? yāvatā hi lokiyamahājanā ekaṃ padaṃ kathenti. tāva ānandatthero aṭṭha padāni katheti. ānandatthere pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasapadāni katheti. kasmā? bhagavato hi jivhā mudukā dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ vacanaṃ agalitaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko. tenāha ``apariyādinnāyevassa, sāriputta, tathāgatassa dhammadesanā''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammadasenā^eb^ti tantiṭhapanā. ^b^dhammapadabyañjana^eb^nti pāḷiyā padabyañjanaṃ, tassa tassa atthassa byañjanakaṃ akkharaṃ. ^b^pañhapaṭibhāna^eb^nti pañhabyākaraṇaṃ. iminā kiṃ dasseti? tathāgato pubbe daharakāle akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā padaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti, padāni sampiṇḍetvā gāthaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti, catuakkharehi vā aṭṭhākkharehi vā soḷasākkharehi vā padehi yuttāya gāthāya atthaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti. idāni pana mahallakakāle akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā padaṃ vā, padāni sampiṇḍetvā gāthaṃ vā, gāthāya atthaṃ vā vattuṃ na sakkotīti evaṃ natthi. daharakāle ca mahallakakāle ca sabbametaṃ tathāgatassa apariyādinnamevāti imaṃ dasseti. ^b^mañcakena cepi ma^eb^nti idaṃ buddhabaladīpanatthameva parikappetvā āha. dasabalaṃ pana mañcake āropetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo pariharaṇakālo nāma natthi. tathāgatā hi pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse khaṇḍiccādīhi anabhibhūtā suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīrassa vevaṇṇiye ananuppatte devamanussānaṃ piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāgasamālo^eb^ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. paṭhamabodhiyañhi vīsativassabbhantare upavānanāgitameghiyattherā ^a^V1.0366^ea^ viya ayampi bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi. ^b^bījayamāno^eb^ti mandamandena tālavaṇṭavātena bhagavato utusukhaṃ samuṭṭhāpayamāno. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti sakalasuttantaṃ sutvā bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ dukkarakārakaṃ āgamma pasanno etaṃ ``acchariyaṃ bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti ^b^acchariyaṃ^eb^. abhūtapubbaṃ bhūtanti ^b^abbhutaṃ^eb^. ubhayenapi attano vimhayameva ^a^P2.0054^ea^ dīpeti. ^b^ko nāmo ayaṃ bhante^eb^ti idaṃ bhaddako vatāyaṃ dhammapariyāyo, handassa bhagavantaṃ āyācitvā nāmaṃ gaṇhāpemīti adhippāyena āha. athassa bhagavā nāmaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^tasmā tiha tva^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho, yasmā idaṃ suttaṃ sutvā tava lomāni haṭṭhāni, tasmā tiha tvaṃ ^a^M1.0359^ea^, nāgasamāla, imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ ``lomahaṃsana pariyāyo''tveva naṃ dhārehīti.
[06] saṃsārasuddhiādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0367^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahādukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ. tattha vinayapariyāyena tayo janā sambahulāti vuccanti, tato paraṃ saṅgho. suttantapariyāyena tayo tayo eva, tato uddhaṃ sambahulāti vuccanti. idha suttantapariyāyena sambahulāti veditabbā. ^b^piṇḍāya pāvisiṃsū^eb^ti paviṭṭhā, te pana na tāva paviṭṭhā, pavisissāmāti nikkhantattā pana pavisiṃsūti vuttā. yathā gāmaṃ gamissāmīti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ appattopi ``kuhiṃ itthannāmo''ti vutte ``gāmaṃ gato''ti vuccati, evaṃ. ^b^paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo^eb^ti jetavanato avidūre aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo atthi, taṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu. ^b^samaṇo, āvuso^eb^ti, āvuso, tumhākaṃ satthā samaṇo gotamo. ^b^kāmānaṃ pariñña^eb^nti kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapeti. rūpavedanāsupi eseva nayo.

[03] tattha titthiyā sakasamayaṃ jānantā kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeyyuṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ vadamānā, rūpānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeyyuṃ arūpabhavaṃ vadamānā, vedanānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapeyyuṃ asaññabhavaṃ vadamānā. te pana ``idaṃ nāma paṭhamajjhānaṃ ayaṃ rūpabhavo ayaṃ arūpabhavo''tipi na jānanti. te paññapetuṃ asakkontāpi kevalaṃ ``paññapema paññapemā''ti vadanti. tathāgato kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññapeti, rūpavedanānaṃ arahattamaggena ^a^P2.0055^ea^. te evaṃ mahante visese vijjamānepi ^b^idha no, āvuso, ko viveso^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu.

[03] tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ paññāpane. ^b^dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesana^eb^nti yadidaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ, amhākaṃ vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vuccetha, taṃ kinnāmāti vadanti. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo ^a^M1.0360^ea^. iti vemajjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya sāsanena saddhiṃ attano laddhivacanamattena samadhuraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. ^b^neva abhinandiṃsū^eb^ti evametanti na sampaṭicchiṃsu. ^b^nappaṭikkosiṃsū^eb^ti nayidaṃ evanti nappaṭisedhesuṃ. kasmā? te kira titthiyā nāma andhasadisā, jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā katheyyunti ^a^V1.0368^ea^ nābhinandiṃsu, pariññanti vacanena īsakaṃ sāsanagandho atthīti nappaṭikkosiṃsu. janapadavāsino vā te sakasamayaparasamayesu na suṭṭhu kusalātipi ubhayaṃ nākaṃsu.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ^b^na ceva sampāyissantī^eb^ti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti. ^b^uttariñca vighāta^eb^nti asampāyanato uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti. sampādetvā kathetuṃ asakkontānaṃ nāma hi dukkhaṃ uppajjati. ^b^yathā taṃ, bhikkhave, avisayasmi^eb^nti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanaṃ, ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. yasmā avisaye pañho pucchito hotīti attho. ^b^sadevake^eb^ti saha devehi sadevake. ^b^samārakā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. evaṃ tīṇi ṭhānāni loke pakkhipitvā dve pajāyāti pañcahipi sattalokameva pariyādiyitvā etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ devaṃ vā manussaṃ vā na passāmīti dīpeti. ^b^ito vā pana sutvā^eb^ti ito vā pana mama sāsanato sutvā atathāgatopi atathāgatasāvakopi ārādheyya paritoseyya. aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma natthīti dasseti.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ idāni attano tesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittārādhanaṃ dassento ^b^ko ca, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^kāmaguṇā^eb^ti kāmayitabbaṭṭhena ^b^kāmā^eb^. bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^guṇā^eb^. ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ dviguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi''nti (mahāva0 348) ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. ``accenti ^a^P2.0056^ea^ kālā tarayanti rattiyo, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.4) ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. ``sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.379) ettha ānisaṃsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. ``antaṃ antaguṇaṃ (khu0 pā0 3 dvattiṃsākāre; dī0 ni0 2.377) kayirā mālāguṇe bahū''ti (dha0 pa0 53) ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho. idhāpi eseva adhippeto, tena vuttaṃ ``bandhanaṭṭhena guṇā''ti. ^b^cakkhuviññeyyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0361^ea^ cakkhuviññāṇena passitabbā. etenupāyena ^b^sotaviññeyyā^eb^dīsupi attho veditabbo. ^b^iṭṭhā^eb^ti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā, iṭṭhārammaṇabhūtāti attho. ^b^kantā^eb^ti kamanīyā. ^b^manāpā^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanakā. ^b^piyarūpā^eb^ti piyajātikā. ^b^kāmūpasaṃhitā^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā. ^b^rajanīyā^eb^ti rajjaniyā, rāguppattikāraṇabhūtāti attho.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadi muddāyā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^muddā^eb^ti aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā hatthamuddā. ^b^gaṇanā^eb^ti acchiddagaṇanā. ^b^saṅkhāna^eb^nti piṇḍagaṇanā. yāya khettaṃ oloketvā idha ettakā vīhī bhavissanti ^a^V1.0369^ea^, rukkhaṃ oloketvā idha ettakāni phalāni bhavissanti, ākāsaṃ oloketvā ime ākāse sakuṇā ettakā nāma bhavissantīti jānanti.

[01] ^b^kasī^eb^ti kasikammaṃ. ^b^vaṇijjā^eb^ti jaṅghavaṇijjathalavaṇijjādivaṇippatho. ^b^gorakkha^eb^nti attano vā paresaṃ vā gāvo rakkhitvā pañcagorasavikkayena jīvanakammaṃ. ^b^issattho^eb^ vuccati āvudhaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhānakammaṃ. ^b^rājaporisa^eb^nti āvudhena rājakammaṃ katvā upaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^sippaññatara^eb^nti gahitāvasesaṃ hatthiassasippādi. ^b^sītassa purakkhato^eb^ti lakkhaṃ viya sarassa sītassa purato, sītena bādhīyamānoti attho. uṇhepi eseva nayo. ^b^ḍaṃsā^eb^dīsu ^b^ḍaṃsā^eb^ti piṅgalamakkhikā. ^b^makasā^eb^ti sabbamakkhikā, ^b^sarīsapā^eb^ti ye keci saritvā gacchanti. ^b^rissamāno^eb^ti ruppamāno, ghaṭṭiyamāno. ^b^mīyamāno^eb^ti maramāno. ^b^ayaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^ti, bhikkhave, ayaṃ muddādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ āgamma sītādipaccayo ābādho. ^b^kāmānaṃ ādīnavo^eb^ti kāmesu upaddavo, upassaggoti attho. ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^ti paccakkho ^a^P2.0057^ea^ sāmaṃ passitabbo. ^b^dukkhakkhandho^eb^ti dukkharāsi. ^b^kāmahetū^eb^tiādīsu paccayaṭṭhena kāmā assa hetūti kāmahetu. mūlaṭṭhena kāmā nidānamassāti ^b^kāmanidāno^eb^. liṅgavipallāsena pana kāmanidānanti vutto. kāraṇaṭṭhena kāmā adhikaraṇaṃ assāti ^b^kāmādhikaraṇo^eb^. liṅgavipallāseneva pana kāmādhikaraṇanti vutto. ^b^kāmānameva hetū^eb^ti idaṃ niyamavacanaṃ, kāmapaccayā uppajjatiyevāti attho.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhahato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0362^ea^ ājīvasamuṭṭhāpakavīriyena uṭṭhahantassa. ^b^ghaṭato^eb^ti taṃ vīriyaṃ pubbenāparaṃ ghaṭentassa. ^b^vāyamato^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ payogaṃ karontassa. ^b^nābhinipphajjantī^eb^ti na nipphajjanti, hatthaṃ nābhiruhanti. ^b^socatī^eb^ti citte uppannabalavasokena socati. ^b^kilamatī^eb^ti kāye uppannadukkhena kilamati. ^b^paridevatī^eb^ti vācāya paridevati. ^b^urattāḷi^eb^nti uraṃ tāḷetvā. ^b^kandatī^eb^ti rodati. ^b^sammohaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti visaññī viya sammūḷho hoti. ^b^mogha^eb^nti tucchaṃ. ^b^aphalo^eb^ti nipphalo. ^b^ārakkhādhikaraṇa^eb^nti ārakkhakāraṇā. ^b^kintī^eb^ti kena nu kho upāyena. ^b^yampi me^eb^ti yampi mayhaṃ kasikammādīni katvā uppāditaṃ dhanaṃ ahosi. ^b^tampi no natthī^eb^ti tampi amhākaṃ idāni natthi.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ^b^puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, kāmahetū^eb^tiādināpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvāva ādīnavaṃ dīpeti. tattha ^a^V1.0370^ea^ ^b^kāmahetū^eb^ti kāmapaccayā rājānopi rājūhi vivadanti. ^b^kāmanidāna^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, kāme nidānaṃ katvā vivadantīti attho. ^b^kāmādhikaraṇa^eb^ntipi bhāvanapuṃsakameva, kāme adhikaraṇaṃ katvā vivadantīti attho. ^b^kāmānameva hetū^eb^ti gāmanigamanagarasenāpatipurohitaṭṭhānantarādīnaṃ kāmānameva hetu vivadantīti attho. ^b^upakkamantī^eb^ti paharanti. ^b^asicamma^eb^nti asiñceva kheṭakaphalakādīni ca. ^b^dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā^eb^ti dhanuṃ gahetvā sarakalāpaṃ sannayhitvā. ^b^ubhatobyūḷa^eb^nti ubhato rāsibhūtaṃ. ^b^pakkhandantī^eb^ti pavisanti. ^b^usūsū^eb^ti kaṇḍesu. ^b^vijjotalantesū^eb^ti viparivattantesu. ^b^te tatthā^eb^ti te tasmiṃ saṅgāme.

[03] ^b^addāvalepanā^eb^ ^a^P2.0058^ea^ ^b^upakāriyo^eb^ti cettha manussā pākārapādaṃ assakhurasaṇṭhānena iṭṭhakāhi cinitvā upari sudhāya limpanti. evaṃ katā pākārapādā upakāriyoti vuccanti. tā tintena kalalena sittā addāvalepanā nāma honti. ^b^pakkhandantī^eb^ti tāsaṃ heṭṭhā tikhiṇāyasūlādīhi vijjhīyamānāpi pākārassa picchilabhāvena ārohituṃ asakkontāpi upadhāvantiyeva. ^b^ chakaṇakāyā^eb^ti kuthitagomayena. ^b^abhivaggenā^eb^ti satadantena. taṃ aṭṭhadantākārena katvā ``nagaradvāraṃ bhinditvā ^a^M1.0363^ea^ pavisissāmā''ti āgate uparidvāre ṭhitā tassa bandhanayottāni chinditvā tena abhivaggena omaddanti.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ^b^sandhimpi chindantī^eb^ti gharasandhimpi chindanti. ^b^nillopa^eb^nti gāme paharitvā mahāvilopaṃ karonti. ^b^ekāgārika^eb^nti paṇṇāsamattāpi saṭṭhimattāpi parivāretvā jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā āharāpenti. ^b^paripanthepi tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti panthadūhanakammaṃ karonti. ^b^aḍḍhadaṇḍakehī^eb^ti muggarehi pahārasādhanatthaṃ vā catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ dvedhā chetvā gahitadaṇḍakehi. ^b^bilaṅgathālika^eb^nti kañjiyaukkhalikammakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontā sīsakapālaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti, tena matthaluṅgaṃ pakkuthitvā upari uttarati. ^b^saṅkhamuṇḍika^eb^nti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagaḷavāṭaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena vallitvā uppāṭenti, saha kesehi cammaṃ uṭṭhahati. tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.

[01] ^b^rāhumukha^eb^nti rāhumukhakammakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontā saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti ^a^V1.0371^ea^ ^a^P2.0059^ea^. kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khaṇanti. lohitaṃ paggharitvā mukhaṃ pūreti. ^b^jotimālika^eb^nti sakalasarīraṃ telapilotikāya veṭhetvā ālimpanti. ^b^hatthapajjotika^eb^nti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya jālenti. ^b^erakavattika^eb^nti erakavattakammakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontā gīvato paṭṭhāya cammabaddhe kantitvā gopphake ṭhapenti. atha naṃ yottehi bandhitvā kaḍḍhanti. so attano cammabaddhe akkamitvā akkamitvā patati. ^b^cīrakavāsika^eb^nti cīrakavāsikakammakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontā tatheva cammabaddhe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti. kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantitvā gopphakesu ṭhapenti. uparimehi heṭṭhimasarīraṃ cīrakanivāsananivatthaṃ viya hoti. ^b^eṇeyyaka^eb^nti eṇeyyakakammakāraṇaṃ. taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca jāṇūsu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti. so catūhi ayasūlehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahati. atha naṃ parivāretvā aggiṃ karonti. ``eṇeyyako jotipariggaho yathā''ti ^a^M1.0364^ea^ āgataṭṭhānepi idameva vuttaṃ. taṃ kālena kālaṃ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti. evarūpā kāraṇā nāma natthi.

[01] ^b^baḷisamaṃsika^eb^nti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanhārūni uppāṭenti. ^b^kahāpaṇika^eb^nti sakalasarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ kahāpaṇamattaṃ pātentā koṭṭenti. ^b^khārāpatacchika^eb^nti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ ghaṃsanti. cammasaṃsanhārūni paggharitvā savanti. aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāva tiṭṭhati. ^b^palighaparivattika^eb^nti ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇacchidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti. atha naṃ pāde gahetvā āvijjhanti. ^b^palālapīṭhaka^eb^nti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipanti. maṃsarāsiyeva hoti, atha naṃ keseheva pariyonandhitvā gaṇhanti. palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā pana veṭhenti. ^b^sunakhehi^eb^pīti ^a^P2.0060^ea^ katipayāni divasāni āhāraṃ adatvā chātakehi sunakhehi khādāpenti. te muhuttena aṭṭhisaṅkhalikameva karonti. ^b^samparāyiko^eb^ti samparāye dutiyattabhāve vipākoti attho.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ^b^chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. nibbānañhi āgamma kāmesu chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca, tasmā nibbānaṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti ca vuttaṃ. ^b^sāmaṃ vā kāme parijānissantī^eb^ti sayaṃ vā te kāme tīhi pariññāhi parijānissanti. ^b^tathattāyā^eb^ti tathabhāvāya. ^b^yathāpaṭipanno^eb^ti yāya paṭipadāya paṭipanno.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ^b^khattiyakaññā^eb^ ^a^V1.0372^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^tiādi aparittena vipulena kusalena gahitapaṭisandhikaṃ vatthālaṅkārādīni labhanaṭṭhāne nibbattaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^pannarasavassuddesikā^eb^ti pannarasavassavayā. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. vayapadesaṃ kasmā gaṇhāti? vaṇṇasampattidassanatthaṃ. mātugāmassa hi duggatakule nibbattassāpi etasmiṃ kāle thokaṃ thokaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ pasīdati. purisānaṃ pana vīsativassakāle pañcavīsativassakāle pasannaṃ hoti. ^b^nātidīghā^eb^tiādīhi chadosavirahitaṃ sarīrasampattiṃ dīpeti. ^b^vaṇṇanibhā^eb^ti vaṇṇoyeva.

[03] ^b^jiṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0365^ea^ jarājiṇṇaṃ. ^b^gopānasivaṅka^eb^nti gopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ. ^b^bhogga^eb^nti bhaggaṃ, imināpissa vaṅkabhāvameva dīpeti. ^b^daṇḍaparāyaṇa^eb^nti daṇḍapaṭisaraṇaṃ daṇḍadutiyaṃ. ^b^pavedhamāna^eb^nti kampamānaṃ. ^b^ātura^eb^nti jarāturaṃ. ^b^khaṇḍadanta^eb^nti jiṇṇabhāvena khaṇḍitadantaṃ. ^b^palitakesa^eb^nti paṇḍarakesaṃ. ^b^vilūna^eb^nti luñcitvā gahitakesaṃ viya khallāṭaṃ. ^b^khalitasira^eb^nti mahākhallāṭasīsaṃ. ^b^valina^eb^nti sañjātavaliṃ. ^b^tilakāhatagatta^eb^nti setakāḷatilakehi vikiṇṇasarīraṃ. ^b^ābādhika^eb^nti byādhikaṃ. ^b^dukkhita^eb^nti dukkhapattaṃ.
[03] ^b^bāḷhagilāna^eb^nti adhimattagilānaṃ. ^b^sivathikāya chaḍḍita^eb^nti āmakasusāne pātitaṃ. sesamettha satipaṭṭhāne vuttameva. idhāpi nibbānaṃyeva chandarāgavinayo.
[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ^b^neva tasmiṃ samaye attabyābādhāyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye attanopi dukkhatthāya na ceteti. ^b^abyābajjhaṃyevā^eb^ti niddukkhameva ^a^P2.0061^ea^.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ, bhikkhave, vedanā aniccā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, yasmā vedanā aniccā, tasmā ayaṃ aniccādiākārova vedanāya ādīnavoti attho, nissaraṇaṃ vuttappakāramevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahādukkhakkhandhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0373^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sakkesū^eb^ti evaṃnāmake janapade. so hi janapado sakyānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānattā sakyātveva saṅkhyaṃ gato. sakyānaṃ pana uppatti ambaṭṭhasutte āgatāva. ^b^kapilavatthusmi^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. tañhi kapilassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne katattā kapilavatthūti vuttaṃ, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. ^b^nigrodhārāme^eb^ti ^b^nigrodho^eb^ nāma sakko, so ñātisamāgamakāle kapilavatthuṃ āgate bhagavati attano ārāme vihāraṃ kāretvā bhagavato niyyātesi, tasmiṃ viharatīti attho. ^b^mahānāmo^eb^ti anuruddhattherassa bhātā bhagavato cuḷapituputto. suddhodano ^a^M1.0366^ea^ sukkodano sakkodano dhotodano amitodanoti ime pañca janā bhātaro. ^b^amitā^eb^ nāma devī tesaṃ bhaginī. tissatthero tassā putto. tathāgato ca nandatthero ca suddhodanassa puttā, mahānāmo ca anuruddhatthero ca sukkodanassa. ānandatthero amitodanassa, so bhagavato kaniṭṭho. mahānāmo mahallakataro sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako.

[03] ^b^dīgharatta^eb^nti mayhaṃ sakadāgāmiphaluppattito paṭṭhāya cirarattaṃ jānāmīti dasseti. ^b^lobhadhammā^eb^ti lobhasaṅkhātā dhammā, nānappakārakaṃ lobhaṃyeva sandhāya vadati. itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. ^b^pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti khepetvā tiṭṭhanti. idañhi pariyādānaṃ nāma ``sabbaṃ hatthikāyaṃ pariyādiyitvā sabbaṃ assakāyaṃ sabbaṃ rathakāyaṃ sabbaṃ pattikāyaṃ pariyādiyitvā jīvantaṃyeva naṃ osajjeyya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.126) ettha gahaṇe āgataṃ. ``aniccasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ ^a^P2.0062^ea^ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.102) ettha khepane. idhāpi khepane adhippetaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ``pariyādiyitvāti khepetvā''ti.

[03] ^b^yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpī^eb^ti yena mayhaṃ ekekasmiṃ kāle lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti pucchati. ayaṃ kira rājā ``sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā niravasesā pahīyantī''ti saññī ahosi, ayaṃ ``appahīnaṃ me atthī''tipi jānāti, appahīnakaṃ ^a^V1.0374^ea^ upādāya pahīnakampi puna pacchatovāvattatīti saññī hoti. ariyasāvakassa evaṃ sandeho uppajjatīti? āma uppajjati. kasmā? paṇṇattiyā akovidattā. ``ayaṃ kileso asukamaggavajjho''ti imissā paṇṇattiyā akovidassa hi ariyasāvakassapi evaṃ hoti. kiṃ tassa paccavekkhaṇā natthīti? atthi. sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti. eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati. eko avasiṭṭhakilesameva, eko maggameva, eko phalameva, eko nibbānameva. imāsu pana pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭati. iti yassa paccavekkhaṇā na paripuṇṇā, tassa maggavajjhakilesapaṇṇattiyaṃ akovidattā evaṃ hoti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M1.0367^ea^ ^b^eva kho te^eb^ti soyeva lobho doso moho ca tava santāne appahīno, tvaṃ pana pahīnasaññī ahosīti dasseti. ^b^so ca hi te^eb^ti so tuyhaṃ lobhadosamohadhammo. ^b^kāme^eb^ti duvidhe kāme. ^b^na paribhuñjeyyāsī^eb^ti mayaṃ viya pabbajeyyāsīti dasseti.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ^b^appassādā^eb^ti parittasukhā. ^b^bahudukkhā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikadukkhamevettha bahukaṃ. ^b^bahupāyāsā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyiko upāyāsakilesoyevettha bahu. ^b^ādīnavo^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyiko upaddavo. ^b^ettha bhiyyo^eb^ti etesu kāmesu ayaṃ ādīnavoyeva bahu. assādo pana himavantaṃ upanidhāya sāsapo viya appo, parittako. ^b^iti cepi mahānāmā^eb^ti mahānāma evaṃ cepi ariyasāvakassa. ^b^yathābhūta^eb^nti yathāsabhāvaṃ. sammā nayena kāraṇena paññāya suṭṭhu diṭṭhaṃ hotīti dasseti. tattha ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya, heṭṭhāmaggadvayañāṇenāti attho. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P2.0063^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^ti so eva maggadvayena diṭṭhakāmādīnavo ariyasāvako. ^b^pītisukha^eb^nti iminā sappītikāni dve jhānāni dasseti. ^b^aññaṃ vā tato santatara^eb^nti tato jhānadvayato santataraṃ aññaṃ uparijhānadvayañceva maggadvayañca.^b^ neva tāva anāvaṭṭī kāmesu hotī^eb^ti atha kho so dve magge paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitopi ariyasāvako upari jhānānaṃ vā maggānaṃ vā anadhigatattā neva tāva kāmesu anāvaṭṭī hoti, anāvaṭṭino anābhogo na hoti. āvaṭṭino sābhogoyeva hoti. kasmā? catūhi jhānehi vikkhambhanappahānassa, dvīhi maggehi samucchedappahānassa abhāvā.

[03] ^b^mayhampi^eb^ ^a^V1.0375^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti na kevalaṃ tuyheva, atha kho mayhampi. ^b^pubbeva sambodhā^eb^ti maggasambodhito paṭhamatarameva. ^b^paññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ hotī^eb^ti ettha orodhanāṭakā pajahanapaññā adhippetā. ^b^pītisukhaṃ nājjhagama^eb^nti sappītikāni dve jhānāni na paṭilabhiṃ. ^b^aññaṃ vā tato santatara^eb^nti idha upari jhānadvayaṃ ceva cattāro ca maggā adhippetā. ^b^paccaññāsi^eb^nti paṭiaññāsiṃ.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekamidāhaṃ mahānāma samaya^eb^nti kasmā āraddhaṃ? ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi. heṭṭhā kāmānaṃ assādopi ādīnavopi kathito ^a^M1.0368^ea^, nissaraṇaṃ na kathitaṃ, taṃ kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. kāmasukhallikānuyogo hi eko anto attakilamathānuyogo ekoti imehi antehi muttaṃ mama sāsananti upari phalasamāpattisīsena sakalasāsanaṃ dassetumpi ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.

[03] ^b^gijjhakūṭe pabbate^eb^ti tassa pabbatassa gijjhasadisaṃ kūṭaṃ atthi, tasmā ^b^gijjhakūṭo^eb^ti vuccati. gijjhā vā tassa kūṭesu nivasantītipi gijjhakūṭoti vuccati. ^b^isigilipasse^eb^ti isigilipabbatassa passe. ^b^kāḷasilāya^eb^nti kāḷavaṇṇe piṭṭhipāsāṇe. ^b^ubbhaṭṭhakā hontī^eb^ti uddhaṃyeva ṭhitakā honti anisinnā. ^b^opakkamikā^eb^ti ubbhaṭṭhakādinā attano upakkamena nibbattitā. ^b^nigaṇṭho, āvuso^eb^ti aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattuṃ asakkontā nigaṇṭhassa upari pakkhipiṃsu. ^b^sabbaññū sabbadassāvī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0064^ea^ so amhākaṃ satthā atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti passatīti dasseti. ^b^aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātī^eb^ti so amhākaṃ satthā aparisesaṃ dhammaṃ jānanto aparisesasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti, paṭijānanto ca evaṃ paṭijānāti ``carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca...pe0... paccupaṭṭhita''nti. tattha ^b^satata^eb^nti niccaṃ. ^b^samita^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, nigaṇṭhā jānātha ettakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇa^eb^nti idaṃ bhagavā puriso nāma yaṃ karoti, taṃ jānāti. vīsatikahāpaṇe iṇaṃ gahetvā dasa datvā ``dasa me dinnā dasa avasiṭṭhā''ti jānāti, tepi datvā ``sabbaṃ dinna''nti jānāti. khettassa tatiyabhāgaṃ lāyitvā ``eko bhāgo lāyito, dve avasiṭṭhā''ti jānāti. puna ekaṃ lāyitvā ^a^V1.0376^ea^ ``dve lāyitā, eko avasiṭṭho''ti jānāti. tasmimpi lāyite ``sabbaṃ niṭṭhita''nti jānāti, evaṃ sabbakiccesu katañca akatañca jānāti, tumhehipi tathā ñātabbaṃ siyāti dasseti. ^b^akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahāna^eb^nti iminā akusalaṃ pahāya kusalaṃ bhāvetvā suddhantaṃ patto nigaṇṭho nāma tumhākaṃ sāsane atthīti pucchati.

[03] ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti tumhākaṃ evaṃ ajānanabhāve sati. ^b^luddā^eb^ti luddācārā. ^b^lohitapāṇino^eb^ti pāṇe jīvitā voropentā lohitena makkhitapāṇino. pāṇaṃ hi hanantassapi yassa lohitena pāṇi na makkhiyati ^a^M1.0369^ea^, sopi lohitapāṇītveva vuccati. ^b^kurūrakammantā^eb^ti dāruṇakammā. mātari pitari dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇādīsu ca katāparādhā. māgavikādayo vā kakkhaḷakammā.

[03] ^b^na kho, āvuso, gotamā^eb^ti idaṃ nigaṇṭhā ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ vāde dosaṃ deti, mayampissa dosaṃ āropemā''ti maññamānā ārabhiṃsu. tassattho, ``āvuso, gotama yathā tumhe paṇītacīvarāni dhārentā sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantā devavimānavaṇṇāya gandhakuṭiyā vasamānā sukhena sukhaṃ adhigacchatha, na evaṃ sukhena sukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ. yathā pana mayaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi nānappakāraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavāma, evaṃ dukkhena sukhaṃ adhigantabba''nti. ^b^sukhena ca hāvuso^eb^ti idaṃ sace sukhena ca sukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ siyā. rājā adhigaccheyyāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ ^a^P2.0065^ea^. tattha ^b^māgadho^eb^ti magadharaṭṭhassa issaro. ^b^seniyo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^bimbī^eb^ti attabhāvassa nāmaṃ. so tassa sārabhūto dassanīyo pāsādiko attabhāvasamiddhiyā ^b^bimbisāro^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^sukhavihāritaro^eb^ti idaṃ te nigaṇṭhā rañño tīsu pāsādesu tividhavayehi nāṭakehi saddhiṃ sampattianubhavanaṃ sandhāya vadanti. ^b^addhā^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^sahasā appaṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti sāhasaṃ katvā, appaccavekkhitvāva yathā ratto rāgavasena duṭṭho dosavasena mūḷho mohavasena bhāsati, evamevaṃ vācā bhāsitāti dasseti.
[03] ^b^tattha paṭipucchissāmī^eb^ti tasmiṃ atthe pucchissāmi. ^b^yathā vo khameyyā^eb^ti yathā tumhākaṃ rucceyya. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti sakkoti.

[03] ^b^aniñjamāno^eb^ti acalamāno. ^b^ekantasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti nirantarasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī. ``ahaṃ kho ^a^V1.0377^ea^, āvuso, nigaṇṭhā pahomi...pe0... ekantasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī''ti idaṃ attano phalasamāpattisukhaṃ dassento āha. ettha ca kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ rājavāre satta ādiṃ katvā pucchā katā. satta rattindivāni nappahotīti hi vutte cha pañca cattārīti sukhaṃ pucchituṃ hoti. suddhavāre pana sattāti vutte puna cha pañca cattārīti vuccamānaṃ anacchariyaṃ hoti, tasmā ekaṃ ādiṃ katvā desanā katā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0378^ea^ ^a^M1.0370^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti anumānasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^bhaggesū^eb^ti evaṃnāmake janapade, vacanattho panettha vuttānusāreneva veditabbo. ^b^susumāragire^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare. tassa kira nagarassa vatthupariggahadivase avidūre udakarahade suṃsumāro saddamakāsi, giraṃ nicchāresi. atha nagare niṭṭhite ^b^suṃsumāragiraṃ^eb^ tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. ^b^bhesakaḷāvane^eb^ti bhesakaḷānāmake vane. ``bhesagaḷāvane''tipi pāṭho. ^b^migadāye^eb^ti taṃ vanaṃ migapakkhīnaṃ abhayadinnaṭṭhāne jātaṃ, tasmā ^b^migadāyo^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^pavāretī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0066^ea^ icchāpeti. ^b^vadantū^eb^ti ovādānusāsanivasena vadantu, anusāsantūti attho. ^b^vacanīyomhī^eb^ti ahaṃ tumhehi vattabbo, anusāsitabbo ovaditabboti attho. ^b^so ca hoti dubbaco^eb^ti so ca dukkhena vattabbo hoti, vutto na sahati. ^b^dovacassakaraṇehī^eb^ti dubbacabhāvakārakehi upari āgatehi soḷasahi dhammehi. ^b^appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsani^eb^nti yo hi vuccamāno tumhe maṃ kasmā vadatha, ahaṃ attano kappiyākappiyaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ atthānatthaṃ jānāmīti vadati. ayaṃ anusāsaniṃ padakkhiṇato na gaṇhāti, vāmato gaṇhāti, tasmā ^b^appadakkhiṇaggāhī^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^pāpikānaṃ icchāna^eb^nti lāmakānaṃ asantasambhavanapatthanānaṃ. ^b^paṭippharatī^eb^ti paṭiviruddho, paccanīko hutvā tiṭṭhati, ^b^apasādetī^eb^ti kiṃ nu kho tuyhaṃ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena, tvampi nāma bhaṇitabbaṃ maññissasīti evaṃ ghaṭṭeti. ^b^paccāropetī^eb^ti, tvampi khosi itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ tāva paṭikarohīti evaṃ paṭiāropeti.

[03] ^b^aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratī^eb^ti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā paṭicchādeti. ``āpattiṃ āpannosī''ti vutte ``ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpanno, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā''ti vā vadati. ``evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha''nti vutte ``na suṇāmī''ti ^a^V1.0379^ea^ sotaṃ vā upaneti. ^b^bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetī^eb^ti ``itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī''ti puṭṭho ``pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī''ti vatvā puna ``na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma, āpattiṃ ^a^M1.0371^ea^ pucchāmā''ti vutte ``tato rājagehaṃ gatomhī''ti, rājagehaṃ vā yāhi brāhmaṇagehaṃ vā, āpattiṃ āpannosīti. tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddhantiādīni vadanto kathaṃ bahiddhā vikkhipati.

[03] ^b^apadāne^eb^ti attano cariyāya. ^b^na sampāyatī^eb^ti, āvuso, tvaṃ kuhiṃ vasasi, kaṃ nissāya vasasīti vā, yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi ``mayā esa āpattiṃ āpajjanno diṭṭho''ti. tvaṃ tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ karosi, ayaṃ kiṃ karoti, kattha vā tvaṃ acchasi kattha vā ayantiādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭho sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkoti.
[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrāvuso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0067^ea^, āvuso, tesu soḷasasu dhammesu. ^b^attanāva attānaṃ evaṃ anuminitabba^eb^nti evaṃ attanāva attā anumetabbo tuletabbo tīretabbo.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccavekkhitabba^eb^nti paccavekkhitabbo. ^b^ahorattānusikkhinā^eb^ti divāpi rattimpi sikkhantena, ratiñca divā ca kusalesu dhammesu sikkhantena pītipāmojjameva uppādetabbanti attho.

[03] ^b^acche vā udakapatte^eb^ti pasanne vā udakabhājane. ^b^mukhanimitta^eb^nti mukhapaṭibimbaṃ. ^b^raja^eb^nti āgantukarajaṃ. ^b^aṅgaṇa^eb^nti tattha jātakaṃ tilakaṃ vā piḷakaṃ vā. ^b^sabbepime pāpake akusale dhamme pahīne^eb^ti iminā sabbappahānaṃ kathesi. kathaṃ? ettakā akusalā dhammā pabbajitassa nānucchavikāti paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppādayato hi ^b^paṭisaṅkhānappahānaṃ^eb^kathitaṃ hoti. sīlaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ ārabhitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattentassa^b^ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ. samāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa ^b^tadaṅgappahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ. vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaṃ bhāventassa ^b^samucchedappahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ. phale āgate ^b^paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ,^eb^ nibbāne āgate ^b^nissaraṇappahāna^eb^nti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte sabbappahānaṃ kathitaṃva hoti.

[03] idañhi ^a^V1.0380^ea^ suttaṃ ^b^bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ^eb^ nāmāti porāṇā vadanti. idaṃ divasassa tikkhattuṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ. pāto eva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnena ``ime ettakā kilesā atthi nu kho mayhaṃ natthī''ti paccavekkhitabbā. sace atthīti passati, tesaṃ pahānāya vāyamitabbaṃ. no ce passati, supabbajitosmīti ^a^M1.0372^ea^ attamanena bhavitabbaṃ. bhattakiccaṃ katvā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisīditvāpi paccavekkhitabbaṃ. sāyaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne nisīditvāpi paccavekkhitabbaṃ. tikkhattuṃ asakkontena dve vāre paccavekkhitabbaṃ. dve vāre asakkontena pana avassaṃ ekavāraṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ, appaccavekkhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] anumānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0381^ea^ ^a^P2.0068^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cetokhilasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^cetokhilā^eb^ti cittassa thaddhabhāvā kacavarabhāvā khāṇukabhāvā. ^b^cetaso vinibandhā^eb^ti cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetaso vinibandhā. ^b^vuddhi^eb^ntiādīsu sīlena vuddhiṃ, maggena viruḷhiṃ, nibbānena vepullaṃ. sīlasamādhīhi vā vuddhiṃ, vipassanāmaggehi viruḷhiṃ, phalanibbānehi vepullaṃ. ^b^satthari kaṅkhatī^eb^ti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati. sarīre kaṅkhamāno dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati, guṇe kaṅkhamāno atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati. ^b^vicikicchatī^eb^ti vicinanto kicchati, dukkhaṃ āpajjati, vinicchetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^nādhimuccatī^eb^ti evametanti adhimokkhaṃ na paṭilabhati. ^b^na sampasīdatī^eb^ti guṇesu otaritvā nibbicikicchabhāvena pasīdituṃ, anāvilo bhavituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^ātappāyā^eb^ti kilesasantāpakavīriyakaraṇatthāya. ^b^anuyogāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ yogāya. ^b^sātaccāyā^eb^ti satatakiriyāya ^b^padhānāyā^eb^ti padahanatthāya. ^b^ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhilo^eb^ti ayaṃ satthari vicikicchāsaṅkhāto paṭhamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo, evametassa bhikkhuno appahīno hoti. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme ca. pariyattidhamme kaṅkhamāno, tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti vadanti, atthi nu kho etaṃ natthīti kaṅkhati. paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamāno vipassanānissando maggo nāma, magganissando phalaṃ nāma, sabbasaṅkhārapaṭinissaggo nibbānaṃ nāmāti vadanti. taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati. ^b^saṅghe kaṅkhatī^eb^ti suppaṭipannotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannā ^a^M1.0373^ea^ cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto ^b^saṅgho^eb^ nāma, so atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati. ^b^sikkhāya kaṅkhamāno^eb^ adhisīlasikkhā nāma adhicittasikkhā nāma adhipaññāsikkhā ^a^P2.0069^ea^ nāmāti vadanti. sā atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhati. ^b^ayaṃ pañcamo^eb^ti ayaṃ sabrahmacārīsu kopasaṅkhāto pañcamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo kacavarabhāvo khāṇukabhāvo.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ vinibandhesu ^a^V1.0382^ea^ ^b^kāme^eb^ti vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi. ^b^kāye^eb^ti attano kāye. ^b^rūpe^eb^ti bahiddhā rūpe. ^b^yāvadattha^eb^nti yattakaṃ icchati, tattakaṃ. ^b^udarāvadehaka^eb^nti udarapūraṃ. tañhi udaraṃ avadehanato udarāvadehakanti vuccati. ^b^seyyasukha^eb^nti mañcapīṭhasukhaṃ, utusukhaṃ vā. ^b^passasukha^eb^nti yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassavāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, evaṃ uppannasukhaṃ. ^b^middhasukha^eb^nti niddāsukhaṃ. ^b^anuyutto^eb^ti yuttapayutto viharati.

[03] ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti patthayitvā. ^b^sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^sīla^eb^nti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. ^b^vata^eb^nti vatasamādānaṃ. ^b^tapo^eb^ti tapacaraṇaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti methunavirati. ^b^devo vā bhavissāmī^eb^ti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi. ^b^devaññataro vā^eb^pi appesakkhadevesu vā aññataro.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ iddhipādesu chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi ^b^chandasamādhi^eb^. padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā ^b^padhānasaṅkhārā. samannāgata^eb^nti tehi dhammehi upetaṃ. iddhiyā pādaṃ, iddhibhūtaṃ vā pādanti ^b^iddhipādaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo, ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthāro pana iddhipādavibhaṅge āgato yeva. ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^pissa attho dīpito. iti imehi catūhi iddhipādehi vikkhambhanappahānaṃ kathitaṃ. ^b^ussoḷhīyeva pañcamī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ussoḷhī^eb^ti sabbattha kattabbavīriyaṃ dasseti. ^b^ussoḷhīpannarasaṅgasamannāgato^eb^ti pañca cetokhilappahānāni pañca vinibandhappahānāni cattāro iddhipādā ussoḷhīti evaṃ ussoḷhiyā saddhiṃ pannarasahi aṅgehi samannāgato. ^b^bhabbo^eb^ti anurūpo, anucchaviko. ^b^abhinibbhidāyā^eb^ti ñāṇena kilesabhedāya. ^b^sambodhāyā^eb^ti catumaggasambodhāya. ^b^anuttarassā^eb^ti seṭṭhassa. ^b^yogakkhemassā^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemassa arahattassa. ^b^adhigamāyā^eb^ti paṭilābhāya. ^b^seyyathā^eb^ti opammatthe nipāto. ^b^pī^eb^ti sambhāvanatthe. ubhayenapi seyyathāpi nāma, bhikkhaveti dasseti ^a^P2.0070^ea^.

[03] ^b^kukkuṭiyā^eb^ ^a^M1.0374^ea^ ^b^aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā^eb^ti ettha pana kiñcāpi kukkuṭiyā vuttappakārato ūnādhikānipi aṇḍāni honti, vacanasiliṭṭhatāya pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. evañhi loke siliṭṭhaṃ vacanaṃ hoti. ^b^tānassū^eb^ti tāni assu, bhaveyyunti attho. ^b^kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti tāya janettiyā kukkuṭiyā pakkhe pasāretvā tesaṃ upari sayantiyā sammā adhisayitāni. ^b^sammā pariseditānī^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ utuṃ gāhāpentiyā suṭṭhu samantato seditāni ^a^V1.0383^ea^ usmīkatāni. ^b^sammā paribhāvitānī^eb^ti kālena kālaṃ suṭṭhu samantato bhāvitāni, kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānīti attho. ^b^kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā^eb^ti tassā kukkuṭiyā imaṃ tividhakiriyākaraṇena appamādaṃ katvā kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya. ^b^atha kho bhabbāva te^eb^ti atha kho te kukkuṭapotakā vuttanayena sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṃ bhabbāva. te hi yasmā tāya kukkuṭiyā evaṃ tīhākārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripālīyamānāni na pūtīni honti. yopi nesaṃ allasineho, sopi pariyādānaṃ gacchati, kapālaṃ tanukaṃ hoti, pādanakhasikhā ca mukhatuṇḍakañca kharaṃ hoti, sayaṃ paripākaṃ gacchati, kapālassa tanuttā bahi āloko anto paññāyati, tasmā ``ciraṃ vata mayaṃ saṅkuṭitahatthapādā sambādhe sayimhā, ayañca bahi āloko dissati, ettha dāni no sukhavihāro bhavissatī''ti nikkhamitukāmā hutvā kapālaṃ pādena paharanti, gīvaṃ pasārenti, tato taṃ kapālaṃ dvedhā bhijjati. atha te pakkhe vidhunantā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamantiyeva, nikkhamitvā ca gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā vicaranti.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti idaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsandetvā veditabbaṃ -- tassā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ viya hi imassa bhikkhuno ussoḷhīpannarasehi aṅgehi samannāgatabhāvo. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya pannarasaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni. tassā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya tassa bhikkhuno tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ ^a^P2.0071^ea^. aṇḍakalāpānaṃ tanubhāvo viya ^a^M1.0375^ea^ bhikkhuno avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo. kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhamutuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo. kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇāmakālo viya bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhitakālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo. kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinikkhamanakālo viya tassa bhikkhuno vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vicarantassa tajjātikaṃ utusappāyaṃ vā bhojanasappāyaṃ vā puggalasappāyaṃ vā dhammassavanasappāyaṃ vā labhitvā ekāsane nisinnasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa anupubbādhigatena arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā ^a^V1.0384^ea^ arahattappattakālo veditabbo. yathā pana kukkuṭapotakānaṃ pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātāpi aṇḍakosaṃ bhindati, evaṃ tathārūpassa bhikkhuno ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā satthāpi --
[21] ``ucchinda sinehamattano, kumudaṃ sāradikaṃva pāṇinā.
[22] santimaggameva brūhaya, nibbānaṃ sugatena desita''nti.. (dha0 pa0 285) --

[25] ādinā nayena obhāsaṃ pharitvā gāthāya avijjaṇḍakosaṃ paharati, so gāthāpariyosāne avijjāṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. tato paṭṭhāya yathā te kukkuṭapotakā gāmakkhettaṃ upasobhayamānā tattha tattha vicaranti, evaṃ ayampi mahākhīṇāsavo nibbānarammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā saṅghārāmaṃ upasobhayamāno vicarati.

[03] iti imasmiṃ sutte cattāri pahānāni kathitāni. kathaṃ? cetokhilānañhi cetovinibandhānaṃ pahānena ^b^paṭisaṅkhānappapahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ, iddhipādehi ^b^vikkhambhanappahānaṃ^eb^ kathita, magge āgate ^b^samucchedappahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ, phale āgate ^b^paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ^eb^ kathitaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cetokhilasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0376^ea^ ^a^V1.0385^ea^ ^a^P2.0072^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti vanapatthapariyāyaṃ. tattha^b^ vanapatthapariyāya^eb^nti vanapatthakāraṇaṃ, vanapatthadesanaṃ vā.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ^b^vanapatthaṃ upanissāya viharatī^eb^ti manussūpacārātikkantaṃ vanasaṇḍasenāsanaṃ nissāya samaṇadhammaṃ karonto viharati. ^b^anupaṭṭhitā^eb^tiādīsu pubbe anupaṭṭhitā sati taṃ upanissāya viharatopi na upaṭṭhāti, pubbe asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ na samādhiyati, pubbe aparikkhīṇā āsavā na parikkhayaṃ gacchanti, pubbe ananuppattaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemasaṅkhātaṃ arahattañca na pāpuṇātīti attho. ^b^jīvitaparikkhārā^eb^ti jīvitasambhārā. ^b^samudānetabbā^eb^ti samāharitabbā. ^b^kasirena samudāgacchantī^eb^ti dukkhena uppajjanti. ^b^rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vā^eb^ti rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā. ettha ca rattibhāge paṭisañcikkhamānena ñatvā rattiṃyeva pakkamitabbaṃ, rattiṃ caṇḍavāḷādīnaṃ paribandhe sati aruṇuggamanaṃ āgametabbaṃ. divasabhāge ñatvā divāva pakkamitabbaṃ, divā paribandhe sati sūriyatthaṅgamanaṃ āgametabbaṃ.
[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhāpī^eb^ti evaṃ samaṇadhammassa anipphajjanabhāvaṃ jānitvā. anantaravāre pana saṅkhāpīti evaṃ samaṇadhammassa nipphajjanabhāvaṃ jānitvā.
[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāvajīva^eb^nti yāva jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva vatthabbameva.
[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ^b^so puggalo^eb^ti padassa nānubandhitabboti iminā sambandho. ^b^anāpucchā^eb^ti idha pana taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhāpī^eb^ti evaṃ samaṇadhammassa anipphajjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā so puggalo nānubandhitabbo, taṃ āpucchā pakkamitabbaṃ.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ^b^api^eb^ ^a^V1.0386^ea^ ^b^panujjamānenāpī^eb^ti api nikkaḍḍhīyamānenāpi. evarūpo hi puggalo sacepi dārukalāpasataṃ vā udakaghaṭasataṃ vā vālikambaṇasataṃ vā daṇḍaṃ āharāpeti, mā idha vasīti nikkaḍḍhāpeti vā, taṃ taṃ khamāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ vatthabbamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] vanapatthapariyāyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M1.0377^ea^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ ^a^P2.0073^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mahāvana^eb^nti himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ aropimaṃ jātivanaṃ, na yathā vesāliyaṃ ropitāropitamissakaṃ. ^b^divāvihārāyā^eb^ti divā paṭisallānatthāya. ^b^beluvalaṭṭhikāyā^eb^ti taruṇabeluvarukkhassa. ^b^daṇḍapāṇī^eb^ti na jarādubbalatāya daṇḍahattho. ayañhi taruṇo paṭhamavaye ṭhito, daṇḍacittatāya pana suvaṇṇadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā vicarati, tasmā ^b^daṇḍapāṇī^eb^ti vutto. ^b^jaṅghāvihāra^eb^nti jaṅghākilamathavinodanatthaṃ jaṅghācāraṃ. ^b^anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno^eb^ti ārāmadassana-vanadassana-pabbatadassanādīnaṃ atthāya ito cito ca vicaramāno. adhiccanikkhamano kiresa kadāci deva nikkhamitvā evaṃ vicarati. ^b^daṇḍamolubbhā^eb^ti daṇḍaṃ olumbhitvā gopālakadārako viya daṇḍaṃ purato ṭhapetvā daṇḍamatthake dve hatthe patiṭṭhāpetvā piṭṭhipāṇiṃ hanukena uppīḷetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
