[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃvādī^eb^ti kiṃdiṭṭhiko. ^b^kimakkhāyī^eb^ti kiṃ katheti. ayaṃ rājā bhagavantaṃ avanditvā paṭisanthāramattakameva katvā pañhaṃ pucchati. tampi na aññātukāmatāya, acittīkārena pucchati. kasmā? devadattassa pakkhiko kiresa. devadatto attano santikaṃ āgacchamāne tathāgate bhindati. so kira evaṃ vadeti ``samaṇo gotamo amhākaṃ kulena saddhiṃ verī, na no kulassa vuddhiṃ icchati. bhaginīpi me cakkavattiparibhogā, taṃ pahāya `nassatesā'ti nikkhamitvā pabbaji. bhāgineyyopi me cakkavattibījanti ñatvā amhākaṃ kulassa vaḍḍhiyā atussanto `nassateta'nti tampi daharakāleyeva pabbājesi. ahaṃ pana tena vinā vattituṃ asakkonto anupabbajito. evaṃ pabbajitampi maṃ pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya na ujukehi akkhīhi oloketi. parisamajjhe bhāsantopi mahāpharasunā paharanto viya āpāyiko devadattotiādīni bhāsatī''ti. evaṃ ayampi rājā devadattena bhinno, tasmā evamakāsi.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0074^ea^ bhagavā yathā ayaṃ rājā mayā pañhe pucchite na kathetīti vattuṃ na labhati, yathā ^a^V1.0388^ea^ ca bhāsitassa atthaṃ na jānāti, evamassa ^a^M1.0378^ea^ kathessāmīti tassānucchavikaṃ kathento ^b^yathāvādī kho^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti loke kenaci saddhiṃ viggāhikakathaṃ na karoti na vivadati. tathāgato hi lokena saddhiṃ na vivadati; loko pana tathāgatena saddhiṃ aniccanti vutte niccanti vadamāno, dukkhaṃ, anattā, asubhanti vutte subhanti vadamāno vivadati. tenevāha ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, lokena vivadāmi, lokova kho, bhikkhave, mayā vivadati, tathā na, bhikkhave, dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṃ vivadati, adhammavādīva kho, bhikkhave, vivadatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.94). ^b^yathā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena. ^b^kāmehī^eb^ti vatthukāmehipi kilesakāmehipi. ^b^taṃ brāhmaṇa^eb^nti taṃ khīṇāsavaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ. ^b^akathaṃkathi^eb^nti nibbicikicchaṃ. ^b^chinnakukkucca^eb^nti vippaṭisārakukkuccassa ceva hatthapādakukkuccassa ca chinnattā chinnakukkuccaṃ. ^b^bhavābhave^eb^ti punappunabbhave, hīnapaṇīte vā bhave, paṇīto hi bhavo vuddhippatto abhavoti vuccati. ^b^saññā^eb^ti kilesasaññā. kilesāyeva vā idha saññānāmena vuttā, tasmā yena kāraṇena kāmehi visaṃyuttaṃ viharantaṃ taṃ loke ninnāvādiṃ khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ kilesasaññā nānusenti, tañca kāraṇaṃ ahaṃ vadāmīti ayamettha attho. iti bhagavā attano khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^nillāḷetvā^eb^ti nīharitvā kīḷāpetvā. ^b^tivisākha^eb^nti tisākhaṃ. ^b^nalāṭika^eb^nti valibhaṅgaṃ nalāṭe tisso rājiyo dassento valibhaṅgaṃ vuṭṭhāpetvāti attho. ^b^daṇḍamolubbhā^eb^ti daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā. ``daṇḍamālubbhā''tipi pāṭho, gahetvā pakkāmīti attho.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññataro^eb^ti nāmena apākaṭo eko bhikkhu. so kira anusandhikusalo, bhagavatā yathā daṇḍapāṇī na jānāti, tathā mayā kathitanti vutte kinti nu kho bhagavatā aviññeyyaṃ katvā pañho kathitoti anusandhiṃ gahetvā dasabalaṃ yācitvā imaṃ pañhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dasanakhasamujjalaṃ ^a^P2.0075^ea^ añjaliṃ paggayha ^b^kiṃvādī pana, bhante bhagavā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^yatonidāna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0379^ea^ bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ etaṃ, yena kāraṇena yasmiṃ kāraṇe satīti attho. ^b^papañcasaññāsaṅkhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^saṅkhā^eb^ti koṭṭhāso. ^b^papañcasaññā^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcasampayuttā saññā ^a^V1.0389^ea^, saññānāmena vā papañcāyeva vuttā. tasmā papañcakoṭṭhāsāti ayamettha attho. ^b^samudācarantī^eb^ti pavattanti. ^b^ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba^eb^nti yasmiṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhāte kāraṇe sati papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti, ettha ekāyatanampi ce abhinanditabbaṃ abhivaditabbaṃ ajjhositabbaṃ natthīti attho. tattha ^b^abhininditabba^eb^nti ahaṃ mamanti abhinanditabbaṃ. ^b^abhivaditabba^eb^nti ahaṃ mamāti vattabbaṃ. ^b^ajjhositabba^eb^nti ajjhositvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahetabbayuttaṃ. etenettha taṇhādīnaṃyeva appavattiṃ katheti. ^b^esevanto^eb^ti ayaṃ abhinandanādīnaṃ natthibhāvova rāgānusayādīnaṃ anto. eseva nayo sabbattha.

[03] ^b^daṇḍādānā^eb^dīsu pana yāya cetanāya daṇḍaṃ ādiyati, sā ^b^daṇḍādānaṃ^eb^. yāya satthaṃ ādiyati parāmasati, sā ^b^satthādānaṃ^eb^. matthakappattaṃ ^b^kalahaṃ^eb^. nānāgāhamattaṃ ^b^viggahaṃ^eb^. nānāvādamattaṃ ^b^vivādaṃ. tuvaṃ tuva^eb^nti evaṃ pavattaṃ tuvaṃ tuvaṃ. piyasuññakaraṇaṃ ^b^pesuññaṃ^eb^. ayathāsabhāvaṃ musāvādaṃ karoti, sā ^b^musāvādo^eb^ti veditabbā. ^b^etthete^eb^ti ettha dvādasasu āyatanesu ete kilesā. kilesā hi uppajjamānāpi dvādasāyatanāni nissāya uppajjanti, nirujjhamānāpi dvādasasu āyatanesuyeva nirujjhanti. evaṃ yatthuppannā, tattheva niruddhā honti. svāyamattho samudayasaccapañhena dīpetabbo --

[03] ``sā kho panesā taṇhā kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati, kattha nivisamānā nivisatī''ti vatvā -- ``yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati. kiñca loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ? cakkhu loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa''ntiādinā (vibha0 203) nayena dvādasasuyeva āyatanesu tassā uppatti ca nirodho ca vutto. yatheva ca taṇhā dvādasasu āyatanesu uppajjitvā ^a^P2.0076^ea^ nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi āyatanesu puna samudācārassa abhāvato āyatanesuyeva niruddhāti vuttā, evamimepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā āyatanesu nirujjhantīti veditabbā. atha vā yvāyaṃ abhinandanādīnaṃ abhāvova rāgānusayādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0380^ea^ antoti vutto. etthete rāgānusayādīnaṃ antoti laddhavohāre nibbāne pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti. yañhi yattha natthi, taṃ tattha niruddhaṃ nāma hoti, svāyamattho nirodhapañhena dīpetabbo. vuttañhetaṃ ``dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa ^a^V1.0390^ea^ vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā hontī''tiādi (paṭi0 ma0 1.83).
[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito^eb^ti satthārā ca pasaṃsito. ^b^viññūna^eb^nti idampi karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, paṇḍitehi sabrahmacārīhi ca sambhāvitoti attho. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti sakkoti.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ^b^atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkamma khandha^eb^nti sāro nāma mūle vā khandhe vā bhaveyya, tampi atikkamitvāti attho. ^b^evaṃsampada^eb^nti evaṃsampattikaṃ, īdisanti attho. ^b^atisitvā^eb^ti atikkamitvā. ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti jānitabbameva jānāti. ^b^passaṃ passatī^eb^ti passitabbameva passati. yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi na passati, na evaṃ bhagavā. bhagavā pana jānanto jānātiyeva, passanto passatiyeva. svāyaṃ dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^. viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^ñāṇabhūto^eb^. aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^. seṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^. atha vā cakkhu viya bhūtoti ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^ti evametesu padesu attho veditabbo. svāyaṃ dhammassa vattanato ^b^vattā^eb^. pavattāpanato ^b^pavattā^eb^. atthaṃ nīharitvā dassanasamatthatāya ^b^atthassa ninnetā^eb^. amatādhigamāya paṭipattiṃ dadātīti ^b^amatassa dātā. agaruṃ katvā^eb^ti punappunaṃ āyācāpentopi hi garuṃ karoti nāma, attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā sinerūpādato vālukaṃ uddharamāno viya dubbiññeyyaṃ katvā kathentopi garuṃ karotiyeva nāma. evaṃ akatvā amhe punappunaṃ ayācāpetvā suviññeyyampi no katvā kathehīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ yaṃb^ ^a^P2.0077^ea^ ^b^kho no āvuso^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi ``yaṃ kho vo''ti vattabbaṃ siyā, te pana bhikkhū attanā saddhiṃ saṅgaṇhanto ``yaṃ kho no''ti āha. yasmā vā uddesova tesaṃ uddiṭṭhova. bhagavā pana therassāpi tesampi ^a^M1.0381^ea^ bhagavāva. tasmā bhagavāti padaṃ sandhāyapi evamāha, yaṃ kho amhākaṃ bhagavā tumhākaṃ saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvāti attho.

[03] ^b^cakkhuñcāvuso^eb^tiādīsu ayamattho, āvuso, nissayabhāvena cakkhupasādañca ārammaṇabhāvena ^a^V1.0391^ea^ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpe ca paṭicca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma uppajjati. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso^eb^ti tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso nāma uppajjati. taṃ phassaṃ paṭicca sahajātādivasena phassapaccayā vedanā uppajjati. tāya vedanāya yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vedeti, tadeva saññā sañjānāti, yaṃ saññā sañjānāti, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ vitakko vitakketi. yaṃ vitakko vitakketi, tadevārammaṇaṃ papañco papañceti. ^b^tatonidāna^eb^nti etehi cakkhurūpādīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī^eb^ti taṃ apariññātakāraṇaṃ purisaṃ papañcakoṭṭhāsā abhibhavanti, tassa pavattantīti attho. tattha phassavedanāsaññā cakkhuviññāṇena sahajātā honti. vitakko cakkhuviññāṇānantarādīsu savitakkacittesu daṭṭhabbo. papañcasaṅkhā javanena sahajātā honti. yadi evaṃ kasmā atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ katanti? tathā uppajjanato. yatheva hi etarahi cakkhudvāriko papañco cakkhuñca rūpe ca phassavedanāsaññāvitakke ca paṭicca uppanno, evamevaṃ atītānāgatesupi cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu tassuppattiṃ dassento evamāha.

[03] ^b^sotañcāvuso^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. chaṭṭhadvāre pana ^b^mana^eb^nti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti tebhūmakadhammārammaṇaṃ. ^b^manoviññāṇa^eb^nti āvajjanaṃ vā javanaṃ vā. āvajjane gahite phassavedanāsaññāvitakkā āvajjanasahajātā honti. papañco javanasahajāto. javane gahite sahāvajjanakaṃ bhavaṅga mano nāma hoti, tato phassādayo sabbepi javanena sahajātāva. manodvāre pana yasmā atītādibhedaṃ sabbampi ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^atītānāgatapaccuppannesū^eb^ti idaṃ yuttameva.

[03] idāni ^a^P2.0078^ea^ vaṭṭaṃ dassento ^b^so vatāvuso^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi. ^b^phassapaññattiṃ paññapessatī^eb^ti phasso nāma eko dhammo uppajjatīti evaṃ phassapaññattiṃ paññapessati, dassessatīti attho. esa nayo sabbattha. evaṃ imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti dvādasāyatanavasena sakalaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni dvādasāyatanapaṭikkhepavasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassento ^b^so vatāvuso cakkhusmiṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0382^ea^ ^b^asatī^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.

[03] evaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā idāni sāvakena pañho kathitoti mā nikkaṅkhā ahuvattha, ayaṃ ^a^V1.0392^ea^ bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇatulaṃ gahetvā nisinno, icchamānā tameva upasaṅkamitvā nikkaṅkhā hothāti uyyojento ^b^ākaṅkhamānā ca panā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi kāraṇehi papañcuppattiyā pāṭiyekkakāraṇehi ceva vaṭṭavivaṭṭakāraṇehi ca. ^b^imehi padehī^eb^ti imehi akkharasampiṇḍanehi. ^b^byañjanehī^eb^ti pāṭiyekkākkharehi. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. catūhi vā kāraṇehi paṇḍito dhātukusalo āyatanakusalo paccayākārakusalo kāraṇākāraṇakusaloti. ^b^mahāpañño^eb^ti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggahaṇasamatthāya mahāpaññāya samannāgato. ^b^yathā taṃ mahākaccānenā^eb^ti yathā mahākaccānena byākataṃ, taṃ sandhāya ^b^ta^eb^nti vuttaṃ. yathā mahākaccānena byākataṃ, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyenti attho.

[03] ^b^madhupiṇḍika^eb^nti mahantaṃ guḷapūvaṃ baddhasattuguḷakaṃ vā. ^b^asecanaka^eb^nti asecitabbakaṃ. sappiphāṇitamadhusakkarādīsu idaṃ nāmettha mandaṃ idaṃ bahukanti na vattabbaṃ samayojitarasaṃ. ^b^cetaso^eb^ti cintakajātiko. ^b^dabbajātiko^eb^ti paṇḍitasabhāvo. ^b^ko nāmo aya^eb^nti idaṃ thero atibhaddako ayaṃ dhammapariyāyo, dasabalassa sabbaññutaññāṇenevassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmīti cintetvā āha. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā madhupiṇḍiko viya madhuro, tasmā madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṃ dhārehīti vadati. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] madhupiṇḍikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^a^M1.0383^ea^ ^a^V1.0393^ea^ ^a^P2.0079^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti dvedhāvitakkasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^dvidhā katvā dvidhā katvā^eb^ti dve dve bhāge katvā. ^b^kāmavitakko^eb^ti kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ^b^byāpādavitakko^eb^ti byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ^b^vihiṃsāvitakko^eb^ti vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ^b^ekaṃ bhāga^eb^nti ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā sabbo pāyaṃ vitakko akusalapakkhikoyevāti tayopi kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakke ekaṃ koṭṭhāsamakāsiṃ. kāmehi nissaṭo nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^nekkhammavitakko^eb^ nāma, so yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati. abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^abyāpādavitakko,^eb^ so mettāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati. avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^avihiṃsāvitakko,^eb^ so karuṇāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati. ^b^dutiyaṃ bhāga^eb^nti sabbopāyaṃ kusalapakkhikoyevāti dutiyaṃ koṭṭhāsamakāsiṃ. iminā bodhisattassa vitakkaniggahaṇakālo kathito.

[03] bodhisattassa hi chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahantassa nekkhammavitakkādayo puñjapuñjā mahānadiyaṃ oghā viya pavattiṃsu. satisammosena pana sahasā kāmavitakkādayo uppajjitvā kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā sayaṃ akusalajavanavārā hutvā tiṭṭhanti. tato bodhisatto cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ ime kāmavitakkādayo kusalavāraṃ pacchinditvā tiṭṭhanti, handāhaṃ ime vitakke dve bhāge katvā viharāmī''ti kāmavitakkādayo akusalapakkhikāti ekaṃ bhāgaṃ karoti nekkhammavitakkādayo kusalapakkhikāti ekaṃ. atha puna cintesi -- ``akusalapakkhato āgataṃ vitakkaṃ mantena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya amittaṃ gīvāya akkamanto viya ca niggahessāmi, nāssa vaḍḍhituṃ dassāmi. kusalapakkhato āgataṃ vitakkaṃ meghasamaye meghaṃ viya sukhette sālakalyāṇipotakaṃ viya ca sīghaṃ vaḍḍhessāmī''ti. so tathā katvā akusalavitakke niggaṇhi, kusalavitakke vaḍḍhesi. evaṃ iminā bodhisattassa vitakkaniggahaṇanakālo kathitoti veditabbo.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V1.0394^ea^ ^a^P2.0080^ea^ yathāssa te vitakkā uppajjiṃsu, yathā ca ne niggahesi, taṃ dassento ^b^tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^appamattassā^eb^ti satiyā ^a^M1.0384^ea^ avippavāse ṭhitassa. ^b^ātāpino^eb^ti ātāpavīriyavantassa. ^b^pahitattassā^eb^ti pesitacittassa. ^b^uppajjati kāmavitakko^eb^ti bodhisattassa chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahato rajjasukhaṃ vā ārabbha, pāsāde vā nāṭakāni vā orodhe vā kiñcideva vā sampattiṃ ārabbha kāmavitakko nāma na uppannapubbo. dukkarakārikāya panassa āhārūpacchedena adhimattakasimānaṃ pattassa etadahosi -- ``na sakkā āhārūpacchedena visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ, yaṃnūnāhaṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhāreyya''nti. so uruvelaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. manussā -- ``mahāpuriso pubbe āharitvā dinnampi na gaṇhi, addhāssa idāni manoratho matthakaṃ patto, tasmā sayameva āgato''ti paṇītapaṇītaṃ āhāraṃ upahariṃsu. bodhisattassa attabhāvo nacirasseva pākatiko ahosi. jarājiṇṇattabhāvo hi sappāyabhojanaṃ labhitvāpi pākatiko na hoti. bodhisatto pana daharo. tenassa sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjato attabhāvo na cirasseva pākatiko jāto, vippasannāni indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo, samuggatatārāgaṇaṃ viya nabhaṃ paripuṇṇadvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitasarīraṃ ahosi. so taṃ oloketvā ``tāva kilanto nāma attabhāvo evaṃ paṭipākatiko jāto''ti cintetvā attano paññāmahantatāya evaṃ parittakampi vitakkaṃ gahetvā kāmavitakkoti akāsi.

[03] paṇṇasālāya purato nisinno camarapasadagavayarohitamigādike magagaṇe manuññasaddaravane moravanakukkuṭādike pakkhigaṇe nīluppalakumudakamalādisañchannāni pallalāni nānākusumasañchannaviṭapā vanarājiyo maṇikkhandhanimmalajalapavāhañca nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ passati. tassa evaṃ hoti ``sobhanā vatime migajātā pakkhigaṇā pallalāni vanarājiyo nadī nerañjarā''ti. so tampi evaṃ parittakaṃ vitakkaṃ gahetvā kāmavitakkamakāsi, tenāha ``uppajjati kāmavitakko''ti.

[03] ^b^attabyābādhāyapī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0081^ea^ attadukkhāyapi. esevanayo sabbattha. kiṃ pana mahāsattassa ubhayadukkhāya saṃvattanakavitakko nāma atthīti? natthi. apariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa pana vitakko yāva ubhayabyābādhāya saṃvattatīti etāni tīṇi nāmāni labhati, tasmā evamāha. ^b^paññānirodhiko^eb^ti ^a^V1.0395^ea^ anuppannāya ^a^M1.0385^ea^ lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na deti, lokiyapaññaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattipañcābhiññāvasena uppannampi samucchinditvā khipatīti ^b^paññānirodhiko. vighātapakkhiko^eb^ti dukkhakoṭṭhāsiko. asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma, taṃ paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ na detīti ^b^anibbānasaṃvattaniko. abbhatthaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti khayaṃ natthibhāvaṃ gacchati. udakapupphuḷako viya nirujjhati. ^b^pajahamevā^eb^ti pajahimeva. ^b^vinodamevā^eb^ti nīharimeva. ^b^byantameva naṃ akāsi^eb^nti vigatantaṃ nissesaṃ parivaṭumaṃ paricchinnameva naṃ akāsiṃ.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ^b^byāpādavitakko^eb^ti na bodhisattassa parūpaghātappaṭisaṃyutto nāma vitakko citte uppajjati, athassa ativassāccuṇhātisītādīni pana paṭicca cittavipariṇāmabhāvo hoti, taṃ sandhāya ``byāpādavitakko''ti āha. ^b^vihiṃsāvitakko^eb^ti na mahāsattassa paresaṃ dukkhuppādanappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko uppajjati, citte pana uddhatākāro anekaggatākāro hoti, taṃ gahetvā vihiṃsāvitakkamakāsi. paṇṇasālādvāre nisinno hi sīhabyagghādike vāḷamige sūkarādayo khuddamige vihiṃsante passati. atha bodhisatto imasmimpi nāma akutobhaye araññe imesaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ paccatthikā uppajjanti, balavanto dubbale khādanti, balavantakhāditā vattantīti kāruññaṃ uppādeti. aññepi biḷārādayo kukkuṭamūsikādīni khādante passati, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho manusse rājakammikehi upaddute vadhabandhādīni anubhavante attano kasivaṇijjādīni kammāni katvā jīvituṃ na labhantīti kāruññaṃ uppādeti, taṃ sandhāya ``uppajjati vihiṃsāvitakko''ti āha. ^b^tathā tathā^eb^ti tena tena ākārena. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kāmavitakkādīsu yaṃ yaṃ vitakketi, yaṃ yaṃ vitakkaṃ pavatteti, tena tene cassākārena kāmavitakkādibhāvo cetaso ^a^P2.0082^ea^ na hi hotīti. ^b^pahāsi nekkhammavitakka^eb^nti nekkhammavitakkaṃ pajahati. ^b^bahulamakāsī^eb^ti bahulaṃ karoti. ^b^tassa taṃ kāmavitakkāya citta^eb^nti tassa taṃ cittaṃ kāmavitakkatthāya. yathā kāmavitakkasampayuttaṃ ^a^M1.0386^ea^ hoti, evamevaṃ namatīti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] idāni atthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ dassento ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kiṭṭhasambādhe^eb^ti sassasambādhe. ^b^ākoṭeyyā^eb^ti ujukaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ pahareyya. ^b^paṭikoṭeyyā^eb^ti tiriyaṃ phāsukāsu pahareyya. ^b^sannirundheyyā^eb^ti āvaritvā tiṭṭheyya. ^b^sannivāreyyā^eb^ti ito cito ca gantuṃ na dadeyya ^a^V1.0396^ea^. ^b^tatonidāna^eb^nti tena kāraṇena, evaṃ arakkhitānaṃ gunnaṃ paresaṃ sassakhādanakāraṇenāti attho. bālo hi gopāloko evaṃ gāvo arakkhamāno ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ bhattavetanaṃ khādati, ujuṃ gāvo rakkhitumpi na sakkoti, kulehi saddhiṃ veraṃ gaṇhāpetī''ti gosāmikānampi santikā vadhādīni pāpuṇāti, kiṭṭhasāmikānampi. paṇḍito pana imāni cattāri bhayāni sampassanto gāvo sādhukaṃ rakkhati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ādīnava^eb^nti upaddavaṃ. ^b^okāra^eb^nti lāmakaṃ, khandhesu vā otāraṃ. ^b^saṃkilesa^eb^nti kiliṭṭhabhāvaṃ. ^b^nekkhamme^eb^ti nekkhammamhi. ^b^ānisaṃsa^eb^nti visuddhipakkhaṃ. ^b^vodānapakkha^eb^nti idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ nekkhammamhi visuddhipakkhaṃ addasanti attho.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti ca kāmehi nissaṭaṃ sabbakusalaṃ, ekadhamme saṅgayhamāne nibbānameva. tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- kiṭṭhasambādhaṃ viya hi rūpādiārammaṇaṃ, kūṭagāvo viya kūṭacittaṃ, paṇḍitagopālako viya bodhisatto, catubbidhabhayaṃ viya attaparūbhayabyābādhāya saṃvattanavitakko, paṇḍitagopālakassa catubbidhaṃ bhayaṃ disvā kiṭṭhasambādhe appamādena gorakkhaṇaṃ viya bodhisattassa chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahato attabyābādhādibhayaṃ disvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yathā kāmavitakkādayo na uppajjanti, evaṃ cittarakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^paññāvuddhiko^eb^tiādīsu anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarapaññāya uppādāya, uppannāya ca vuddhiyā saṃvattatīti ^a^P2.0083^ea^ ^b^paññāvuddhiko^eb^. na dukkhakoṭṭhāsāya saṃvattatīti ^b^avighātapakkhiko^eb^. nibbānadhātusacchikiriyāya saṃvattatīti ^b^nibbānasaṃvattaniko. rattiṃ cepi naṃ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya^eb^nti sakalarattiṃ cepi taṃ vitakkaṃ pavatteyyaṃ. ^b^tatonidāna^eb^nti taṃmūlakaṃ. ^b^ohaññeyyā^eb^ti ugghātīyeyya, uddhaccāya saṃvatteyyāti ^a^M1.0387^ea^ attho. ^b^ārā^eb^ti dūre. ^b^samādhimhā^eb^ti upacārasamādhitopi appanāsamādhitopi. ^b^so kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva citta^eb^nti so ahaṃ, bhikkhave, mā me cittaṃ samādhimhā dūre hotūti ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi, gocarajjhatte ṭhapemīti attho. ^b^sannisādemī^eb^ti tattheva ca naṃ sannisīdāpemi. ^b^ekodiṃ karomī^eb^ti ekaggaṃ karomi. ^b^samādahāmī^eb^ti sammā ādahāmi, suṭṭhu āropemīti attho. ^b^mā me cittaṃ ūhaññī^eb^ti mā mayhaṃ cittaṃ ugghātīyittha, mā uddhaccāya saṃvattatūti attho.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ^b^uppajjati abyāpādavitakko...pe0... avihiṃsāvitakko^eb^ti ettha yo so imāya heṭṭhā ^a^V1.0397^ea^ vuttataruṇavipassanāya saddhiṃ uppannavitakko kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhena ^b^nekkhammavitakko^eb^ti vutto. soyeva byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena ^b^abyāpādavitakko^eb^ti ca vihiṃsāpaccanīkaṭṭhena ^b^avihiṃsāvitakko^eb^ti ca vutto.

[03] ettāvatā bodhisattassa samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanāpaṭṭhapanakālo kathito. yassa hi samādhipi taruṇo, vipassanāpi. tassa vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aticiraṃ nisinnassa kāyo kilamati, anto aggi viya uṭṭhahati, kacchehi sedā muccanti, matthakato usumavaṭṭi viya uṭṭhahati, cittaṃ haññati vihaññati vipphandati. so puna samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ paridametvā mudukaṃ katvā samassāsetvā puna vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti. tassa puna aticiraṃ nisinnassa tatheva hoti. so puna samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tatheva karoti. vipassanāya hi bahūpakārā samāpatti.

[03] yathā yodhassa phalakakoṭṭhako nāma bahūpakāro hoti, so taṃ nissāya saṅgāmaṃ pavisati, tattha hatthīhipi assehipi yodhehipi saddhiṃ kammaṃ katvā āvudhesu vā khīṇesu bhuñjitukāmatādibhāve ^a^P2.0084^ea^ vā sati nivattitvā phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā āvudhānipi gaṇhāti, vissamatipi, bhuñjatipi, pānīyampi pivati, sannāhampi paṭisannayhati, taṃ taṃ katvā puna saṅgāmaṃ pavisati, tattha kammaṃ katvā puna uccārādipīḷito vā kenacideva vā karaṇīyena phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisati. tattha santhambhitvā puna ^a^M1.0388^ea^ saṅgāmaṃ pavisati, evaṃ yodhassa phalakakoṭṭhako viya vipassanāya bahūpakārā samāpatti.

[03] samāpattiyā pana saṅgāmanittharaṇakayodhassa phalakakoṭṭhakatopi vipassanā bahūpakāratarā. kiñcāpi hi samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti, vipassanā pana thāmajātā samāpattimpi rakkhati. thāmajātaṃ karoti.

[03] yathā hi thale nāvampi nāvāya bhaṇḍampi sakaṭabhāraṃ karonti. udakaṃ patvā pana sakaṭampi sakaṭabhaṇḍampi yuttagoṇepi nāvābhāraṃ karonti. nāvā tiriyaṃ sotaṃ chinditvā sotthinā supaṭṭanaṃ gacchati, evamevaṃ kiñcāpi samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti, vipassanā ^a^V1.0398^ea^ pana thāmajātā samāpattimpi rakkhati, thāmajātaṃ karoti. thalaṃ patvā sakaṭaṃ viya hi samāpatti. udakaṃ patvā nāvā viya vipassanā. iti bodhisattassa ettāvatā samāpattiṃ nissāya vipassanāpaṭṭhapanakālo kathitoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yaññadevā^eb^tiādi kaṇhapakkhe vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ, idhāpi atthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gāmantasambhatesū^eb^ti gāmantaṃ āhaṭesu. ^b^satikaraṇīyameva hotī^eb^ti ^b^etā gāvo^eb^ti satiuppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ hoti. ito cito ca gantvā ākoṭanādikiccaṃ natthi. ^b^ete dhammā^eb^ti ete samathavipassanā dhammāti satuppādanamattameva kātabbaṃ hoti. iminā bodhisattassa samathavipassanānaṃ thāmajātakālo kathito. tadā kirassa samāpattiṃ appanatthāya nisinnassa aṭṭha samāpattiyo ekāvajjanena āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinno satta anupassanā ekappahāreneva āruḷho hoti.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ti idha kiṃ dasseti? ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi, sattānañhi hitūpacāraṃ attano satthubhāvasampadañca ^a^P2.0085^ea^ dassento bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^araññe^eb^ti aṭaviyaṃ. ^b^pavane^eb^ti vanasaṇḍe. atthato hi idaṃ dvayaṃ ekameva, paṭhamassa pana dutiyaṃ vevacanaṃ. ^b^ayogakkhemakāmo^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ anicchanto bhayameva icchanto ^a^M1.0389^ea^. ^b^sovatthiko^eb^ti suvatthibhāvāvaho. ^b^pītigamanīyo^eb^ti tuṭṭhiṃ gamanīyo. ``pītagamanīyo''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^pidaheyyā^eb^ti sākhādīhi thakeyya. ^b^vivareyyā^eb^ti visadamukhaṃ katvā vivaṭaṃ kareyya. ^b^kummagga^eb^nti udakavanapabbatādīhi sanniruddhaṃ amaggaṃ. ^b^odaheyya okacara^eb^nti tesaṃ oke caramānaṃ viya ekaṃ dīpakamigaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapeyya. ^b^okacārika^eb^nti dīgharajjuyā bandhitaṃyeva migiṃ.

[03] migaluddako hi araññaṃ migānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ``idha vasanti, iminā maggena nikkhamanti, ettha caranti, ettha pivanti, iminā maggena pavisantī''ti sallakkhetvā maggaṃ pidhāya kummaggaṃ vivaritvā okacarañca okacārikañca ṭhapetvā sayaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne sattiṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati. atha sāyanhasamaye migā akutobhaye araññe caritvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā migapotakehi saddhiṃ kīḷamānā vasanaṭṭhānasantikaṃ āgantvā okacarañca okacārikañca disvā ^a^V1.0399^ea^ ``sahāyakā no āgatā bhavissantī''ti nirāsaṅkā pavisanti, te maggaṃ pihitaṃ disvā ``nāyaṃ maggo, ayaṃ maggo bhavissatī''ti kummaggaṃ paṭipajjanti. migaluddako na tāva kiñci karoti, paviṭṭhesu pana sabbapacchimaṃ saṇikaṃ paharati. so uttasati, tato sabbe uttasitvā ``bhayaṃ uppanna''nti purato olokentā udakena vā vanena vā pabbatena vā sanniruddhaṃ maggaṃ disvā ubhohi passehi aṅgulisaṅkhalikaṃ viya gahanavanaṃ pavisituṃ asakkontā paviṭṭhamaggeneva nikkhamituṃ ārabhanti. luddako tesaṃ nivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ādito paṭṭhāya tiṃsampi cattālīsampi mige ghāteti. idaṃ sandhāya ^b^evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahāmigasaṅgho aparena samayena anayabyasanaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ``nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, avijjāyetaṃ adhivacana''nti ettha yasmā ime sattā avijjāya aññāṇā hutvā nandīrāgena ābandhitvā rūpārammaṇādīni upanītā vaṭṭadukkhasattiyā ^a^P2.0086^ea^ ghātaṃ labhanti. tasmā bhagavā okacaraṃ nandīrāgoti, okacārikaṃ avijjāti katvā dassesi.

[03] migaluddako hi ekadāpi tesaṃ sākhābhaṅgena sarīraṃ puñchitvā manussagandhaṃ apanetvā okacaraṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā okacārikaṃ saha rajjuyā vissajjetvā attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā sattiṃ ādāya okacarassa santike tiṭṭhati, okacārikā migagaṇassa caraṇaṭṭhānābhimukhī gacchati ^a^M1.0390^ea^. taṃ disvā migā sīsāni ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhanti, sāpi sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā tiṭṭhati, te ``amhākaṃ samajātikā aya''nti gocaraṃ gaṇhanti. sāpi tiṇāni khādantī viya saṇikaṃ upagacchati. āraññiko yūthapatimigo tassā vātaṃ labhitvā sakabhariyaṃ vissajjetvā tadabhimukho hoti.

[03] sattānañhi navanavameva piyaṃ hoti. okacārikā āraññikassa migassa accāsannabhāvaṃ adatvā tadabhimukhīva pacchato paṭikkamitvā okacarassa santikaṃ gacchati, yattha yatthassā rajju laggati, tattha tattha khurena paharitvā moceti, āraññiko migo okacaraṃ disvā okacārikāya sammatto hutvā okacare usūyaṃ katvā piṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā sīsaṃ kampento tiṭṭhati, tasmiṃ khaṇe sattiṃ jivhāya lehantopi ``kiṃ eta''nti na jānāti, okacaropi ^a^V1.0400^ea^ sacassa uparibhāgena taṃ migaṃ paharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti, piṭṭhiṃ nāmeti. sacassa heṭṭhābhāgena paharituṃ sukhaṃ hoti, hadayaṃ unnāmeti. atha luddako āraññikaṃ migaṃ sattiyā paharitvā tattheva ghātetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya gacchati. evameva yathā so migo okacārikāya sammatto okacare usūyaṃ katvā sattiṃ jivhāya lehantopi kiñci na jānāti, tathā ime sattā avijjāya sammattā andhabhūtā kiñci ajānantā rūpādīsu nandīrāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭadukkhasattiyā vadhaṃ labhantīti bhagavā okacaraṃ nandīrāgoti, okacārikaṃ avijjāti katvā dassesi.

[03] ^b^iti kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭo mayā khemo maggo^eb^ti iti kho, bhikkhave, mayā imesaṃ sattānaṃ hitacaraṇena sammāsambodhiṃ patvā ahaṃ buddhosmīti tuṇhībhūtena anisīditvā dhammacakkappavattanato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ desentena vivaṭo khemo ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, pihito kummaggo ^a^P2.0087^ea^, aññātakoṇḍaññādīnaṃ bhabbapuggalānaṃ ūhato okacaro nandīrāgo dvedhā chetvā pātito, nāsitā okacārikā avijjā sabbena sabbaṃ samugghātitāti attano hitūpacāraṃ dassesi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.

[06] dvedhāvitakkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0391^ea^ ^a^V1.0401^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^adhicittamanuyuttenā^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathavasena uppannaṃ cittaṃ cittameva, vipassanāpādakāṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ tato cittato adhikaṃ cittanti ^b^adhicittaṃ. anuyuttenā^eb^ti taṃ adhicittaṃ anuyuttena, tattha yuttappayuttenāti attho.

[03] tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto nisīdanaṃ ādāya asukasmiṃ rukkhamūle vā vanasaṇḍe vā pabbatapāde vā pabbhāre vā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmīti nikkhamantopi, tattha gantvā hatthehi vā pādehi vā nisajjaṭṭhānato tiṇapaṇṇāni apanentopi adhicittaṃ anuyuttoyeva. nisīditvā pana hatthapāde dhovitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantopi adhicittaṃ anuyuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^nimittānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^kālena kāla^eb^nti samaye samaye. na nu ca kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma muhuttampi achaḍḍetvā nirantaraṃ manasikātabbaṃ, kasmā bhagavā ``kālena kāla''nti āhāti. pāḷiyañhi aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni vibhattāni, tesu bhikkhunā attano cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnena yāva kocideva upakkileso nuppajjati, tāva imesaṃ nimittānaṃ manasikārakiccaṃ natthi. yadā pana uppajjati, tadā imāni gahetvā citte uppannaṃ abbudaṃ nīharitabbanti dassento evamāha.

[03] ^b^chandūpasaṃhitā^eb^ti chandasahagatā rāgasampayuttā. imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ vitakkānaṃ khettañca ārammaṇañca jānitabbaṃ. tattha chandūpasañhitānaṃ aṭṭha ^a^P2.0088^ea^ lobhasahagatacittāni khettaṃ, dosūpasañhitānaṃ dve domanassasahagatāni, mohūpasañhitānaṃ dvādasapi akusalacittāni. vicikicchāuddhaccasampayuttacittāni pana dve etesaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ khettaṃ. sabbesampi sattā ceva saṅkhārā ca ārammaṇaṃ, iṭṭhāniṭṭhāsamapekkhitesu hi sattesu ca saṅkhāresu ca te uppajjanti ^a^V1.0402^ea^. ^b^aññampi nimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ kusalūpasaṃhita^eb^nti tato nimittato aññaṃ kusalanissitaṃ nimittaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. tattha ^b^aññaṃ nimittaṃ^eb^ nāma chandūpasañhite vitakke sattesu uppanne asubhabhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma. saṅkhāresu uppanne aniccamanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ ^a^M1.0392^ea^ nāma. dosūpasañhite sattesu uppanne mettābhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma. saṅkhāresu uppanne dhātumanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma. mohūpasañhite yattha katthaci uppanne pañcadhammūpanissayo aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma.

[03] imassa hatthā vā sobhanā pādā vātiādinā nayena hi sattesu lobhe uppanne asubhato upasaṃharitabbaṃ. kimhi sārattosi? kesesu sārattosi. lomesu...pe0... muttesu sārattosi. ayaṃ attabhāvo nāma tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussāpito, navahi nhārusatehi ābaddho, navahi maṃsapesisatehi anulitto, allacammena pariyonaddho, chavirāgena paṭicchanno, navahi vaṇamukhehi navanavutilomakūpasahassehi ca asuci paggharati, kuṇapapūrito, duggandho, jeguccho, paṭikūlo, dvattiṃsakuṇapasañcayo, natthettha sāraṃ vā varaṃ vāti evaṃ asubhato upasaṃharantassa sattesu uppanno lobho pahīyati, tenassa asubhato upasaṃharaṇaṃ aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.

[03] pattacīvarādīsu saṅkhāresu lobhe uppanne dvīhākārehi saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena assāmikatāvakālikabhāvavasena manasikaroto so pahīyati. tenassa aniccato manasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti. sattesu dose uppanne pana āghātavinayakakacopamovādādīnaṃ vasena mettā bhāvetabbā, taṃ bhāvayato doso pahīyati, tenassa mettābhāvanā aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti. khāṇukaṇṭakatiṇapaṇṇādīsu ^a^P2.0089^ea^ pana dose uppanne tvaṃ kassa kuppasi, kiṃ pathavīdhātuyā, udāhu āpodhātuyā, ko vā panāyaṃ kuppati nāma, kiṃ pathavīdhātu udāhu āpodhātūtiādinā nayena dhātumanasikāraṃ karontassa doso pahīyati. tenassa dhātumanasikāro aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.
[03] mohe pana yattha katthaci uppanne --
[21] ``garūsaṃvāso ^a^V1.0403^ea^ uddeso, uddiṭṭhaparipucchanaṃ.
[27] kālena dhammassavanaṃ, ṭhānāṭṭhānavinicchayo.
[22] pañca dhammūpanissāya, mohadhātu pahīyatī''ti.. --

[25] ime ^a^M1.0393^ea^ pañca dhammā upanissitabbā. garuṃ upanissāya viharanto hi bhikkhu -- ``ācariyo gāmappavesanaṃ anāpucchantassa pattakāle vattaṃ akarontassa ghaṭasataudakāharaṇādidaṇḍakammaṃ karotī''ti yattappaṭiyatto hoti, athassa moho pahīyati. uddesaṃ gaṇhantopi -- ``ācariyo uddesakāle uddesaṃ aggaṇhantassa asādhukaṃ sajjhāyantassa ca daṇḍakammaṃ karotī''ti yattappaṭiyatto hoti, evampissa moho pahīyati. garubhāvanīye bhikkhū upasaṃkamitvā ``idaṃ bhante kathaṃ imassa ko attho''ti paripucchanto kaṃkhaṃ vinodeti, evampissa moho pahīyati. kālena dhammasavanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassāpi tesu tesu ṭhānesu attho pākaṭo hoti. evampissa moho pahīyati. idamassa kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ na kāraṇanti ṭhānāṭṭhānavinicchaye cheko hoti, evampissa moho pahīyati. tenassa pañcadhammūpanissayo aññaṃ nimittaṃ nāma hoti.

[03] apica aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yaṃkiñci bhāventassāpi ime vitakkā pahīyanti eva. imāni pana nimittāni ujuvipaccanīkāni paṭipakkhabhūtāni. imehi pahīnā rāgādayo suppahīnā honti. yathā hi aggiṃ allakaṭṭhehipi paṃsūhipi sākhādīhipi pothetvā nibbāpentiyeva, udakaṃ pana aggissa ujuvipaccanīkaṃ, tena nibbuto sunibbuto hoti, evamimehi nimittehi pahīnā rāgādayo suppahīnā honti. tasmā etāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^kusalūpasaṃhita^eb^nti ^a^P2.0090^ea^ kusalanissitaṃ kusalassa paccayabhūtaṃ. ^b^ajjhattamevā^eb^ti gocarajjhattaṃyeva. ^b^palagaṇḍo^eb^ti vaḍḍhakī. ^b^sukhumāya āṇiyā^eb^ti yaṃ āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo hoti, tato sukhumatarāya sāradāruāṇiyā. ^b^oḷārikaṃ āṇi^eb^nti candaphalake vā sāraphalake vā ākoṭitaṃ visamāṇiṃ. ^b^abhinihaneyyā^eb^ti muggarena ākoṭento haneyya. ^b^abhinīhareyyā^eb^ti evaṃ abhinihananto phalakato nīhareyya. ^b^abhinivaseyyā^eb^ti idāni bahu nikkhantāti ñatvā hatthena cāletvā ^a^V1.0404^ea^ nikkaḍḍheyya ^a^M1.0394^ea^. tattha phalakaṃ viya cittaṃ, phalake visamāṇī viya akusalavitakkā, sukhumāṇī viya aññaṃ asubhabhāvanādikusalanimittaṃ, sukhumāṇiyā oḷārikāṇinīharaṇaṃ viya asubhabhāvanādīhi kusalanimittehi tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ nīharaṇaṃ.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ^b^ahikuṇapenā^eb^tiādi atijegucchapaṭikūlakuṇapadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^kaṇṭhe āsattenā^eb^ti kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena paṭimukkena. ^b^aṭṭiyeyyā^eb^ti aṭṭo dukkhito bhaveyya. ^b^harāyeyyā^eb^ti lajjeyya. ^b^jiguccheyyā^eb^ti sañjātajiguccho bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^pahīyantī^eb^ti evaṃ imināpi kāraṇena ete akusalā dhammā sāvajjā dukkhavipākāti attano paññābalena upaparikkhato ahikuṇapādīni viya jigucchantassa pahīyanti. yo pana attano paññābalena upaparikkhituṃ na sakkoti, tena ācariyaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ saṅghattheraṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā bhikkhusaṅghameva vā sannipātetvā ārocetabbaṃ, bahunañhi sannipāte bhavissateva eko paṇḍitamanusso, svāyaṃ evaṃ etesu ādīnavo daṭṭhabboti kathessati, kāyavicchindanīyakathādīhi vā pana te vitakke niggaṇhissatīti.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^asatiamanasikāro āpajjitabbo^eb^ti neva so vitakko saritabbo na manasikātabbo, aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. yathā hi rūpaṃ apassitukāmo puriso akkhīni nimīleyya, evameva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnena bhikkhunā cittamhi ^a^P2.0091^ea^ vitakke uppanne aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. evamassa so vitakko pahīyati, tasmiṃ pahīne puna kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ.

[03] sace na pahīyati, uggahito dhammakathāpabandho hoti, so mahāsaddena sajjhāyitabbo. evampi ce aññavihitakassa sato so na pahīyati. thavikāya muṭṭhipotthako hoti, yattha ca buddhavaṇṇāpi dhammavaṇṇāpi likhitā honti, taṃ nīharitvā vācentena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. evampi ce na pahīyati, thavikato araṇisahitāni nīharitvā ``ayaṃ ^a^M1.0395^ea^ uttarāraṇī ayaṃ adharāraṇī''ti āvajjentena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. evampi ce na pahīyati, sipāṭikaṃ ^a^V1.0405^ea^ nīharitvā ``idaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ nāma, ayaṃ pipphalako nāma, idaṃ nakhacchedanaṃ nāma, ayaṃ sūci nāmā''ti parikkhāraṃ samannānentena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. evampi ce na pahīyati, sūciṃ gahetvā cīvare jiṇṇaṭṭhānaṃ sibbantena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. evaṃ yāva na pahīyati, tāva taṃ taṃ kusalakammaṃ karontena aññavihitakena bhavitabbaṃ. pahīne puna mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisīditabbaṃ, navakammaṃ pana na paṭṭhapetabbaṃ. kasmā? vitakke pacchinne kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa okāso na hoti.

[03] porāṇakapaṇḍitā pana navakammaṃ katvāpi vitakkaṃ pacchindiṃsu. tatridaṃ vatthu -- tissasāmaṇerassa kira upajjhāyo tissamahāvihāre vasati. tissasāmaṇero ``bhante ukkaṇṭhitomhī''ti āha. atha naṃ thero ``imasmiṃ vihāre nhānaudakaṃ dullabhaṃ, maṃ gahetvā cittalapabbataṃ gacchāhī''ti āha. so tathā akāsi. tattha naṃ thero āha ``ayaṃ vihāro accantasaṅghiko, ekaṃ puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ karohī''ti. so sādhu bhanteti ādito paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyaṃ pabbhārasodhanaṃ tejodhātukasiṇaparikammanti tīṇīpi ekato ārabhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpesi, ^b^saṃyuttanikāyaṃ^eb^ pariyosāpesi, leṇakammaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, sabbaṃ katvā upajjhāyassa saññaṃ adāsi. upajjhāyo ``dukkhena te sāmaṇera kataṃ, ajja tāva tvaṃyeva vasāhī''ti āha. so taṃ rattiṃ leṇe vasanto utusappāyaṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ ^a^P2.0092^ea^ patvā tattheva parinibbāyi. tassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ akaṃsu. ajjāpi ^b^tissattheracetiya^eb^nti paññāyati. idaṃ pabbaṃ asatipabbaṃ nāma.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ imasmiṃ ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhituṃ asakkonto idha ṭhatvā niggaṇhissatīti vitakkamūlabhedaṃ pabbaṃ dassento puna ^b^tassa ce bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ manasikātabba^eb^nti saṅkharotīti ^b^saṅkhāro,^eb^ paccayo, kāraṇaṃ mūlanti attho. santiṭṭhati etthāti ^b^saṇṭhānaṃ,^eb^ vitakkasaṅkhārassa saṇṭhānaṃ ^b^vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ manasikātabbanti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, ayaṃ vitakko kiṃ hetu kiṃ paccayā kiṃ kāraṇā uppannoti vitakkānaṃ mūlañca mūlamūlañca manasikātabbanti. ^b^kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ sīghaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0396^ea^ ^b^gacchāmī^eb^ti kena nu kho kāraṇena ahaṃ sīghaṃ gacchāmi? ^b^yaṃnūnāhaṃ saṇikaṃ gaccheyya^eb^nti kiṃ me iminā sīghagamanena, saṇikaṃ gacchissāmīti ^a^V1.0406^ea^ cintesi. ^b^so saṇikaṃ gaccheyyā^eb^ti so evaṃ cintetvā saṇikaṃ gaccheyya. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] tattha tassa purisassa sīghagamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno vitakkasamāruḷhakālo. tassa saṇikagamanakālo viya imassa vitakkacārapacchedanakālo. tassa ṭhitakālo viya imassa vitakkacāre pacchinne mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ cittotaraṇakālo. tassa nisinnakālo viya imassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappattakālo. tassa nipannakālo viya imassa nibbānārammaṇāya phalasamāpattiyā divasaṃ vītivattanakālo. tattha ime vitakkā kiṃ hetukā kiṃ paccayāti vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassa vitakkacāro sithilo hoti. tasmiṃ sithilībhūte matthakaṃ gacchante vitakkā sabbaso nirujjhanti. ayamattho duddubhajātakenapi dīpetabbo --

[03] sasakassa kira beluvarukkhamūle niddāyantassa beluvapakkaṃ vaṇṭato chijjitvā kaṇṇamūle patitaṃ. so tassa saddena ``pathavī bhijjatī''ti saññāya uṭṭhahitvā vegena palāyi. taṃ disvā purato aññepi catuppadā palāyiṃsu. tadā bodhisatto sīho hoti. so cintesi -- ``ayaṃ pathavī nāma kappavināse bhijjati, antarā pathavībhedo nāma natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ ^a^P2.0093^ea^ mūlamūlaṃ gantvā anuvijjeyya''nti. so hatthināgato paṭṭhāya yāva sasakaṃ pucchi ``tayā, tāta, pathavī bhijjamānā diṭṭhā''ti. saso ``āma devā''ti āha. sīho ``ehi, bho, dassehī''ti. saso ``na sakkomi sāmī''ti. ``ehi, re, mā bhāyī''ti saṇhamudukena gahetvā gato saso rukkhassa avidūre ṭhatvā --
[21] ``duddubhāyati bhaddante, yasmiṃ dese vasāmahaṃ.
[22] ahampetaṃ na jānāmi, kimetaṃ duddubhāyatī''ti.. (jā0 1.4.85) --

[25] gāthamāha. bodhisatto ``tvaṃ ettheva tiṭṭhā''ti rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā sasakassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ addasa, beluvapakkaṃ addasa, uddhaṃ oleketvā vaṇṭaṃ addasa, disvā ``ayaṃ saso ettha nipanno, niddāyamāno imassa kaṇṇamūle ^a^M1.0397^ea^ patitassa saddena `pathavī bhijjatī'ti evaṃsaññī hutvā palāyī''ti ^a^V1.0407^ea^ ñatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sasaṃ pucchi. saso ``āma, devā''ti āha. bodhisatto imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``beluva patitaṃ sutvā, duddubhanti saso javi.
[22] sasassa vacanaṃ sutvā, santattā migavāhinī''ti.. (jā0 1.4.86).
[03] tato bodhisatto ``mā bhāyathā''ti migagaṇe assāsesi. evaṃ vitakkānaṃ mūlamūlaṃ gacchantassa vitakkā pahīyanti.
[03] 220^b^.^eb^ imasmiṃ vitakkamūlabhedapabbe ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhituṃ asakkontena pana evaṃ niggaṇhitabbāti aparampi kāraṇaṃ dassento puna ^b^tassa ce, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^dantebhidantamādhāyā^eb^ti heṭṭhādante uparidantaṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^cetasā citta^eb^nti kusalacittena akusalacittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitabbaṃ. ^b^balavā puriso^eb^ti yathā thāmasampanno mahābalo puriso dubbalaṃ purisaṃ sīse vā gale vā khandhe vā gahetvā abhiniggaṇheyya abhinippīḷeyya abhisantāpeyya santattaṃ kilantaṃ mucchāparetaṃ viya kareyya, evameva bhikkhunā vitakkehi saddhiṃ paṭimallena hutvā ``ke ca tumhe ko cāha''nti abhibhavitvā -- ``kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita''nti (a0 ni0 2.5) evaṃ mahāvīriyaṃ ^a^P2.0094^ea^ paggayha vitakkā niggaṇhitabbāti dassento ima atthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āhari.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ^b^yato kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti idaṃ pariyādānabhājaniyaṃ nāma, taṃ uttānatthameva. yathā pana satthācariyo tiroraṭṭhā āgataṃ rājaputtaṃ pañcāvudhasippaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā ``gaccha, attano raṭṭhe rajjaṃ gaṇha. sace te antarāmagge corā uṭṭhahanti, dhanunā kammaṃ katvā gaccha. sace te dhanu nassati vā bhijjati vā sattiyā asinā''ti evaṃ pañcahipi āvudhehi kattabbaṃ dassetvā uyyojeti. so tathā katvā sakaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā rajjasiriṃ anubhoti. evamevaṃ bhagavā adhicittamanuyuttaṃ bhikkhuṃ arahattagahaṇatthāya uyyojento -- ``sacassa antarā akusalavitakkā uppajjanti, aññanimittapabbe ṭhatvā te niggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0398^ea^ ^a^V1.0408^ea^ pāpuṇissati. tattha asakkonto ādīnavapabbe ṭhatvā, tatrāpi asakkonto asatipabbe ṭhatvā, tatrāpi asakkonto vitakkamūlabhedapabbe ṭhatvā, tatrāpi asakkonto abhiniggaṇhanapabbe ṭhatvā vitakke niggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī''ti imāni pañca pabbāni desesi.

[03] ^b^vasī vitakkapariyāyapathesū^eb^ti vitakkacārapathesu ciṇṇavasī paguṇavasīti vuccati. ^b^yaṃ vitakkaṃ ākaṅkhissatī^eb^ti idaṃ assa vasībhāvākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ayañhi pubbe yaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketukāmo hoti, taṃ na vitakketi. yaṃ na vitakketukāmo hoti, taṃ vitakketi. idāni pana vasībhūtattā yaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketukāmo hoti, taṃyeva vitakketi. yaṃ na vitakketukāmo, na taṃ vitakketi. tena vuttaṃ ``yaṃ vitakkaṃ ākaṅkhissati, taṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkessati. yaṃ vitakkaṃ nākaṅkhissati, na taṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkhessatī''ti. ^b^acchecchi taṇha^eb^ntiādi ^b^sabbāsavasutte^eb^ vuttamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] mūlapaṇṇāsaṭṭhakathāya paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
[06].. namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa..
[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0095^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti kakacūpamasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^moḷiyaphagguno^eb^ti ^b^moḷī^eb^ti cūḷā vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``chetvāna moḷiṃ varagandhavāsitaṃ,
[27] vehāyasaṃ ukkhipi sakyapuṅgavo.
[26] ratanacaṅkoṭavarena vāsavo,
[22] sahassanetto sirasā paṭiggahī''ti..

[03] sā ^a^V2.0002^ea^ tassa gihikāle mahatī ahosi, tenassa ^b^moḷiyaphagguno^eb^ti saṅkhā udapādi. pabbajitampi naṃ teneva nāmena sañjānanti. ^b^ativela^eb^nti velaṃ atikkamitvā. tattha kālavelā, sīmavelā, sīlavelāti tividhā velā. ``tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī''ti (dhammapade vaggānamuddānaṃ, gāthānamuddānaṃ; mahāva0 1-3) ayaṃ kālavelā nāma. ``ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatī''ti (cūḷava0 384; udā0 45; a0 ni0 8.19) ayaṃ sīmavelā nāma. ``velāanatikkamo setughāto''ti (dha0 sa0 299-301) ca, ``velā cesā avītikkamanaṭṭhenā''ti ca, ayaṃ sīlavelā nāma. taṃ tividhampi so atikkamiyeva. bhikkhuniyo hi ovadituṃ kālo nāma atthi, so atthaṅgatepi sūriye ^a^M2.0002^ea^ ovadanto taṃ kālavelampi atikkami. bhikkhunīnaṃ ovāde pamāṇaṃ nāma atthi sīmā mariyādā. so uttarichappañcavācāhi ovadanto taṃ sīmavelampi atikkami. kathento pana davasahagataṃ katvā duṭṭhullāpattipahonakaṃ katheti, evaṃ sīlavelampi atikkami.

[03] ^b^saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti missībhūto samānasukhadukkho hutvā. ^b^sammukhā^eb^ti purato. ^b^avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti tā pana pacanakoṭṭanādīni karontiyo disvā natthi imāsaṃ anāpatti nāma, imā bhikkhuniyo anācārā dubbacā pagabbhāti aguṇaṃ katheti. ^b^adhikaraṇampi karotī^eb^ti imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imā bhikkhuniyo diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya akkhīni dayhanti, imasmiṃ vihāre pupphapūjā vā āsanadhovanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇādīni vā imāsaṃ vasena vattanti. kuladhītaro etā lajjiniyo ^a^P2.0096^ea^, tumhe imā idañcidañca vadatha, ayaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ āpatti hoti, vinayadharānaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā vinicchayaṃ me dethāti adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhati.

[03] ^b^moḷiyaphaggunassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti natthi imassa bhikkhuno anāpatti nāma. niccakālaṃ imassa pariveṇadvāraṃ asuññaṃ bhikkhunīhīti aguṇaṃ katheti. ^b^adhikaraṇampi karontī^eb^ti imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ moḷiyaphaggunattherassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya akkhīni dayhanti. imasmiṃ vihāre aññesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ oloketumpi na sakkā. vihāraṃ āgatabhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ vā paṭisanthāraṃ vā uddesapadaṃ vā therameva nissāya labhanti, kulaputtako lajjī kukkuccako, evarūpaṃ nāma tumhe idañcidañca vadatha, etha vinayadharānaṃ santike vinicchayaṃ dethāti adhikaraṇaṃ ākaḍḍhanti.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^V2.0003^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena, atthakāmatāya avoca. ekaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``imassa bhikkhussa evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato ayaso uppajjissati. so sāsanassāpi avaṇṇoyeva. aññena pana kathito ayaṃ na oramissati, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desetvā ovadito oramissatī''ti tassa atthakāmatāya bhagavantaṃ etaṃ, ``āyasmā, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ^b^āmantehī^eb^ti jānāpehi. ^b^āmantetī^eb^ti pakkosati.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0003^ea^ saddhāya. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tvaṃ kulaputto ceva saddhāpabbajito ca, yasmā vā te etāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato ye tā akkosissanti vā, paharissanti vā, tesu domanassaṃ uppajjissati, saṃsagge pahīne nuppajjissati, tasmā. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ avaṇṇabhāsane. ^b^gehasitā^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇanissitā. ^b^chandā^eb^ti taṇhāchandāpi paṭighachandāpi. ^b^vipariṇata^eb^nti rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. duṭṭhampi, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. idha pana taṇhāchandavasena rattampi vaṭṭati, paṭighachandavasena duṭṭhampi vaṭṭati. ^b^hitānukampī^eb^ti hitena anukampamāno hitena pharamāno. ^b^na dosantaro^eb^ti na dosacitto bhavissāmi.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho bhagavā^eb^ti kasmā ārabhi? phaggunassa kira ettakaṃ ovādaṃ sutvāpi, ``bhikkhunisaṃsaggato oramissāmi ^a^P2.0097^ea^ viramissāmī''ti cittampi na uppannaṃ, bhagavatā pana saddhiṃ paṭāṇī viya paṭiviruddho aṭṭhāsi, athassa bhagavato yathā nāma jighacchitassa bhojane, pipāsitassa pānīye, sītena phuṭṭhassa uṇhe dukkhitassa sukhe patthanā uppajjati. evameva imaṃ dubbacaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ subbacā bhikkhū āpāthaṃ āgamiṃsu. atha tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo hutvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha ^b^ārādhayiṃsū^eb^ti gaṇhiṃsu pūrayiṃsu. ^b^ekaṃ samaya^eb^nti ekasmiṃ samaye. ^b^ekāsanabhojana^eb^nti ekaṃ purebhattabhojanaṃ. sūriyuggamanato hi yāva majjhanhikā sattakkhattuṃ bhuttabhojanampi idha ekāsanabhojananteva adhippetaṃ. ^b^appābādhata^eb^nti nirābādhataṃ. ^b^appātaṅkata^eb^nti niddukkhataṃ. ^b^lahuṭṭhāna^eb^nti sarīrassa sallahukaṃ uṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^bala^eb^nti kāyabalaṃ. ^b^phāsuvihāra^eb^nti kāyassa ^a^V2.0004^ea^ sukhavihāraṃ. iminā kiṃ kathitaṃ? divā vikālabhojanaṃ pajahāpitakālo kathito. bhaddālisutte pana rattiṃ vikālabhojanaṃ pajahāpitakālo kathito. imāni hi dve bhojanāni bhagavā na ekappahārena pajahāpesi. kasmā? imāneva hi dve bhojanāni vaṭṭe sattānaṃ āciṇṇāni. santi kulaputtā sukhumālā, te ekato dvepi bhojanāni pajahantā kilamanti. tasmā ekato apajahāpetvā ekasmiṃ kāle divā vikālabhojanaṃ, ekasmiṃ rattiṃ vikālabhojananti visuṃ pajahāpesi. tesu idha divā vikālabhojanaṃ pajahāpitakālo kathito. tattha ^a^M2.0004^ea^ yasmā buddhā na bhayaṃ dassetvā tajjetvā pajahāpenti, ānisaṃsaṃ pana dassetvā pajahāpenti, evañhi sattā sukhena pajahanti. tasmā ānisaṃsaṃ dassento ime pañca guṇe dassesi. ^b^anusāsanī karaṇīyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ sāsane kattabbaṃ nāhosi. ``idaṃ karotha, idaṃ mā karothā''ti satuppādakaraṇīyamattameva ahosi. tāvattakeneva te kattabbaṃ akaṃsu, pahātabbaṃ pajahiṃsu, paṭhamabodhiyaṃ, bhikkhave, subbacā bhikkhū ahesuṃ assavā ovādapaṭikarāti.

[03] idāni nesaṃ subbacabhāvadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āharanto ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^subhūmiya^eb^nti samabhūmiyaṃ. ``subhūmyaṃ sukhette vihatakhāṇuke bījāni patiṭṭhapeyyā''ti ^a^P2.0098^ea^ (dī0 ni0 2.438) ettha pana maṇḍabhūmi subhūmīti āgatā. ^b^catumahāpathe^eb^ti dvinnaṃ mahāmaggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṭṭhāne. ^b^ājaññaratho^eb^ti vinītāssaratho. ^b^odhastapatodo^eb^ti yathā rathaṃ abhiruhitvā ṭhitena sakkā hoti gaṇhituṃ, evaṃ ālambanaṃ nissāya tiriyato ṭhapitapatodo. ^b^yoggācariyo^eb^ti assācariyo. sveva assadamme sāretīti ^b^assadammasārathi. yenicchaka^eb^nti yena yena maggena icchati. ^b^yadicchaka^eb^nti yaṃ yaṃ gatiṃ icchati. ^b^sāreyyā^eb^ti ujukaṃ purato peseyya. ^b^paccāsāreyyā^eb^ti paṭinivatteyya.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti yathā hi so yoggācariyo yena yena maggena gamanaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ assā āruḷhāva honti. yāya yāya ca gatiyā icchati, sā sā gati gahitāva hoti. rathaṃ pesetvā assā neva vāretabbā na vijjhitabbā honti. kevalaṃ tesaṃ same bhūmibhāge khuresu nimittaṃ ṭhapetvā gamanameva passitabbaṃ hoti. evaṃ mayhampi tesu bhikkhūsu punappunaṃ vattabbaṃ nāhosi. idaṃ karotha idaṃ mā karothāti satuppādanamattameva kattabbaṃ hoti. tehipi tāvadeva kattabbaṃ katameva hoti, akattabbaṃ jahitameva. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā subbacā yuttayānapaṭibhāgā ^a^V2.0005^ea^ hutvā satuppādanamatteneva pajahiṃsu, tasmā tumhepi pajahathāti attho. ^b^elaṇḍehī^eb^ti elaṇḍā kira sāladūsanā honti, tasmā evamāha. ^b^visodheyyā^eb^ti elaṇḍe ceva aññā ca valliyo chinditvā bahi nīharaṇena sodheyya. ^b^sujātā^eb^ti susaṇṭhitā. ^b^sammā parihareyyā^eb^ti mariyādaṃ bandhitvā udakāsiñcanenapi kālenakālaṃ mūlamūle ^a^M2.0005^ea^ khaṇanenapi valligumbādicchedanenapi kipillapūṭakaharaṇenapi makkaṭakajālasukkhadaṇḍakaharaṇenapi sammā vaḍḍhetvā poseyya. ^b^vuddhi^eb^ādīni vuttatthāneva.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ idāni akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassento ^b^bhūtapubba^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^vedehikā^eb^ti videharaṭṭhavāsikassa dhītā. atha vā ^b^vedo^eb^ti paññā vuccati, vedena īhati iriyatīti ^b^vedehikā,^eb^ paṇḍitāti attho. ^b^gahapatānī^eb^ti gharasāminī. ^b^kittisaddo^eb^ti kittighoso. ^b^soratā^eb^ti soraccena samannāgatā. ^b^nivātā^eb^ti nivātavutti. ^b^upasantā^eb^ti nibbutā. ^b^dakkhā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0099^ea^ bhattapacanasayanattharaṇadīpujjalanādikammesu chekā. ^b^analasā^eb^ti uṭṭhāhikā, ^b^susaṃvihitakammantā^eb^ti suṭṭhu saṃvihitakammantā. ekā analasā hoti, yaṃ yaṃ pana bhājanaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ taṃ bhindati vā chiddaṃ vā karoti, ayaṃ na tādisāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^divā uṭṭhāsī^eb^ti pātova kattabbāni dhenuduhanādikammāni akatvā ussūre uṭṭhitā. ^b^he je kāḷī^eb^ti are kāḷi. ^b^kiṃ je divā uṭṭhāsī^eb^ti kiṃ te kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi, kiṃ divā uṭṭhāsīti? ^b^no vata re kiñcī^eb^ti are yadi te na kiñci aphāsukaṃ atthi, neva sīsaṃ rujjhati, na piṭṭhi, atha kasmā pāpi dāsi divā uṭṭhāsīti kupitā anattamanā bhākuṭimakāsi. ^b^divātaraṃ uṭṭhāsī^eb^ti punadivase ussūrataraṃ uṭṭhāsi. ^b^anattamanavāca^eb^nti are pāpi dāsi attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi; kiṃ aggiṃ sītoti maññasi, idāni taṃ sikkhāpessāmītiādīni vadamānā kupitavacanaṃ nicchāresi.

[03] ^b^paṭivisakāna^eb^nti sāmantagehavāsīnaṃ. ^b^ujjhāpesī^eb^ti avajānāpesi. ^b^caṇḍī^eb^ti asoratā kibbisā. iti yattakā guṇā, tato diguṇā dosā uppajjiṃsu. guṇā nāma saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ āgacchanti; dosā ekadivaseneva patthaṭā honti. ^b^soratasorato^eb^ti ativiya sorato, sotāpanno ^a^V2.0006^ea^ nu kho, sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahā nu khoti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. ^b^phusantī^eb^ti phusantā ghaṭṭentā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.

[03] ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^M2.0006^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu soratoti veditabbo^eb^ti atha adhivāsanakkhantiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu soratoti veditabbo. ^b^yo cīvara...pe0... parikkhārahetū^eb^ti yo etāni cīvarādīni paṇītapaṇītāni labhanto pādaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammādīni ekavacaneneva karoti. ^b^alabhamāno^eb^ti yathā pubbe labhati, evaṃ alabhanto. ^b^dhammaññeva sakkaronto^eb^ti dhammaṃyeva sakkāraṃ sukatakāraṃ karonto. ^b^garuṃ karonto^eb^ti garubhāriyaṃ karonto. ^b^mānento^eb^ti manena piyaṃ karonto. ^b^pūjento^eb^ti paccayapūjāya pūjento. ^b^apacāyamāno^eb^ti dhammaṃyeva apacāyamāno apacitiṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassento.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ evaṃ akkhantiyā dosaṃ dassetvā idāni ye adhivāsenti, te evaṃ adhivāsentīti pañca vacanapathe dassento ^b^pañcime, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttapattakālena. ^b^bhūtenā^eb^ti satā vijjamānena. ^b^saṇhenā^eb^ti sammaṭṭhena ^a^P2.0100^ea^. ^b^atthasañhitenā^eb^ti atthanissitena kāraṇanissitena. ^b^akālenā^eb^tiādīni tesaṃyeva paṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. ^b^mettacittā^eb^ti uppannamettacittā hutvā. ^b^dosantarā^eb^ti duṭṭhacittā, abbhantare uppannadosā hutvā. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu vacanapathesu. ^b^pharitvā^eb^ti adhimuccitvā. ^b^tadārammaṇañcā^eb^ti kathaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ karoti? pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgataṃ puggalaṃ mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā puna tasseva mettacittassa avasesasatte ārammaṇaṃ karonto sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. ^b^tadārammaṇañcā^eb^ti tasseva mettacittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā. ^b^sabbāvanta^eb^nti sabbasattavantaṃ. ^b^loka^eb^nti sattalokaṃ. ^b^vipulenā^eb^ti anekasattārammaṇena. ^b^mahaggatenā^eb^ti mahaggatabhūmikena. ^b^appamāṇenā^eb^ti subhāvitena. ^b^averenā^eb^ti niddosena. ^b^abyābajjhenā^eb^ti niddukkhena. ^b^pharitvā viharissāmā^eb^ti evarūpena mettāsahagatena cetasā tañca puggalaṃ sabbañca lokaṃ tassa cittassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā adhimuccitvā viharissāma.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ idāni tadatthadīpikaṃ upamaṃ āharanto ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^apathavi^eb^nti nippathaviṃ karissāmīti attho. ^b^tatra tatrā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0007^ea^ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne. ^b^vikireyyā^eb^ti pacchiyā paṃsuṃ uddharitvā ^a^V2.0007^ea^ bījāni viya vikireyya. ^b^oṭṭhubheyyā^eb^ti kheḷaṃ pāteyya. ^b^apathaviṃ kareyyā^eb^ti evaṃ kāyena ca vācāya ca payogaṃ katvāpi sakkuṇeyya apathaviṃ kātunti? ^b^gambhīrā^eb^ti bahalattena dviyojanasatasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni gambhīrā. ^b^appameyyā^eb^ti tiriyaṃ pana aparicchinnā. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- pathavī viya hi mettacittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. kudālapiṭakaṃ gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo. yathā so kudālapiṭakena mahāpathaviṃ apathaviṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ dutiyaupamāyaṃ ^b^haliddi^eb^nti yaṃkiñci pītakavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^nīla^eb^nti kaṃsanīlaṃ vā palāsanīlaṃ vā. ^b^arūpī^eb^ti arūpo ^a^P2.0101^ea^. nanu ca, dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ seyyānaṃ vā dvinnaṃ selānaṃ vā antaraṃ paricchinnākāsarūpanti āgataṃ, kasmā idha ^b^arūpī^eb^ti vuttoti? sanidassanabhāvapaṭikkhepato. tenevāha ``anidassano''ti. tasmiñhi rūpaṃ likhituṃ, rūpapātubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkā, tasmā ``arūpī''ti vutto. ^b^anidassano^eb^ti dassanassa cakkhuviññāṇassa anāpātho. upamāsaṃsandane panettha ākāso viya mettacittaṃ. tulikapañcamā cattāro raṅgajātā viya pañca vacanapathā, tulikapañcame raṅge gahetvā āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo. yathā so tulikapañcamehi raṅgehi ākāse rūpapātubhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosuppattiṃ dassetuṃ na sakkhissatīti.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ tatiyaupamāyaṃ ^b^āditta^eb^nti pajjalitaṃ. ^b^gambhīrā appameyyā^eb^ti imissā gaṅgāya gambhīraṭṭhānaṃ gāvutampi atthi, aḍḍhayojanampi, yojanampi. puthulaṃ panassā evarūpaṃyeva, dīghato pana pañcayojanasatāni. sā kathaṃ gambhīrā appameyyāti? etena payogena parivattetvā uddhane udakaṃ viya tāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato. ṭhitodakaṃ pana kenaci upāyena aṅgulamattaṃ vā aḍḍhaṅgulamattaṃ vā evaṃ tāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya, ayaṃ pana na ^a^M2.0008^ea^ sakkā, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. upamāsaṃsandane panettha gaṅgā viya mettacittaṃ, tiṇukkaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo. yathā so ādittāya tiṇukkāya gaṅgaṃ tāpetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ ^a^V2.0008^ea^ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ catutthaupamāyaṃ ^b^biḷārabhastā^eb^ti biḷāracammapasibbakā. ^b^sumadditā^eb^ti suṭṭhu madditā. ^b^suparimadditā^eb^ti anto ca bahi ca samantato suparimadditā. ^b^tūlinī^eb^ti simbalitūlalatātūlasamānā. ^b^chinnasassarā^eb^ti chinnasassarasaddā. ^b^chinnabhabbharā^eb^ti chinnabhabbharasaddā. upamāsaṃsandane panettha biḷārabhastā viya mettacittaṃ, kaṭṭhakaṭhalaṃ ādāya āgatapuriso viya pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo. yathā so kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā ^a^P2.0102^ea^ biḷārabhastaṃ sarasaraṃ bharabharaṃ saddaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ vo pañca vacanapathe gahetvā āgatapuggalo mettacittassa aññathattaṃ katvā dosānugatabhāvaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatīti.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ^b^ocarakā^eb^ti avacarakā heṭṭhācarakā, nīcakammakārakāti attho. ^b^yo mano padūseyyā^eb^ti yo bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mano padūseyya, taṃ kakacena okantanaṃ nādhivāseyya. ^b^na me so tena sāsanakaro^eb^ti so tena anadhivāsanena mayhaṃ ovādakaro na hoti. āpatti panettha natthi.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ^b^aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā^eb^ti appasāvajjaṃ vā mahāsāvajjaṃ vā. ^b^yaṃ tumhe nādhivāseyyāthā^eb^ti yo tumhehi adhivāsetabbo na bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^no hetaṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, anadhivāsetabbaṃ nāma vacanapathaṃ na passāmāti adhippāyo. ^b^dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā^eb^ti iti bhagavā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] kakacūpamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0009^ea^ ^a^M2.0009^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti alagaddūpamasuttaṃ. tattha gaddhe bādhayiṃsūti gaddhabādhino, gaddhabādhino pubbapurisā assāti gaddhabādhipubbo, tassa ^b^gaddhabādhipubbassa,^eb^ gijjhaghātakakulappasutassāti attho. saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyaṃ karontīti ^b^antarāyikā^eb^. te kammakilesavipākaupavādāaṇāvītikkamavasena pañcavidhā. tattha pañcānantariyadhammā kammantarāyikā nāma. tathā bhikkhunīdūsakakammaṃ, taṃ pana mokkhasseva antarāyaṃ karoti, na saggassa. niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammā kilesantarāyikā nāma. paṇḍakatiracchānagataubhatobyañjanakānaṃ paṭisandhidhammā vipākantarāyikā nāma. ariyūpavādadhammā upavādantarāyikā nāma, te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti, tāvadeva, na tato paraṃ. sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā āṇāvītikkamantarāyikā nāma. tepi yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā paṭijānāti, na vuṭṭhāti vā, na deseti vā, tāvadeva, na tato paraṃ.

[03] tatrāyaṃ ^a^P2.0103^ea^ bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti, vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti, tasmā rahogato evaṃ cintesi -- ime āgārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti. bhikkhūpi manāpikāni cakkhuviññeyyāni rūpāni passanti...pe0... kāyaviññeyye phoṭṭhabbe phusanti, mudukāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni paribhuñjanti, etaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. kasmā itthīnaṃyeva rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā na vaṭṭanti? etepi vaṭṭantīti. evaṃ rasena rasaṃ saṃsandetvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ upanento viya, sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruṃ upasaṃharanto viya, pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā, ``kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, natthi ettha doso''ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto methunadhamme doso natthīti jinassa āṇācakke pahāraṃ adāsi. tenāha -- ``tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī''tiādi.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0010^ea^ ^a^M2.0010^ea^ ^b^byā kho^eb^ti evaṃ viya kho. ^b^samanuyuñjantī^eb^tiādīsu kiṃ laddhiko tvaṃ, laddhiṃ vadehīti pucchamānā samanuyuñjanti nāma. diṭṭhiṃ patiṭṭhāpentā samanuggāhanti nāma. kena kāraṇena evaṃ vadasīti kāraṇaṃ pucchantā samanubhāsanti nāma. ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā^eb^tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.42-48) ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā^eb^ appassādaṭṭhena. ^b^maṃsapesūpamā^eb^ bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^tiṇukkūpamā^eb^ anudahanaṭṭhena. ^b^aṅgārakāsūpamā^eb^ mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena. ^b^supinakūpamā^eb^ ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^yācitakūpamā^eb^ tāvakālikaṭṭhena. ^b^rukkhaphalūpamā^eb^ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena. ^b^asisūnūpamā^eb^ adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena. ^b^sattisūlūpamā^eb^ vinivijjhanaṭṭhena. ^b^sappasirūpamā^eb^ sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena. ^b^thāmasā^eb^ti diṭṭhithāmena. ^b^parāmāsā^eb^ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena. ^b^abhinivissa voharatī^eb^ti adhiṭṭhahitvā voharati dīpeti vā.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ ^b^yato kho te bhikkhū^eb^ti yadā te bhikkhū. ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0104^ea^ ^b^byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā^eb^ti idaṃ esa attano ajjhāsayena natthīti vattukāmopi bhagavato ānubhāvena sampaṭicchati, buddhānaṃ kira sammukhā dve kathā kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ^b^kassa kho nāma tvaṃ moghapurisā^eb^ti tvaṃ moghapurisa kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessassa vā suddassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā devassa vā manussassa vā mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi. ^b^atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī^eb^ti ayaṃ pāṭiyekko anusandhi. ariṭṭho kira cintesi -- ``bhagavā maṃ moghapurisoti vadati, na kho pana moghapurisāti vuttamattakena maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo na hoti. upasenampi hi vaṅgantaputtaṃ, `atilahuṃ kho tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bāhullāya āvatto'ti (mahāva0 75) bhagavā moghapurisavādena ovadi. thero aparabhāge ghaṭento vāyamanto cha abhiññā sacchākāsi. ahampi tathārūpaṃ vīriyaṃ paggaṇhitvā maggaphalāni nibbattessāmī''ti. athassa bhagavā bandhanā pavuttassa paṇḍupalāsassa viya aviruḷhibhāvaṃ dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] ^b^usmīkatopī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0011^ea^, bhikkhave, tumhe kinti maññatha, ayaṃ ariṭṭho evaṃladdhiko sabbaññutaññāṇena paṭivirujjhitvā vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā tathāgatassa āṇācakke pahāraṃ dadamāno api nu imasmiṃ dhammavinaye usmīkatopi? yathā nibbutepi mahante aggikkhandhe ^a^V2.0011^ea^ khajjupanakamattāpi aggipapaṭikā hotiyeva, yaṃ nissāya puna mahāaggikkhandho bhaveyya. kiṃ nu kho evaṃ imassa appamattikāpi ñāṇusmā atthi, yaṃ nissāya vāyamanto maggaphalāni nibbatteyyāti? ^b^no hetaṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, evaṃladdhikassa kuto evarūpā ñāṇusmāti? maggaphalānaṃ paccayasamatthāya ñāṇusmāya usmīkatabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipantā vadanti. ^b^maṅkubhūto^eb^ti nittejabhūto. ^b^pattakkhandho^eb^ti patitakkhandho. ^b^appaṭibhāno^eb^ti kiñci paṭibhānaṃ apassanto bhinnapaṭibhāno evarūpampi nāma niyyānikasāsanaṃ labhitvā aviruḷhidhammo kiramhi samugghātitapaccayo jātoti attano abhabbataṃ paccavekkhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ khaṇamāno nisīdi.

[03] ^b^paññāyissasi^eb^ ^a^P2.0105^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi. ariṭṭho kira cintesi -- ``bhagavā mayhaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo pacchinnoti vadati, na kho pana buddhā saupanissayānaṃyeva dhammaṃ desenti, anupanissayānampi desenti, ahaṃ satthu santikā sugatovādaṃ labhitvā attano sampattūpagaṃ kusalaṃ karissāmī''ti. athassa bhagavā ovādaṃ paṭipassambhento ``paññāyissasī''tiādimāha. tassattho, tvaṃyeva, moghapurisa, iminā pāpakena diṭṭhigatena nirayādīsu paññāyissasi, mama santikā tuyhaṃ sugatovādo nāma natthi, na me tayā attho, idhāhaṃ bhikkhū paṭipucchissāmīti.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho bhagavā^eb^ti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi. imasmiñhi ṭhāne bhagavā parisaṃ sodheti, ariṭṭhaṃ gaṇato nissāreti. sace hi parisagatānaṃ kassaci evaṃ bhaveyya -- ``ayaṃ ariṭṭho bhagavatā akathitaṃ kathetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati, kacci nu kho parisamajjhe bhagavatā kathāya samāraddhāya sahasā kathita''nti. evaṃ kathitaṃ pana na ariṭṭhova suṇāti, aññenapi sutaṃ bhavissati. athāpissa siyā ``yathā satthā ariṭṭhaṃ niggaṇhāti, mampi evaṃ niggaṇheyyāti sutvāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ āpajjeyyā''ti. ``taṃ ^a^M2.0012^ea^ sabbaṃ na karissantī''ti. mayāpi na kathitaṃ, aññena sutampi natthīti ``tumhepime, bhikkhave''tiādinā parisāya laddhiṃ sodheti. parisāya pana laddhisodhaneneva ariṭṭho gaṇato nissārito nāma hoti.

[03] idāni ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsento ^b^so vata, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^aññatreva kāmehī^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V2.0012^ea^ yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ``te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā''ti evaṃladdhiko, so vata kilesakāmehi ceva kilesakāmasampayuttehi saññāvitakkehi ca aññatra, ete dhamme pahāya, vinā etehi dhammehi, vatthukāme paṭisevissati, methunasamācāraṃ samācarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. idaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāma natthi, aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāsoti.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā ayaṃ ariṭṭho yathā nāma rajako sugandhānipi duggandhānipi jiṇṇānipi navānipi suddhānipi asuddhānipi vatthāni ekato bhaṇḍikaṃ karoti, evameva ^a^P2.0106^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ nicchandarāgapaṇītacīvarādiparibhogañca anibaddhasīlānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ antarāyakaraṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nibaddhasīlānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āvaraṇakaraṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogañca sabbaṃ ekasadisaṃ karotīti ariṭṭhassa laddhiṃ pakāsetvā idāni duggahitāya pariyattiyā dosaṃ dassento ^b^idha, bhikkhave, ekacce^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pariyāpuṇantī^eb^ti uggaṇhanti. ^b^sutta^eb^ntiādīsu ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakhandhakaparivārā, suttanipāte maṅgalasuttaratanasuttanālakasuātuvaṭṭakasuttāni, aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ ^b^sutta^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. sabbampi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ ^b^geyya^eb^nti veditabbaṃ, visesena saṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthāvaggo. sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ, taṃ ^b^veyyākaraṇa^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. dhammapadaṃ, theragāthā, therigāthā, suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca ^b^gāthā^eb^ti veditabbā. somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā dveasītisuttantā ^b^udāna^eb^nti veditabbā. ``vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā''tiādinayappavattā (itivu0 1,2) dasuttarasatasuttantā ^b^itivuttaka^eb^nti veditabbā. apaṇṇakajātakādīni paṇṇāsādhikāni pañcajātakasatāni ^b^jātaka^eb^nti veditabbāni. ``cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande''tiādinayappavattā (a0 ni0 4.129) sabbepi acchariyābbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttā ^a^M2.0013^ea^ suttantā ^b^abbhutadhamma^eb^nti veditabbā. cūḷavedallamahāvedallasammādiṭṭhisakkapañhasaṅkhārabhājaniyamahāpuṇṇamasuttādayo sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitasuttantā ^b^vedalla^eb^nti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^atthaṃ na upaparikkhantī^eb^ti atthatthaṃ kāraṇatthaṃ na passanti na pariggaṇhanti. ^b^anupaparikkhata^eb^nti anupaparikkhantānaṃ. ^b^na nijjhānaṃ khamantī^eb^ti na upaṭṭhahanti na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ samādhi vipassanā maggo phalaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti evaṃ jānituṃ ^a^V2.0013^ea^ na sakkā hontīti attho. ^b^te upārambhānisaṃsā cevā^eb^ti te paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā ^a^P2.0107^ea^ hutvā pariyāpuṇantīti attho. ^b^itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā cā^eb^ti evaṃ vādapamokkhānisaṃsā, parehi sakavāde dose āropite taṃ dosaṃ evaṃ mocessāmāti imināva kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti attho. ^b^tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontī^eb^ti yassa ca maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāya kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ ete duggahitaggāhino nānubhonti. apica parassa vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādaṃ mocetuṃ asakkontāpi tañca atthaṃ nānubhontiyeva.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ^b^alagaddatthiko^eb^ti āsivisātthiko. ^b^gado^eb^ti hi visassa nāmaṃ, taṃ tassa alaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ atthīti ^b^alagaddo. bhoge^eb^ti sarīre. ^b^idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantī^eb^ti nittharaṇapariyattivasena uggaṇhanti. tisso hi pariyattiyo alagaddapariyatti nittharaṇapariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.

[03] tattha yo buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā evaṃ cīvarādīni vā labhissāmi, catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantīti lābhasakkārahetu pariyāpuṇāti, tassa sā pariyatti ^b^alagaddapariyatti^eb^ nāma. evaṃ pariyāpuṇato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varataraṃ.

[03] yo pana buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhissa āgataṭṭhāne samādhigabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne maggaṃ bhāvessāmi phalaṃ ^a^M2.0014^ea^ sacchikarissāmīti uggaṇhāti, tassa sā pariyatti ^b^nittharaṇapariyatti^eb^ nāma hoti.

[03] khīṇāsavassa pana pariyatti ^b^bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti^eb^ nāma. tassa hi apariññātaṃ appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ asacchikataṃ vā natthi. so hi pariññātakkhandho pahīnakileso bhāvitamaggo sacchikataphalo, tasmā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanto tantidhārako paveṇipālako vaṃsānurakkhakova hutvā uggaṇhāti. itissa sā pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma hoti.

[03] yo ^a^V2.0014^ea^ pana puthujjano chātabhayādīsu ganthadharesu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ bhikkhācārena akilamamāno ^a^P2.0108^ea^ atimadhuraṃ buddhavacanaṃ mā nassatu, tantiṃ dhāressāmi, vaṃsaṃ ṭhapessāmi, paveṇiṃ pālessāmīti pariyāpuṇāti, tassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti hoti, na hotīti? na hoti. kasmā? na attano ṭhāne ṭhatvā pariyāputattā. puthujjanassa hi pariyatti nāma alagaddā vā hoti nittharaṇā vā, sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ nittharaṇāva, khīṇāsavassa bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyeva. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nittharaṇapariyatti adhippetā.

[03] ^b^nijjhānaṃ khamantī^eb^ti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhānesu idha sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, idha samādhi, idha vipassanā, idha maggo, idha phalaṃ, idha vaṭṭaṃ, idha vivaṭṭanti āpāthaṃ āgacchanti. ^b^tañcassa atthaṃ anubhontī^eb^ti yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atthāya pariyāpuṇanti. suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggaṃ bhāvetvā phalaṃ sacchikarontā tañcassa dhammassa atthaṃ anubhavanti. paravāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ sakkontāpi sakavāde āropitaṃ dosaṃ icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā mocetuṃ sakkontāpi anubhontiyeva. ^b^dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī^eb^ti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi, paresaṃ vāde sahadhammena upārambhaṃ āropentānampi, sakavādato dosaṃ harantānampi, arahattaṃ patvā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0015^ea^ suggahite buddhavacane ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni tattheva niyojento ^b^tasmā tiha, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā duggahitapariyatti duggahitālagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati, suggahitapariyatti suggahitālagaddo viya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, tasmāti attho. ^b^tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā^eb^ti tatheva naṃ dhāreyyātha, teneva atthena gaṇheyyātha. ^b^ye vā panāssu viyattā bhikkhū^eb^ti ye vā pana aññe sāriputtamoggallānamahākassapamahākaccānādikā byattā paṇḍitā bhikkhū assu, te pucchitabbā. ariṭṭhena viya pana mama sāsane na kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ^b^kullūpama^eb^nti kullasadisaṃ. ^b^nittharaṇatthāyā^eb^ti caturoghanittharaṇatthāya. ^b^udakaṇṇava^eb^nti yañhi ^a^P2.0109^ea^ udakaṃ gambhīraṃ na puthulaṃ. puthulaṃ vā pana na gambhīraṃ, na taṃ aṇṇavoti vuccati. yaṃ ^a^V2.0015^ea^ pana gambhīrañceva puthulañca, taṃ aṇṇavoti vuccati. tasmā ^b^mahantaṃ udakaṇṇava^eb^nti mahantaṃ puthulaṃ gambhīraṃ udakanti ayamettha attho. ^b^sāsaṅkaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha corānaṃ nivutthokāso dissati. ṭhitokāso, nisinnokāso, nipannokāso dissati. ^b^sappaṭibhayaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti. ^b^uttarasetū^eb^ti udakaṇṇavassa upari baddho setu. ^b^kullaṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti ^b^kullo^eb^ nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā baddho. pattharitvā baddhā pana padaracāṭiādayo uḷumpoti vuccanti. ^b^uccāretvā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā. ^b^kiccakārī^eb^ti pattakārī yuttakārī, patirūpakārīti attho. ^b^dhammāpi vo pahātabbā^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhammā^eb^ti samathavipassanā. bhagavā hi samathepi chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi, vipassanāyapi. samathe chandarāgaṃ kattha pajahāpesi? ``iti kho, udāyi, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassapi pahānaṃ vadāmi, passasi no tvaṃ, udāyi, taṃ saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā, yassāhaṃ no pahānaṃ vadāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.156) ettha samathe chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi. ``imaṃ ce tumhe, bhikkhave, diṭṭhiṃ evaṃ parisuddhaṃ evaṃ pariyodātaṃ na allīyetha na kelāyetha na dhanāyethā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.401) ettha vipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahāpesi ^a^M2.0016^ea^. idha pana ubhayattha pajahāpento ``dhammāpi vo pahātabbā, pageva adhammā''ti āha.

[03] tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo -- bhikkhave, ahaṃ evarūpesu santappaṇītesu dhammesu chandarāgappahānaṃ vadāmi, kiṃ pana imasmiṃ asaddhamme gāmadhamme vasaladhamme duṭṭhulle odakantike, yattha ayaṃ ariṭṭho moghapuriso niddosasaññī pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgaṃ nālaṃ antarāyāyāti vadati. ariṭṭhena viya na tumhehi mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ vā kacavaraṃ vā pakkhipitabbanti evaṃ bhagavā imināpi ovādena ariṭṭhaṃyeva niggaṇhāti.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^P2.0110^ea^ yo pañcasu khandhesu tividhaggāhavasena ahaṃ mamanti gaṇhāti, so mayhaṃ sāsane ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento ^b^chayimāni, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānānī^eb^ti diṭṭhipi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā ārammaṇampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā paccayopi. ^b^rūpaṃ etaṃ mamā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^etaṃ mamā^eb^ti taṇhāggāho. ^b^esohamasmī^eb^ti mānaggāho. ^b^eso me attā^eb^ti diṭṭhiggāho. evaṃ rūpārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā honti. rūpaṃ pana attāti na vattabbaṃ. vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^diṭṭhaṃ^eb^ rūpāyatanaṃ, ^b^sutaṃ^eb^ saddāyatanaṃ ^a^V2.0016^ea^, ^b^mutaṃ^eb^ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tañhi patvā gahetabbato ^b^muta^eb^nti vuttaṃ. avasesāni sattāyatanāni ^b^viññātaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. ^b^anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. lokasmiñhi pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, pariyesitvā nopattampi. apariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā nopattampi. tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ pattaṃ nāma. pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma. apariyesitvā pattañca, apariyesitvā nopattañca manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma.

[03] atha vā pariyesitvā pattampi apariyesitvā pattampi pattaṭṭhena pattaṃ nāma. pariyesitvā nopattaṃ pariyesitaṃ nāma. apariyesitvā nopattaṃ manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. sabbaṃ vā etaṃ manasā anuvicaritattā manasānuvicaritaṃ nāma. iminā viññāṇārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā, desanāvilāsena heṭṭhā diṭṭhādiārammaṇavasena viññāṇaṃ dassitaṃ ^a^M2.0017^ea^. ^b^yampi taṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti yampi etaṃ so lokotiādinā nayena pavattaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] ^b^so loko so attā^eb^ti yā esā ``rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī''tiādinā nayena pavattā diṭṭhi loko ca attā cāti gaṇhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^so pecca bhavissāmī^eb^ti so ahaṃ paralokaṃ gantvā nicco bhavissāmi, dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo bhavissāmi, sinerumahāpathavīmahāsamuddādīhi sassatīhi samaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmi. ^b^tampi etaṃ mamā^eb^ti tampi ^a^P2.0111^ea^ dassanaṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupassati. iminā diṭṭhārammaṇā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo kathitā. vipassanāya paṭivipassanākāle viya pacchimadiṭṭhiyā purimadiṭṭhiggahaṇakāle evaṃ hoti.

[03] sukkapakkhe ^b^rūpaṃ netaṃ mamā^eb^ti rūpe taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhā paṭikkhittā. vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^samanupassatī^eb^ti imassa pana padassa taṇhāsamanupassanā mānasamanupassanā diṭṭhisamanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanāti catasso samanupassanāti attho. tā kaṇhapakkhe tissannaṃ samanupassanānaṃ, sukkapakkhe ñāṇasamanupassanāya vasena veditabbā. ^b^asati na paritassatī^eb^ti avijjamāne bhayaparitassanāya taṇhāparitassanāya vā na paritassati. iminā bhagavā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassamānaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassento desanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpesi.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0017^ea^ vutte aññataro bhikkhūb^ti evaṃ bhagavatā vutte aññataro anusandhikusalo bhikkhu -- ``bhagavatā ajjhattakkhandhavināse aparitassantaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā, ajjhattaṃ aparitassante kho pana sati ajjhattaṃ paritassakena bahiddhā parikkhāravināse paritassakena aparitassakena cāpi bhavitabbaṃ. iti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ pañho pucchitabbo''ti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha bhagavantaṃ etadavoca. ^b^bahiddhā asatī^eb^ti bahiddhā parikkhāravināse. ^b^ahu vata me^eb^ti ahosi vata me bhaddakaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇanti attho. ^b^taṃ vata me natthī^eb^ti taṃ vata idāni mayhaṃ natthi, rājūhi vā corehi vā haṭaṃ, agginā vā daḍḍhaṃ, udakena vā vuḷhaṃ, paribhogena ^a^M2.0018^ea^ vā jiṇṇaṃ. ^b^siyā vata me^eb^ti bhaveyya vata mayhaṃ yānaṃ vāhanaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ sāli vīhi yavo godhumo. ^b^taṃ vatāhaṃ na labhāmī^eb^ti tamahaṃ alabhamāno tadanucchavikaṃ kammaṃ akatvā nisinnattā idāni na labhāmīti socati, ayaṃ agāriyasocanā, anagāriyassa pattacīvarādīnaṃ vasena veditabbā.

[03] aparitassanāvāre ^b^na evaṃ hotī^eb^ti yehi kilesehi evaṃ bhaveyya, tesaṃ pahīnattā na evaṃ hoti. ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhānābhinivesānusayāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0112^ea^ diṭṭhīnañca diṭṭhiṭṭhānānañca diṭṭhādhiṭṭhānānañca diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānānañca abhinivesānusayānañca. ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamathāyā^eb^ti nibbānatthāya. nibbānañhi āgamma sabbasaṅkhārāiñjitāni, sabbasaṅkhāracalanāni sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni sammanti vūpasammanti, tasmā taṃ, ``sabbasaṅkhārasamatho''ti vuccati. tadeva ca āgamma khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi, pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ime upadhayo paṭinissajjiyanti, taṇhā khīyati virajjati nirujjhati, tasmā taṃ, ``sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho''ti vuccati. ^b^nibbānāyā^eb^ti ayaṃ panassa sarūpaniddeso, iti sabbeheva imehi padehi nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthāya dhammaṃ desentassāti ayamattho dīpito. ^b^tassevaṃ hotī^eb^ti tassa diṭṭhigatikassa ^b^ucchijjissāmi nāmassu, vinassissāmi nāmassu, nāssu nāma bhavissāmī^eb^ti evaṃ hoti. diṭṭhigatikassa hi tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ katvā desiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantassa tāso uppajjati. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``tāso heso, bhikkhave, asutavato puthujjanassa no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.55).

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā ^a^V2.0018^ea^ bahiddhāparikkhāravināse tassanakassa ca notassanakassa ca ajjhattakkhandhavināse tassanakassa ca notassanakassa cāti imesaṃ vasena catukkoṭikā suññatā kathitā. idāni bahiddhā parikkhāraṃ pariggahaṃ nāma katvā, vīsativatthukaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ attavādupādānaṃ nāma katvā, sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukhā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhinissayaṃ nāma katvā tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^taṃ, bhikkhave, pariggaha^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^pariggaha^eb^nti bahiddhā parikkhāraṃ. ^b^pariggaṇheyyāthā^eb^ti yathā viññū manusso pariggaṇheyya ^a^M2.0019^ea^. ^b^ahampi kho taṃ, bhikkhave^eb^ti, bhikkhave, tumhepi na passatha, ahampi na passāmi, iti evarūpo pariggaho natthīti dasseti. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tikoṭikaṃ suññataṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhattakkhandhe attāti bahiddhā parikkhāre attaniyanti katvā dvikoṭikaṃ dassento ^b^attani vā, bhikkhave, satī^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P2.0113^ea^. tattha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho, bhikkhave, attani vā sati idaṃ me parikkhārajātaṃ attaniyanti assa, attaniyeva vā parikkhāre sati ayaṃ me attā imassa parikkhārassa sāmīti, evaṃ ahanti. sati mamāti, mamāti sati ahanti yuttaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^saccato^eb^ti bhūtato, ^b^thetato^eb^ti tathato thirato vā.

[03] idāni ime pañcakkhandhe aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti evaṃ tiparivaṭṭavasena aggaṇhanto ayaṃ ariṭṭho viya mayhaṃ sāsane kalalaṃ kacavaraṃ pakkhipatīti dassento ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^aniccaṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, yasmā hutvā na hoti, tasmā aniccaṃ. uppādavayavattito vipariṇāmatāvakālikaniccapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena vāti catūhi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ. ^b^dukkhaṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, paṭipīḷanākārena dukkhaṃ, santāpadukkhamadukkhavatthukasukhapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena vāti catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ. ^b^vipariṇāmadhamma^eb^nti bhavasaṅkantiupagamanasabhāvaṃ pakatibhāvavijahanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā^eb^ti yuttaṃ nu kho taṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhānaṃ vasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ gahetuṃ. ^b^no hetaṃ, bhante^eb^ti iminā te bhikkhū avasavattanākārena rūpaṃ, bhante, anattāti paṭijānanti. suññāssāmikānissarāttapaṭikkhepaṭṭhena vāti catūhi kāraṇehi anattā.

[01] bhagavā ^a^V2.0019^ea^ hi katthaci aniccavasena anattattaṃ dasseti, katthaci dukkhavasena, katthaci ubhayavasena. ``cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjati, cakkhussa uppādopi vayopi paññāyati. yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, attā me uppajjati ca veti cāti iccassa evamāgataṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ na upapajjati cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya, iti cakkhu anattā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.422) imasmiñhi ^b^chachakkasutte^eb^ ^a^P2.0114^ea^ aniccavasena anattataṃ dasseti. ``rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^M2.0020^ea^, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe `evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe `evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'''ti (mahāva0 20; saṃ0 ni0 3.59) imasmiṃ ^b^anattalakkhaṇasutte^eb^ dukkhavasena anattataṃ dasseti. ``rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā, yadanattā taṃ `netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā'ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.76) imasmiṃ ^b^arahattasutte^eb^ ubhayavasena anattataṃ dasseti. kasmā? aniccaṃ dukkhañca pākaṭaṃ. anattāti na pākaṭaṃ.

[03] paribhogabhājanādīsu hi bhinnesu aho aniccanti vadanti, aho anattāti vattā nāma natthi. sarīre gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu kaṇṭakena vā viddhā aho dukkhanti vadanti, aho anattāti pana vattā nāma natthi. kasmā? idañhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ nāma avibhūtaṃ duddasaṃ duppaññāpanaṃ. tena taṃ bhagavā aniccavasena vā dukkhavasena vā ubhayavasena vā dasseti. tayidaṃ imasmimpi teparivaṭṭe aniccadukkhavaseneva dassitaṃ. vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
[03] ^b^tasmā tiha, bhikkhave^eb^ti, bhikkhave, yasmā etarahi aññadāpi rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, tasmāti attho. ^b^yaṃkiñci rūpa^eb^ntiādīni ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ khandhaniddese vitthāritāneva.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ^b^nibbindatī^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhati. ettha ca ^b^nibbidā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā adhippetā. vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanāya hi bahūni nāmāni. esā hi katthaci saññagganti vuttā. katthaci dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti. katthaci pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅganti. katthaci paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīti ^a^V2.0020^ea^. katthaci tammayatāpariyādānanti. katthaci tīhi nāmehi. katthaci dvīhīti.
