[03] apica buddhā nāma dhammaṃ desentā parisaṃ mettāya pharanti, mettāpharaṇena dasabale mahājanassa cittaṃ pasīdati, buddhā ca nāma rūpaggappattā honti dassanasampannā madhurassarā mudujivhā suphusitadantāvaraṇā ^a^P2.0198^ea^ amatena hadayaṃ siñcantā viya dhammaṃ kathenti. tatra nesaṃ mettāpharaṇena pasannacittānaṃ evaṃ hoti -- ``evarūpaṃ advejjhakathaṃ amoghakathaṃ niyyānikakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā saddhiṃ na sakkhissāma paccanīkaggāhaṃ gaṇhitu''nti attano pasannabhāveneva na pucchanti.

[03] ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^sāvakā sampajjantī^eb^ti saraṇagamanavasena sāvakā honti. ^b^tadanuttara^eb^nti taṃ anuttaraṃ. ^b^brahmacariyapariyosāna^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ, tadatthāya hi te pabbajanti. ^b^manaṃ vata, bho, anassāmā^eb^ti, bho, sace mayaṃ na upasaṅkameyyāma, iminā thokena anupasaṅkamanamattena apayirupāsanamatteneva naṭṭhā bhaveyyāma. upasaṅkamanamattakena panamhā na naṭṭhāti attho. dutiyapadaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^assamaṇāva samānā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V2.0100^ea^ pāpānaṃ asamitattā ^b^assamaṇāva^eb^. abāhitattā ca pana ^b^abrāhmaṇāva^eb^. kilesārīnaṃ ahatattā ^b^anarahanto^eb^yeva samānāti attho.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ^b^udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti udāhāraṃ udāhari. yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, vissanditvā gacchati, taṃ avasekoti vuccati, yañca ^a^M2.0103^ea^ jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, ajjhottharitvā gacchati, taṃ oghoti vuccati. evameva yaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti, adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati, taṃ ^b^udāna^eb^nti vuccati. evarūpaṃ pītimayaṃ vacanaṃ nicchāresīti attho. ^b^hatthipadopamo^eb^ti hatthipadaṃ upamā assa dhammassāti hatthipadopamo. so na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotīti dasseti. ^b^nāgavaniko^eb^ti uggahitahatthisippo hatthivanacāriko. atha kasmā idha kusaloti na vuttoti? parato ``yo hoti kusalo''ti vibhāgadassanato. yo hi koci pavisati, yo pana kusalo hoti, so neva tāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. tasmā idha kusaloti avatvā parato vutto.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ^b^vāmanikā^eb^ti rassā āyāmatopi na dīghā mahākucchihatthiniyo. ^b^uccā ca nisevita^eb^nti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese ghaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^uccā kāḷārikā^eb^ti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisapādā hutvā, kāḷārikā ca dantānaṃ kaḷāratāya. tāsaṃ kira eko danto unnato hoti, eko onato. ubhopi ca viraḷā honti, na āsannā. ^b^uccā^eb^ ^a^P2.0199^ea^ ^b^ca dantehi ārañjitānī^eb^ti sattaṭṭharatanubbedhe vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ khandhappadese pharasunā pahataṭṭhānaṃ viya dāṭṭhāhi chinnaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^uccā kaṇerukā nāmā^eb^ti uccā ca yaṭṭhisadisadīghapādā hutvā, kaṇerukā ca dantānaṃ kaṇerutāya, tā kira makuḷadāṭhā honti. tasmā kaṇerukāti vuccanti. ^b^so niṭṭhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti so nāgavaniko yassa vatāhaṃ nāgassa anupadaṃ āgato, ayameva so, na añño. yañhi ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ padaṃ disvā vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ idaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhaṃ na gato, yampi tato orabhāge disvā kāḷārikānaṃ bhavissati, kaṇerukānaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhaṃ na gato, sabbaṃ taṃ imasseva mahāhatthino padanti mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhaṃ gacchati.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- nāgavanaṃ viya hi ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā veditabbā. kusalo nāgavaniko viya yogāvacaro; mahānāgo viya ^a^V2.0101^ea^ sammāsambuddho; mahantaṃ hatthipadaṃ viya jhānābhiññā. nāgavanikassa tattha tattha hatthipadaṃ disvāpi vāmanikānaṃ padaṃ bhavissati, kāḷārikānaṃ kaṇerukānaṃ padaṃ bhavissatīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo viya yogino, imā jhānābhiññā nāma bāhirakaparibbājakānampi ^a^M2.0104^ea^ santīti aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvo. nāgavanikassa, tattha tattha mayā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ imasseva mahāhatthino, na aññassāti mahāhatthiṃ disvā niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa arahattaṃ patvāva niṭṭhaṅgamanaṃ. idañca pana opammasaṃsandanaṃ matthake ṭhatvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. imasmimpi ṭhāne vaṭṭatiyeva. anukkamāgataṃ pana pāḷipadaṃ gahetvā idheva kataṃ. tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti desāpadese nipāto. svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. yathāha -- ``idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.279). katthaci sāsanaṃ. yathāha -- ``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo''ti (a0 ni0 4.241). katthaci okāsaṃ. yathāha --
[21] ``idheva tiṭṭhamānassa, devabhūtassa me sato.
[22] punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 2.369; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.190).

[03] katthaci ^a^P2.0200^ea^ padapūraṇamattameva. yathāha -- ``idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito''ti (ma0 ni0 1.30). idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``brāhmaṇa imasmiṃ loke tathāgato uppajjati arahaṃ...pe0... buddho bhagavā''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^tathāgata^eb^saddo mūlapariyāye, arahantiādayo visuddhimagge vitthāritā. ^b^loke uppajjatī^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^loko^eb^ti okāsaloko sattaloko saṅkhāralokoti tividho. idha pana sattaloko adhippeto. sattaloke uppajjamānopi ca tathāgato na devaloke, na brahmaloke, manussalokeyeva uppajjati. manussalokepi na aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe, imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe. tatrāpi na sabbaṭṭhānesu, ``puratthimāya disāya ^b^gajaṅgalaṃ^eb^ nāma nigamo. tassāparena mahāsālo, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. puratthimadakkhiṇāya disāya ^b^sallavatī^eb^ nāma nadī, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. dakkhiṇāya disāya ^b^setakaṇṇikaṃ^eb^ nāma nigamo, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. pacchimāya disāya thūṇaṃ nāma brāhmaṇagāmo ^a^V2.0102^ea^, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe. uttarāya ^a^M2.0105^ea^ disāya ^b^usiraddhajo^eb^ nāma pabbato, tato parā paccantimā janapadā, orato majjhe''ti (mahāva0 259) evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimapadese uppajjati. na kevalañca tathāgatova, paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti. tattha tathāgato sujātāya dinnamadhupāyasabhojanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggo, tāva uppajjati nāma. arahattaphale uppanno nāma. mahābhinikkhamanato vā yāva arahattamaggo. tusitabhavanato vā yāva arahattamaggo. dīpaṅkarapādamūlato vā yāva arahattamaggo, tāva uppajjati nāma. arahattaphale uppanno nāma. idha sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ ^a^P2.0201^ea^, tathāgato loke uppanno hotīti ayañhettha attho.

[01] ^b^so imaṃ loka^eb^nti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ, idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti saha devehi sadevakaṃ. evaṃ saha mārena ^b^samārakaṃ^eb^. saha brahmunā ^b^sabrahmakaṃ^eb^. saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehi ^b^sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ^eb^. pajātattā pajā, taṃ ^b^pajaṃ^eb^. saha devamanussehi ^b^sadevamanussaṃ^eb^. tattha sadevakavacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. samārakavacanena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ. sabrahmakavacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ. sassamaṇabrāhmaṇivacanena sāsanassa paccatthipaccāmittasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ samitapāpabāhitapāpasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇañca. pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ. sadevamanussavacanena sammutidevāvasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ. evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattalokova gahitoti veditabbo.

[03] aparo nayo -- sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito. samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko. sabrahmakaggahaṇena rūpī brahmaloko. sassamaṇabrāhmaṇādiggahaṇena catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko avasesasabbasattaloko vā.

[03] apicettha ^a^M2.0106^ea^ sadevakavacanena ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassa lokassa sacchikatabhāvamāha. tato yesaṃ ahosi -- ``māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī. kiṃ sopi etena sacchikato''ti? tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto ^b^samāraka^eb^nti āha. yesaṃ pana ahosi -- ``brahmā mahānubhāvo ^a^V2.0103^ea^, ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi...pe0... dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati, anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. kiṃ sopi sacchikato''ti? tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto ^b^sabrahmaka^eb^nti āha. tato ye cintesuṃ -- ``puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanassa paccatthikā, kiṃ tepi sacchikatā''ti? tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamanto ^b^sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ paja^eb^nti āha. evaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhānaṃ sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena ^a^P2.0202^ea^ sesasattalokassa sacchikatabhāvaṃ pakāsento ^b^sadevamanussa^eb^nti āha. ayamettha bhāvānukkamo. porāṇā panāhu -- ^b^sadevaka^eb^nti devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. ^b^samāraka^eb^nti mārena saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. ^b^sabrahmaka^eb^nti brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesalokaṃ. evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipetvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto ``sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussa''nti āha. evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.

[03] ^b^sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī^eb^ti ^b^saya^eb^nti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā. ^b^abhiññā^eb^ti abhiññāya, adhikena ñāṇena ñatvāti attho. ^b^sacchikatvā^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ katvā. etena anumānādipaṭikkhepo kato hoti. ^b^pavedetī^eb^ti bodheti viññāpeti pakāseti. ^b^so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ...pe0... pariyosānakalyāṇa^eb^nti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti. majjhepi... pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0107^ea^ atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ, atthi sāsanassa. ^b^desanāya^eb^ tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma, tato dve majjhaṃ nāma, ante eko pariyosānaṃ nāma. ekānusandhikassa suttassa nidānamādi, idamavocāti pariyosānaṃ, ubhinnaṃ antarā majjhaṃ. anekānusandhikassa suttassa paṭhamānusandhi ādi, ante anusandhi pariyosānaṃ, majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva. ^b^sāsanassa^eb^ pana sīlasamādhivipassanā ^a^V2.0104^ea^ ādi nāma. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhi ca ujukā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.369). ``atthi, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā''ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma, phalañceva nibbānañca pariyosānaṃ nāma. ``etadatthamidaṃ, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyametaṃ sāraṃ, etaṃ pariyosāna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.324) hi ettha phalaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ. ``nibbānogadhañhi ^a^P2.0203^ea^, āvuso visākha, brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.466) ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ. idha desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippetaṃ. bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇa''nti. tasmā aññopi dhammakathiko dhammaṃ kathento --
[21] ``ādimhi sīlaṃ dasseyya, majjhe maggaṃ vibhāvaye.
[22] pariyosānamhi nibbānaṃ, esā kathikasaṇṭhitī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.190).

[01] ^b^sātthaṃ sabyañjana^eb^nti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanā nissitā desanā hoti, na so sātthaṃ deseti. bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti. tasmā ``sātthaṃ desetī''ti vuccati. yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhasabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā, tassa damiḷakirāsavarādimilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti. bhagavā pana --
[21] ``sithilaṃ ^a^M2.0108^ea^ dhanitañca dīgharassaṃ, garukaṃ lahukañca niggahītaṃ.
[22] sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.190) --
[25] evaṃ ^a^V2.0105^ea^ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti. tasmā ``sabyañjanaṃ dhammaṃ desetī''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti ettha ^b^kevala^eb^nti sakalādhivacanaṃ. ^b^paripuṇṇa^eb^nti anūnādhikavacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``sakalaparipuṇṇameva deseti, ekadesanāpi aparipuṇṇā natthī''ti. ^b^parisuddha^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ. yo hi idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmīti deseti, tassa aparisuddhā desanā hoti. bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho ^a^P2.0204^ea^ hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti. tasmā ``parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ desetī''ti vuccati. ^b^brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī^eb^ti ettha ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ. tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ...pe0... parisuddhaṃ, evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtaṃ cariyaṃ. brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^taṃ dhamma^eb^nti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^suṇāti gahapati vā^eb^ti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti? nihatamānattā ussannattā ca. yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti. hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā nihatamānadappā honti. te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ. itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā, iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.

[03] ^b^aññatarasmiṃ vā^eb^ti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. ^b^paccājāto^eb^ti patijāto. ^b^tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā ^a^M2.0109^ea^ dhammassāmimhi tathāgate ``sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā''ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^iti paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti evaṃ paccavekkhati. ^b^sambādho gharāvāso^eb^ti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti, tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhoyeva. ^b^rajopatho^eb^ti rāgarajādīnaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ vuttaṃ. āgamanapathotipi vaṭṭati. alagganaṭṭhena abbhokāso viyāti ^b^abbhokāso^eb^. pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na ^a^P2.0205^ea^ sajjati na bajjhati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``abbhokāso pabbajjā''ti. apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato. rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsasabbhāvato.

[03] ^b^nayidaṃ sukaraṃ...pe0... pabbajeyya^eb^nti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā -- yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ, idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ...pe0... carituṃ. yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kāsāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti. ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ ^b^agāriya^eb^nti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi. tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyāti ñātabbā, taṃ ^b^anagāriyaṃ. pabbajeyya^eb^nti paṭipajjeyyaṃ. ^b^appaṃ vā^eb^ti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato paṭṭhāya mahā. ābandhanaṭṭhena ñāti eva parivaṭṭo ^b^ñātiparivaṭṭo^eb^. so vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo hoti, vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno^eb^ti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca, yattha cete saha jīvanti ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino ^a^M2.0110^ea^ honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. ^b^samāpanno^eb^ti sikkhaṃ paripūrento, sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho. ^b^pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva. ^b^pahāyā^eb^ti imaṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. ^b^paṭivirato hotī^eb^ti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti. ^b^nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho^eb^ti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti ^a^V2.0107^ea^ ^a^P2.0206^ea^ attho. ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ. yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti, na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. tasmā nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. ^b^lajjī^eb^ti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgato. ^b^dayāpanno^eb^ti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpanno. ^b^sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī^eb^ti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako. tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho. ^b^viharatī^eb^ti iriyati pāleti.

[03] dinnameva ādiyatīti ^b^dinnādāyī^eb^. cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhatīti ^b^dinnapāṭikaṅkhī^eb^. thenetīti theno. na thenena ^b^athenena^eb^. athenattāyeva ^b^sucibhūtena. attanā^eb^ti attabhāvena, athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^abrahmacariya^eb^nti aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ caratīti ^b^brahmacārī. ārācārī^eb^ti abrahmacariyato dūracārī. ^b^methunā^eb^ti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. ^b^gāmadhammā^eb^ti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.

[03] saccaṃ vadatīti ^b^saccavādī^eb^. saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti ^b^saccasandho,^eb^ na antarantarā musā vadatīti attho. yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati ^a^M2.0111^ea^. tasmā na so saccasandho, ayaṃ pana na tādiso, jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti ^b^saccasandho. theto^eb^ti thiro, thirakathoti attho. eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti. eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhilo viya ca thirakatho hoti; asinā sīse chijjantepi dve kathā na katheti; ayaṃ vuccati theto ^a^P2.0207^ea^. ^b^paccayiko^eb^ti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyikoti attho. ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti, ``idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā''ti vutte ``mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. eko paccayiko hoti, ``idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā''ti vutte, ``yadi tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida''nti vattabbataṃ ^a^V2.0108^ea^ āpajjati, ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. ^b^avisaṃvādako lokassā^eb^ti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.

[03] ^b^imesaṃ bhedāyā^eb^ti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. ^b^bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā^eb^ti dvinnampi mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta''ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. ^b^anuppadātā^eb^ti sandhānānuppadātā, dve jane samagge disvā, ``tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta''ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. samaggo ārāmo assāti ^b^samaggārāmo^eb^. yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. ``samaggarāmo''tipi pāḷi, ayamevettha attho. ^b^samaggarato^eb^ti samaggesu rato, te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho. samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti ^b^samagganandī. samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā^eb^ti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggiguṇaparidīpakameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.

[03] ^b^nelā^eb^ti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. ``nelaṅgo setapacchādo''ti ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. ^b^kaṇṇasukhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0112^ea^ byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti ^b^pemanīyā^eb^. hadayaṃ gacchati, apaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti ^b^hadayaṅgamā^eb^. guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti ^b^porī,^eb^ pure saṃvaddhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī, purassa esātipi porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho ^a^P2.0208^ea^. nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ pitāti, mātimattaṃ mātāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti ^b^bahujanakantā^eb^. kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti ^b^bahujanamanāpā^eb^.

[03] kālena vadatīti ^b^kālavādī,^eb^ vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti ^b^bhūtavādī^eb^. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthasannissitameva katvā vadatīti ^b^atthavādī^eb^ ^a^V2.0109^ea^. navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^dhammavādī^eb^. saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^vinayavādī^eb^. nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassā atthīti ^b^nidhānavatī,^eb^ hadaye nidhātabba yuttavācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca ``ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī''ti na akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana avekkhitvā bhāsatīti attho. ^b^sāpadesa^eb^nti saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. ^b^pariyantavati^eb^nti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. ^b^atthasaṃhita^eb^nti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ, yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ^b^bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā^eb^ti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā, chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho. ^b^ekabhattiko^eb^ti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ^a^M2.0113^ea^ ekabhattikova hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``ekabhattiko''ti. rattiyā bhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatoti ^b^rattūparato^eb^. atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṃgamanā bhojanaṃ ^b^vikālabhojanaṃ^eb^ nāma. tato viratattā ^b^virato vikālabhojanā^eb^. sāsanassa ^a^P2.0209^ea^ ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti ^b^visūkadassanaṃ^eb^. attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca, antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti ^b^naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā^eb^. naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti. ^b^mālā^eb^dīsu ^b^mālā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. ^b^gandha^eb^nti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. ^b^vilepana^eb^nti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. tattha piḷandhanto ^b^dhāreti^eb^ nāma. ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento ^b^maṇḍeti^eb^ nāma. gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto ^b^vibhūseti^eb^ nāma. ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho.

[03] ^b^uccāsayanaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0110^ea^ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. ^b^mahāsayanaṃ^eb^ akappiyattharaṇaṃ. tato paṭiviratoti attho. ^b^jātarūpa^eb^nti suvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^rajata^eb^nti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti, tassa ubhayassapi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho. ^b^āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti sālivīhiyavagodhūmakaṅguvarakakudrūsakasaṅkhātassa sattavidhassāpi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ.

[03] ^b^itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^itthī^eb^ti purisantaragatā, itarā ^b^kumārikā^eb^ nāma. tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva. ^b^dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, ``kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī''ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati. ^b^ajeḷakā^eb^dīsu khettavatthupariyosānesu ^a^M2.0114^ea^ kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo. tattha ^b^khettaṃ^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. ^b^vatthu^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ^a^P2.0210^ea^ ruhati. yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ ^b^khettaṃ^eb^. tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo ^b^vatthu^eb^. khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva. ^b^dūteyyaṃ^eb^ vuccati dūtakammaṃ, gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ. ^b^pahiṇagamanaṃ^eb^ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. ^b^anuyogo^eb^ nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ, tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogāti evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^kayavikkayā^eb^ti kayā ca vikkayā ca. ^b^tulākūṭā^eb^dīsu ^b^kūṭa^eb^nti vañcanaṃ. tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^rūpakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. ^b^aṅgakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. ^b^gahaṇakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. ^b^paṭicchannakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge. ^b^kaṃso^eb^ vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ ^b^kaṃsakūṭaṃ^eb^. kathaṃ? ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva addhakulaṃ pavisitvā, ``suvaṇṇabhājanāni ^a^V2.0111^ea^ kiṇathā''ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti. tato tehi ``kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo''ti vutte -- ``vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā''ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.

[03] ^b^mānakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^hadayabhedo^eb^ sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena, ``saṇikaṃ āsiñcā''ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti; dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. ^b^sikhābhedo^eb^ tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. ^b^rajjubhedo^eb^ khettavatthuminanakāle ^a^P2.0211^ea^ labbhati. lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.

[03] ^b^ukkoṭanā^eb^dīsu ^a^M2.0115^ea^ ^b^ukkoṭana^eb^nti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^vañcana^eb^nti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. tatridamekaṃ vatthu -- eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati. tameko dhutto, ``kiṃ, bho, migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako''ti āha. ``migo dve kahāpaṇe migapotako eka''nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, ``na me, bho, migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī''ti āha. tena hi ``dve kahāpaṇe dehī''ti. so āha -- ``nanu te, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno''ti. āma dinnoti. ``imampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī''ti. so kāraṇaṃ vadatīti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.

[03] ^b^nikatī^eb^ti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇanti katvā paṭirūpakena vañcanaṃ. ^b^sāciyogo^eb^ti kuṭilayogo, etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti. taṃ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. ^b^chedanādīsu^eb^ ^b^chedana^eb^nti hatthacchedanādi. ^b^vadho^eb^ti māraṇaṃ. ^b^bandho^eb^ti rajjubandhanādīhi ^a^V2.0112^ea^ bandhanaṃ. ^b^viparāmoso^eb^ti himaviparāmoso gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ ^b^himaviparāmoso^eb^. yaṃ gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ ^b^gumbaviparāmoso. ālopo^eb^ vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ vilopakaraṇaṃ. ^b^sahasākāro^eb^ti sāhasikakiriyā, gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. evametasmā chedana...pe0... sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ^b^so santuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti. iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena ^a^P2.0212^ea^ samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti tīṇi cīvarāni patto dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi ekā sūci kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``ticīvarañca ^a^M2.0116^ea^ patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ.
[22] parissāvanena aṭṭhete, yuttayogassa bhikkhuno''ti..

[01] te sabbepi kāyaparihārikāpi honti kucchiparihārikāpi. kathaṃ? ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti ^b^kāyaparihārikaṃ^eb^ hoti, cīvarakaṇṇena udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle khāditabbaphalāphalaggahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati posetīti ^b^kucchiparihārikaṃ^eb^ hoti. pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nahānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti, āhāraṃ gahetvā bhuñjanakāle kucchiparihāriko hoti. vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti, ucchucchedananāḷikerāditacchanakāle kucchiparihārikā. sūcipi cīvarasibbanakāle kāyaparihārikā hoti, pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā. kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā vicaraṇakāle kāyaparihārikaṃ, ucchuādīni bandhitvā gahaṇakāle kucchiparihārikaṃ. parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nahānakāle, senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihārikaṃ, pānīyaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihārikaṃ. ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa parikkhāramattā.

[03] navaparikkhārikassa ^a^V2.0113^ea^ pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati. dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. ekādasaparikkhārikassa kattarayaṭṭhi vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati. dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanā vā vaṭṭati. etesu ca aṭṭhaparikkhārikova santuṭṭho, itare asantuṭṭhā, mahicchā mahābhārāti na vattabbā. etepi hi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva ^a^P2.0213^ea^ subharāva sallahukavuttinova. bhagavā pana nayimaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi, aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena kathesi. so hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā ticīvaraṃ kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati. paṭinivattetvā gahetabbaṃ nāmassa na hoti, iti ^a^M2.0117^ea^ imassa bhikkhuno sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā, ^b^santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarenā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^kāyaparihārikenā^eb^ti kāyapariharaṇamattakena. ^b^kucchiparihārikenā^eb^ti kucchipariharaṇamattakena. ^b^samādāyeva pakkamatī^eb^ti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati, ``mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko''tissa saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti, so jiyā mutto saro viya, yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati, ekova nisīdati, sabbiriyāpathesu ekova adutiyo.
[21] ``cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti,
[27] santussamāno itarītarena.
[26] parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī,
[22] eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti.. (su0 ni0 42).
[03] evaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ khaggavisāṇakappataṃ āpajjati.

[03] idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pakkhī sakuṇo^eb^ti pakkhayutto sakuṇo. ^b^ḍetī^eb^ti uppatati. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho -- sakuṇā nāma ``asukasmiṃ padese ^a^V2.0114^ea^ rukkho paripakkaphalo''ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti. ``idaṃ ajjatanāya idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī''ti nesaṃ na hoti. phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti, atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati, so tena sapattabhārova -- uppatitvā gacchati. evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo ^a^P2.0214^ea^ nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati. tena vuttaṃ ``samādāyeva pakkamatī''ti. ^b^ariyenā^eb^ti niddosena. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti sake attabhāve. ^b^anavajjasukha^eb^nti niddosasukhaṃ.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ^b^so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. sesapadesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. ^b^abyāsekasukha^eb^nti kilesehi ^a^M2.0118^ea^ anavasittasukhaṃ, avikiṇṇasukhantipi vuttaṃ. indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti. ^b^so abhikkante paṭikkante^eb^ti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī hoti. tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ satipaṭṭhāne vuttameva.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ ^b^so iminā cā^eb^tiādinā kiṃ dasseti? araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati, araññe adhivatthā devatā, ``kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā''ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti. ``asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī''ti ayaso pattharati. yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati, so hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati, araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0115^ea^ ^b^vivitta^eb^nti suññaṃ appasaddaṃ, appanigghosanti attho. etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge, ``vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi, tena taṃ vivitta''nti (vibha0 526) vuttaṃ. seti ceva āsati ca etthāti ^b^senāsanaṃ,^eb^ mañcapīṭhādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tenāha -- ``senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi bhisipi bimbohanampi, vihāropi aḍḍhayogopi, pāsādopi, hammiyampi, guhāpi, aṭṭopi, māḷopi, leṇampi, veḷugumbopi ^a^P2.0215^ea^, rukkhamūlampi, maṇḍapopi senāsanaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ senāsana''nti. apica ``vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā''ti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. ``mañco pīṭhaṃ, bhisi bimbohana''nti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. ``cimilikā, cammakhaṇḍo, tiṇasanthāro, paṇṇasanthāro''ti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. ``yattha ^a^M2.0119^ea^ vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantī''ti idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti, taṃ sabbampi senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva. imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento ^b^araññaṃ rukkhamūla^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^arañña^eb^nti ``nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña''nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ. ``āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima''nti (pārā0 654) idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ, tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese vuttaṃ. ^b^rukkhamūla^eb^nti yaṃkiñci sandacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rakkhamūlaṃ. ^b^pabbata^eb^nti selaṃ. tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena vījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^kandara^eb^nti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ, udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatappadesaṃ, yaṃ nadītumbantipi nadīkuñjantipi vadanti. tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā honti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^giriguha^eb^nti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antarā, ekasmiṃyeva vā umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. susānalakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. ^b^vanapattha^eb^nti atikkamitvā manussānaṃ upacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti. tenevāha -- ``vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana''ntiādi (vibha0 531). ^b^abbhokāsa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0116^ea^ acchannaṃ, ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. ^b^palālapuñja^eb^nti palālarāsiṃ ^a^P2.0216^ea^. mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^pacchābhatta^eb^nti bhattassa pacchato. ^b^piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto^eb^ti piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto. ^b^pallaṅka^eb^nti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. ^b^ābhujitvā^eb^ti bandhitvā. ^b^ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā^eb^ti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa ^a^M2.0120^ea^ piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā. evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanahārūni na paṇamanti. athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. tāsu anuppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. ^b^parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe vā katvāti attho. teneva vibhaṅge vuttaṃ -- ``ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā''ti (vibha0 537). atha vā ^b^``parī^eb^ti pariggahaṭṭho, ^b^mukha^eb^nti niyyānattho, ^b^satī^eb^ti upaṭṭhānattho, tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati''nti (paṭi0 ma0 1.164) evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo ``pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā''ti.

[03] ^b^abhijjhaṃ loke^eb^ti ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko, tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho. ^b^vigatābhijjhenā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho. ^b^abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetī^eb^ti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti. yathā naṃ sā muñcati ceva, muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikammāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti ^b^byāpādo^eb^. vikārāpattiyā padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti ^b^padoso^eb^. ubhayametaṃ kodhassevādhivacanaṃ. ^b^thinaṃ^eb^ cittagelaññaṃ. ^b^middhaṃ^eb^ cetasikagelaññaṃ. thinañca middhañca ^b^thinamiddhaṃ. ālokasaññī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0217^ea^ rattimpi divā diṭṭhāalokasañjānanasamatthatāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya ^a^V2.0117^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^sato sampajāno^eb^ti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. idaṃ ubhayaṃ ālokasaññāya upakārattā vuttaṃ. uddhaccañca kukkuccañca ^b^uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. tiṇṇavicikiccho^eb^ti vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. ``kathamidaṃ kathamida''nti evaṃ nappavattatīti ^b^akathaṃkathī. kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti anavajjesu dhammesu. ``ime nu kho kusalā, kathamime kusalā''ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho. ayamettha saṅkhepo, imesu pana nīvaraṇesu ^a^M2.0121^ea^ vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ ^b^paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe^eb^ti ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā pātenti; tasmā ``paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā''ti vuccanti. ^b^tathāgatapadaṃ itipī^eb^ti idampi tathāgatassa ñāṇapadaṃ ñāṇavaḷañjaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānanti vuccati. ^b^tathāgatanisevita^eb^nti tathāgatassa ñāṇaphāsukāya nighaṃsitaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^tathāgatārañjita^eb^nti tathāgatassa ñāṇadāṭhāya ārañjitaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī^eb^ti yathāsabhāvaṃ pajānāti. ^b^natveva tāva ariyasāvako niṭṭhaṃ gato hotī^eb^ti imā jhānābhiññā bāhirakehipi sādhāraṇāti na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti. maggakkhaṇepi apariyositakiccatāya na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti. ^b^apica kho niṭṭhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti apica kho pana maggakkhaṇe mahāhatthiṃ passanto nāgavaniko viya sammāsambuddho bhagavāti iminā ākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. ^b^niṭṭhaṃ gato hotī^eb^ti evaṃ maggakkhaṇe niṭṭhaṃ gacchanto arahattaphalakkhaṇe pariyositasabbakiccatāya sabbākārena tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gato hoti. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cūḷahatthipadopamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0118^ea^ ^a^P2.0218^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahāhatthipadopamasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^jaṅgalāna^eb^nti pathavītalacārīnaṃ. ^b^pāṇāna^eb^nti sapādakapāṇānaṃ. ^b^padajātānī^eb^ti padāni. ^b^samodhānaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti odhānaṃ pakkhepaṃ gacchanti. ^b^aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti seṭṭhaṃ akkhāyati. ^b^yadidaṃ mahantattenā^eb^ti mahantabhāvena aggaṃ akkhāyati, na guṇavasenāti attho. ^b^ye keci kusalā dhammā^eb^ti ye keci lokiyā ^a^M2.0122^ea^ vā lokuttarā vā kusalā dhammā. ^b^saṅgahaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti ettha catubbidho saṅgaho -- sajātisaṅgaho, sañjātisaṅgaho, kiriyasaṅgaho, gaṇanasaṅgahoti. tattha ``sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu sabbe brāhmaṇā''ti evaṃ samānajātivasena saṅgaho ^b^sajātisaṅgaho^eb^ nāma. ``sabbe kosalakā sabbe māgadhakā''ti evaṃ sañjātidesavasena saṅgaho ^b^sañjātisaṅgaho^eb^ nāma. ``sabbe rathikā sabbe dhanuggahā''ti evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho ^b^kiriyasaṅgaho^eb^ nāma. ``cakkhāyatanaṃ katamakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti? cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati. hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita''nti (kathā0 471), ayaṃ ^b^gaṇanasaṅgaho^eb^ nāma. imasmimpi ṭhāne ayameva adhippeto.

[03] nanu ca ``catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā kati akusalā kati abyākatāti pañhassa vissajjane samudayasaccaṃ akusalaṃ, maggasaccaṃ kusalaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ abyākataṃ, dukkhasaccaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākata''nti (vibha0 216-217) āgatattā catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ diyaḍḍhameva saccaṃ bhajati. atha kasmā mahāthero catūsu ariyasaccesu gaṇanaṃ gacchatīti āhāti? saccānaṃ antogadhattā. yathā hi ``sādhikamidaṃ, bhikkhave, diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati, yattha attakāmā ^a^P2.0219^ea^ kulaputtā sikkhanti. tisso imā, bhikkhave, sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā adhicittasikkhā adhipaññāsikkhā''ti (a0 ni0 3.88) ettha sādhikamidaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ ekā adhisīlasikkhāva hoti, taṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti dassito, sikkhānaṃ antogadhattā. yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassa catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse otiṇṇānipi dvīsu ^a^V2.0119^ea^ tīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu otiṇṇānipi siṅgālasasamigādīnaṃ pādāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gatāneva honti. hatthipadato amuccitvā tasseva antogadhattā. evameva ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi catūsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammā catūsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatāva honti; saccānaṃ antogadhattāti diyaḍḍhasaccagaṇanaṃ gatepi kusaladhamme ``sabbe te catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantī''ti āha. ``dukkhe ariyasacce''tiādīsu uddesapadesu ceva jātipi dukkhātiādīsu niddesapadesu ca yaṃ ^a^M2.0123^ea^ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva. kevalaṃ panettha desanānukkamova veditabbo.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ yathā hi cheko vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā catudhā chetvā tato tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā pañcadhā bhindeyya, tatopi cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā phālento pañca pesiyo kareyya, tato catasso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gaṇhitvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phāletvā piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya tato samuggabījanitālavaṇṭādinānappakāraṃ veḷuvikatiṃ kareyya, so piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca catasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse kammāya na upanessatīti na vattabbo. ekappahārena pana upanetuṃ na sakkā, anupubbena upanessati. evameva ayaṃ mahātheropi vilīvakāro sujātaṃ veḷuṃ labhitvā cattāro koṭṭhāse viya, imaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catuariyasaccavasena mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. vilīvakārassa tayo koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā tassa pañcadhā karaṇaṃ viya therassa tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā ekaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ gahetvā bhājentassa khandhavasena pañcadhā karaṇaṃ. tato yathā so vilīvakāro cattāro koṭṭhāse ^a^P2.0220^ea^ ṭhapetvā ekaṃ bhāgaṃ gahetvā pañcadhā phālesi, evaṃ thero cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā rūpakkhandhaṃ vibhajanto ^b^cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpa^eb^nti pañcadhā akāsi. tato yathā so vilīvakāro catasso pesiyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ gahetvā kucchibhāgaṃ piṭṭhibhāganti dvidhā phālesi, evaṃ thero upādāya rūpañca tisso ca dhātuyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajanto ajjhattikabāhiravasena dvidhā dassesi. yathā so vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchibhāgaṃ ādāya nānappakāraṃ vilīvavikatiṃ akāsi, evaṃ thero bāhiraṃ pathavīdhātuṃ ṭhapetvā ajjhattikaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vīsatiyā ākārehi vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] yathā ^a^V2.0120^ea^ pana vilīvakāro piṭṭhibhāgañca itarā ca cattasso pesiyo itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse anupubbena ^a^M2.0124^ea^ kammāya upanessati, na hi sakkā ekappahārena upanetuṃ, evaṃ theropi bāhirañca pathavīdhātuṃ itarā ca tisso dhātuyo upādārūpañca itare ca cattāro arūpino khandhe itarāni ca tīṇi ariyasaccāni anupubbena vibhajitvā dassessati, na hi sakkā ekappahārena dassetuṃ. apica rājaputtūpamāyapi ayaṃ kamo vibhāvetabbo --

[03] eko kira mahārājā, tassa parosahassaṃ puttā. so tesaṃ piḷandhanaparikkhāraṃ catūsu peḷāsu ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhaputtassa appesi -- ``idaṃ te, tāta, bhātikānaṃ piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ tathārūpe chaṇe sampatte piḷandhanaṃ no dehīti yācantānaṃ dadeyyāsī''ti. so ``sādhu devā''ti sāragabbhe paṭisāmesi, tathārūpe chaṇadivase rājaputtā rañño santikaṃ gantvā ``piḷandhanaṃ no, tāta, detha, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā''ti āhaṃsu. tātā, jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathāti. te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā, ``tumhākaṃ kira no hatthe piḷandhanabhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ dethā''ti āhaṃsu. so evaṃ karissāmīti gabbhaṃ vivaritvā, catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā tisso ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā, tato pañca samugge nīharitvā cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā, tato pañcasu karaṇḍesu ^a^P2.0221^ea^ nīharitesu cattāro ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā tato hatthūpagapādūpagādīni nānappakārāni piḷandhanāni nīharitvā adāsi. so kiñcāpi itarehi catūhi karaṇḍehi itarehi catūhi samuggehi itarāhi tīhi peḷāhi na tāva bhājetvā deti, anupubbena pana dassati, na hi sakkā ekappahārena dātuṃ.

[03] tattha mahārājā viya bhagavā daṭṭhabbo. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``rājāhamasmi selāti bhagavā, dhammarājā anuttaro''ti (su0 ni0 559). jeṭṭhaputto viya sāriputtatthero, vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``yaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya, `bhagavato putto oraso mukhato jāto dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadāyādo, no āmisadāyādo'ti sāriputtameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya, bhagavato putto...pe0... no āmisadāyādo''ti (ma0 ni0 3.97). parosahassarājaputtā viya bhikkhusaṅgho daṭṭhabbo. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``parosahassaṃ ^a^V2.0121^ea^ ^a^M2.0125^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ, sugataṃ payirupāsati.
[22] desentaṃ virajaṃ dhammaṃ, nibbānaṃ akutobhaya''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.216).

[03] rañño tesaṃ puttānaṃ piḷandhanaṃ catūsu peḷāsu pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe ṭhapitakālo viya bhagavato dhammasenāpatissa hatthe catusaccappakāsanāya ṭhapitakālo, tenevāha -- ``sāriputto, bhikkhave, pahoti cattāri ariyasaccāni vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetuṃ paññāpetuṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātu''nti (ma0 ni0 3.371). tathārūpe khaṇe tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piḷandhanaṃ yācanakālo viya bhikkhusaṅghassa vassūpanāyikasamaye āgantvā dhammadesanāya yācitakālo. upakaṭṭhāya kira vassūpanāyikāya idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ. rañño, ``tātā, jeṭṭhabhātikassa vo hatthe mayā piḷandhanaṃ ṭhapitaṃ taṃ āharāpetvā piḷandhathā''ti vuttakālo viya sambuddhenāpi, ``sevetha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne, bhajatha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne. paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā sabrahmacārīna''nti evaṃ dhammasenāpatino santike bhikkhūnaṃ pesitakālo.

[03] rājaputtehi rañño kathaṃ sutvā jeṭṭhabhātikassa santikaṃ gantvā piḷandhanaṃ yācitakālo viya bhikkhūhi satthukathaṃ sutvā ^a^P2.0222^ea^ dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ āyācitakālo. jeṭṭhabhātikassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā catasso peḷāyo nīharitvā ṭhapanaṃ viya dhammasenāpatissa imaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhitvā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ vasena mātikāya ṭhapanaṃ. tisso peḷāyo ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcasamugganīharaṇaṃ viya tīṇi ariyasaccāni ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ vibhajantassa pañcakkhandhadassanaṃ. cattāro samugge ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā tato pañcakaraṇḍanīharaṇaṃ viya cattāro arūpakkhandhe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vibhajantassa catumahābhūtaupādārūpavasena pañcakoṭṭhāsadassanaṃ.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ cattāro karaṇḍe ṭhapetvā ekaṃ vivaritvā pidhānaṃ passe ṭhapetvā hatthūpagapādūpagādipiḷandhanadānaṃ viya tīṇi mahābhūtāni upādārūpañca ṭhapetvā ekaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ vibhajantassa bāhiraṃ tāva pidhānaṃ viya ṭhapetvā ajjhattikāya ^a^M2.0126^ea^ pathavīdhātuyā nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi dassanatthaṃ ``katamā cāvuso ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū''tiādivacanaṃ.

[03] tassa ^a^V2.0122^ea^ pana rājaputtassa tehi catūhi karaṇḍehi catūhi samuggehi tīhi ca peḷāhi pacchā anupubbena nīharitvā piḷandhanadānaṃ viya therassāpi itaresañca tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpānañca catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānañca tiṇṇaṃ ariyasaccānañca pacchā anupubbena bhājetvā dassanaṃ veditabbaṃ. yaṃ panetaṃ ``katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū''tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ajjhattaṃ paccatta^eb^nti ubhayampetaṃ niyakādhivacanameva. ^b^kakkhaḷa^eb^nti thaddhaṃ. ^b^kharigata^eb^nti pharusaṃ. ^b^upādinna^eb^nti na kammasamuṭṭhānameva, avisesena pana sarīraṭṭhakassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. sarīraṭṭhakañhi upādinnaṃ vā hotu, anupādinnaṃ vā, ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbaṃ upādinnameva nāma. seyyathidaṃ -- kesā lomā...pe0... udariyaṃ karīsanti idaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa kulaputtassa ajjhattikapathavīdhātuvasena tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhattaṃ. ettha pana manasikāraṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gahetukāmena ^a^P2.0223^ea^ yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. matthaluṅgaṃ pana na idha pāḷiāruḷhaṃ. tampi āharitvā, visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena vavatthapetvā, ``ayampi acetanā abyākatā suññā thaddhā pathavīdhātu evā''ti manasi kātabbaṃ. ^b^yaṃ vā panaññampī^eb^ti idaṃ itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu anugatāya pathavīdhātuyā gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^yā ceva kho pana ajjhattikā pathavīdhātū^eb^ti yā ca ayaṃ vuttappakārā ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu. ^b^yā ca bāhirā^eb^ti yā ca vibhaṅge, ``ayo lohaṃ tipu sīsa''ntiādinā (vibha0 173) nayena āgatā bāhirā pathavīdhātu.

[03] ettāvatā therena ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu nānāsabhāvato vīsatiyā ākārehi vitthārena dassitā, bāhirā saṅkhepena. kasmā? yasmiñhi ṭhāne sattānaṃ ālayo nikanti patthanā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmāso balavā hoti, tattha tesaṃ ālayādīnaṃ uddharaṇatthaṃ buddhā vā buddhasāvakā vā vitthārakathaṃ kathenti. yattha pana na balavā, tattha kattabbakiccābhāvato saṅkhepena kathenti. yathā hi kassako khettaṃ kasamāno yattha mūlasantānakānaṃ balavatāya naṅgalaṃ laggati, tattha goṇe ṭhapetvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā mūlasantānakāni chetvā chetvā ^a^M2.0127^ea^ uddharanto bahuṃ vāyāmaṃ karoti. yattha tāni natthi, tattha balavaṃ payogaṃ katvā goṇe piṭṭhiyaṃ paharamāno kasatiyeva, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^pathavīdhāturevesā^eb^ti duvidhāpesā thaddhaṭṭhena kakkhaḷaṭṭhena pharusaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā pathavīdhātuyeva ^a^V2.0123^ea^, āvusoti ajjhattikaṃ bāhirāya saddhiṃ yojetvā dasseti. yasmā bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo, na ajjhattikāya, tasmā sā bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisā acetanāyevāti gaṇhantassa sukhapariggaho hoti. yathā kiṃ? yathā dantena goṇena saddhiṃ yojito adanto katipāhameva visūkāyati vipphandati, atha na cirasseva damathaṃ upeti. evaṃ ajjhattikāpi bāhirāya saddhiṃ ekasadisāti gaṇhantassa katipāhameva acetanābhāvo ^a^P2.0224^ea^ na upaṭṭhāti, atha na cirenevassā acetanābhāvo pākaṭo hoti. ^b^taṃ netaṃ mamā^eb^ti taṃ ubhayampi na etaṃ mama, na esohamasmi, na eso me attāti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^yathābhūta^eb^nti yathāsabhāvaṃ, tañhi aniccādisabhāvaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti attho.

[03] ^b^hoti kho so, āvuso^eb^ti kasmā ārabhi? bāhirāapodhātuvasena bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā vināsaṃ dassetvā tato visesatarena upādinnāya sarīraṭṭhakapathavīdhātuyā vināsadassanatthaṃ. ^b^pakuppatī^eb^ti āposaṃvaṭṭavasena vaḍḍhamānā kuppati. ^b^antarahitā tasmiṃ samaye bāhirā pathavīdhātu hotī^eb^ti tasmiṃ samaye koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe khārodakena vilīyamānā udakānugatā hutvā sabbā pabbatādivasena saṇṭhitā pathavīdhātu antarahitā hoti. vilīyitvā udakameva hoti. ^b^tāva mahallikāyā^eb^ti tāva mahantāya.
[21] duve satasahassāni, cattāri nahutāni ca.
[22] ettakaṃ bahalattena, saṅkhātāyaṃ vasundharāti.. --

[25] evaṃ bahalatteneva mahantāya, vitthārato pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇāya. ^b^aniccatā^eb^ti hutvā abhāvatā. ^b^khayadhammatā^eb^ti khayaṃ gamanasabhāvatā ^a^M2.0128^ea^. ^b^vayadhammatā^eb^ti vayaṃ gamanasabhāvatā. ^b^vipariṇāmadhammatā^eb^ti pakativijahanasabhāvatā, iti sabbehipi imehi padehi aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. yaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ anattāti tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni āgatāneva honti. ^b^mattaṭṭhakassā^eb^ti parittaṭṭhitikassa, tattha dvīhākārehi imassa kāyassa parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā ṭhitiparittatāya ca sarasaparittatāya ca. ayañhi atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha, na jīvati, na jīvissati. anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissati, na jīvati, na jīvittha. paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati ^a^V2.0124^ea^, na jīvittha, na jīvissatīti vuccati.
[21] ``jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā.
[22] ekacittasamāyuttā, lahu so vattate khaṇo''ti.. --
[25] idaṃ ^a^P2.0225^ea^ etasseva parittaṭṭhitidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. evaṃ ^b^ṭhitiparittatāya^eb^ parittaṭṭhititā veditabbā.

[03] assāsapassāsūpanibaddhādibhāvena panassa ^b^sarasaparittatā^eb^ veditabbā. sattānañhi assāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, passāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, assāsapassāsūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, mahābhūtūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, kabaḷīkārāhārūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ, viññāṇūpanibaddhaṃ jīvitanti visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṇhupādinnassā^eb^ti taṇhāya ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhassa ^b^ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā. atha khvāssa notevettha hotī^eb^ti atha kho assa bhikkhuno evaṃ tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā passantassa ettha ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā ahanti vātiādi tividho taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāho noteva hoti, na hotiyevāti attho. yathā ca āpodhātuvasena, evaṃ tejodhātuvāyodhātuvasenapi bāhirāya pathavīdhātuyā antaradhānaṃ hoti. idha pana ekaṃyeva āgataṃ. itarānipi atthato veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^tañce, āvuso^eb^ti idha tassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno sotadvāre pariggahaṃ paṭṭhapento balaṃ dasseti. ^b^akkosantī^eb^ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti. ^b^paribhāsantī^eb^ti tayā idañcidañca kataṃ, evañca evañca taṃ karissāmāti vācāya paribhāsanti. ^b^rosentī^eb^ti ghaṭṭenti. ^b^vihesentī^eb^ti dukkhāpenti, sabbaṃ vācāya ghaṭṭanameva vuttaṃ. ^b^so eva^eb^nti so dhātukammaṭṭhāniko ^a^M2.0129^ea^ evaṃ sampajānāti. ^b^uppannā kho me aya^eb^nti sampativattamānuppannabhāvena ca samudācāruppannabhāvena ca uppannā. ^b^sotasamphassajā^eb^ti upanissayavasena sotasamphassato jātā sotadvārajavanavedanā, ^b^phasso anicco^eb^ti sotasamphasso hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccoti passati. vedanādayopi ^a^V2.0125^ea^ sotasamphassasampayuttāva veditabbā. ^b^dhātārammaṇamevā^eb^ti dhātusaṅkhātameva ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^pakkhandatī^eb^ti otarati. ^b^pasīdatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe pasīdati, bhummavacanameva vā etaṃ. byañjanasandhivasena ``dhātārammaṇamevā''ti vuttaṃ, dhātārammaṇeyevāti ayamettha attho. ^b^adhimuccatī^eb^ti dhātuvasena evanti adhimokkhaṃ labhati, na rajjati, na dussati. ayañhi ^a^P2.0226^ea^ sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagate mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikavasena pariggahaṃ karoti, tassa vitthārakathā satipaṭṭhāne satisampajaññapabbe vuttā. sā pana tattha cakkhudvāravasena vuttā, idha sotadvāravasena veditabbā.

[03] evaṃ katapariggahassa hi dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balavavipassakassa sacepi cakkhudvārādīsu ārammaṇe āpāthagate ayoniso āvajjanaṃ uppajjati, voṭṭhabbanaṃ patvā ekaṃ dve vāre āsevanaṃ labhitvā cittaṃ bhavaṅgameva otarati, na rāgādivasena uppajjati, ayaṃ koṭippatto tikkhavipassako. aparassa rāgādivasena ekaṃ vāraṃ javanaṃ javati, javanapariyosāne pana rāgādivasena evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti, puna vāraṃ tathā na javati. aparassa ekavāraṃ evaṃ āvajjato puna dutiyavāraṃ rāgādivasena javanaṃ javatiyeva, dutiyavārāvasāne pana evaṃ me javanaṃ javitanti āvajjato ārammaṇaṃ pariggahitameva hoti, tatiyavāre tathā na uppajjati. ettha pana paṭhamo atitikkho, tatiyo atimando, dutiyassa pana vasena imasmiṃ sutte, laṭukikopame, indriyabhāvane ca ayamattho veditabbo.

[03] evaṃ sotadvāre pariggahitavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa balaṃ dassetvā idāni kāyadvāre dīpento ^b^tañce, āvuso^eb^tiādimāha. aniṭṭhārammaṇañhi patvā dvīsu vāresu kilamati sotadvāre ca kāyadvāre ca. tasmā yathā nāma khettassāmī puriso kudālaṃ gahetvā khettaṃ ^a^M2.0130^ea^ anusañcaranto yattha vā tattha vā mattikapiṇḍaṃ adatvā dubbalaṭṭhānesuyeva kudālena bhūmiṃ bhinditvā satiṇamattikapiṇḍaṃ deti. evameva mahāthero anāgate sikkhākāmā padhānakammikā kulaputtā imesu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ paṭṭhapetvā khippameva jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissantīti imesuyeva dvīsu dvāresu gāḷhaṃ katvā saṃvaraṃ desento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0126^ea^ ^b^samudācarantī^eb^ti upakkamanti. ^b^pāṇisamphassenā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0227^ea^ pāṇippahārena, itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^tathābhūto^eb^ti tathāsabhāvo. ^b^yathābhūtasmi^eb^nti yathāsabhāve. ^b^kamantī^eb^ti pavattanti. ^b^evaṃ buddhaṃ anussarato^eb^tiādīsu itipi so bhagavātiādinā nayena anussarantopi buddhaṃ anussarati, vuttaṃ kho panetaṃ bhagavatāti anussarantopi anussaratiyeva. svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammotiādinā nayena anussarantopi dhammaṃ anussarati, kakacūpamovādaṃ anussarantopi anussaratiyeva. suppaṭipannotiādinā nayena anussarantopi saṅghaṃ anussarati, kakacokantanaṃ adhivāsayamānassa bhikkhuno guṇaṃ anussaramānopi anussaratiyeva.

[03] ^b^upekkhā kusalanissitā na saṇṭhātī^eb^ti idha vipassanupekkhā adhippetā. ^b^upekkhā kusalanissitā saṇṭhātī^eb^ti idha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, sā panesā kiñcāpi khīṇāsavassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu arajjanādivasena pavattati, ayaṃ pana bhikkhu vīriyabalena bhāvanāsiddhiyā attano vipassanaṃ khīṇāsavassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāṭhāne ṭhapetīti vipassanāva chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma jātā.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ āpodhātuniddese ^b^āpogata^eb^nti sabbāapesu gataṃ allayūsabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^pittaṃ semha^eb^ntiādīsu pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ. ^b^pakuppatī^eb^ti oghavasena vaḍḍhati, samuddato vā udakaṃ uttarati, ayamassa pākatiko pakopo, āposaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ udakapūrameva hoti. ^b^ogacchantī^eb^ti heṭṭhā gacchanti, uddhane āropitaudakaṃ viya khayaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇanti. sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ tejodhātuniddese ^a^M2.0131^ea^ ^b^tejogata^eb^nti sabbatejesu gataṃ uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ. tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti ^b^tejogataṃ^eb^. purime āpogatepi pacchime vāyogatepi eseva nayo. ^b^yena cā^eb^ti yena tejogatena. tasmiṃ kuppite ayaṃ kāyo santappati, ekāhikajarādibhāvena usumajāto hoti. ^b^yena ca jīrīyatī^eb^ti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati, indriyavekallattaṃ balaparikkhayaṃ valipalitādibhāvañca pāpuṇāti. ^b^yena ca pariḍayhatī^eb^ti yena kuppitena ayaṃ kāyo dayhati, so ca puggalo dayhāmi ^a^P2.0228^ea^ dayhāmīti kandanto satadhotasappigosītacandanādilepañca ^a^V2.0127^ea^ tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati. ^b^yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti yena taṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi, pītaṃ vā pānakādi, khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi, sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti attho. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthārato pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^haritanta^eb^nti haritameva. allatiṇādiṃ āgamma nibbāyatīti attho. ^b^panthanta^eb^nti mahāmaggameva. ^b^selanta^eb^nti pabbataṃ. ^b^udakanta^eb^nti udakaṃ. ^b^ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāga^eb^nti tiṇagumbādirahitaṃ, vivittaṃ abbhokāsaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ. ^b^anāhārā^eb^ti nirāhārā nirupādānā, ayampi pakatiyāva tejovikāro vutto, tejosaṃvaṭṭakāle pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ jhāpetvā chārikāmattampi na tiṭṭhati. ^b^nhārudaddulenā^eb^ti cammanillekhanena. ^b^aggiṃ gavesantī^eb^ti evarūpaṃ sukhumaṃ upādānaṃ gahetvā aggiṃ pariyesanti, yaṃ appamattakampi usumaṃ labhitvā pajjalati, sesamidhāpi purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ vāyodhātuniddese ^b^uddhaṅgamā vātā^eb^ti uggārahikkārādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohanavātā. ^b^adhogamā vātā^eb^ti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā adho orohanavātā. ^b^kucchisayā vātā^eb^ti antānaṃ bahivātā. ^b^koṭṭhāsayā vātā^eb^ti antānaṃ antovātā. ^b^aṅgamaṅgānusārino^eb^ti dhamanījālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakavātā. ^b^assāso^eb^ti antopavisananāsikavāto ^a^M2.0132^ea^. ^b^passāso^eb^ti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthārato pana yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^gāmampi vahatī^eb^ti sakalagāmampi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānā ādāya gacchati, nigamādīsupi eseva nayo. idha vāyosaṃvaṭṭakāle koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaviddhaṃsanavasena ^a^P2.0229^ea^ vāyodhātuvikāro dassito. ^b^vidhūpanenā^eb^ti aggibījanakena. ^b^ossavane^eb^ti chadanagge, tena hi udakaṃ savati, tasmā taṃ ``ossavana''nti vuccati. sesamidhāpi purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ^b^seyyathāpi^eb^ ^a^V2.0128^ea^, ^b^āvuso^eb^ti idha kiṃ dasseti? heṭṭhā kathitānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissattabhāvaṃ. ^b^kaṭṭha^eb^nti dabbasambhāraṃ. ^b^valli^eb^nti ābandhanavalliṃ. ^b^tiṇa^eb^nti chadanatiṇaṃ. ^b^mattika^eb^nti anulepamattikaṃ. ^b^ākāso parivārito^eb^ti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ākāso ṭhitoti attho. ^b^agāraṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti ^b^agāra^eb^nti paṇṇattimattaṃ hoti. kaṭṭhādīsu pana visuṃ visuṃ rāsikatesu kaṭṭharāsivallirāsītveva vuccati. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti evameva aṭṭhiādīni anto ca bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso, tāneva aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati, sarīranti vohāraṃ gacchati. yathā kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ khattiyagehaṃ brāhmaṇagehanti vuccati, evamidampi khattiyasarīraṃ brāhmaṇasarīranti vuccati, na hettha koci satto vā jīvo vā vijjati.

[03] ^b^ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, cakkhū^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ? heṭṭhā upādārūpaṃ cattāro ca arūpino khandhā tīṇi ca ariyasaccāni na kathitāni, idāni tāni kathetuṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhāti. tattha ^b^cakkhuṃ aparibhinna^eb^nti cakkhupasāde niruddhepi upahatepi pittasemhalohitehi palibuddhepi cakkhu cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, paribhinnameva hoti, cakkhuviññāṇassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ aparibhinnaṃ nāma. ^b^bāhirā ca rūpā^eb^ti bāhirā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpā. ^b^tajjo samannāhāro^eb^ti taṃ cakkhuñca rūpe ca paṭicca bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppajjanamanasikāro, bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanasamatthaṃ cakkhudvāre ^a^M2.0133^ea^ kiriyamanodhātucittanti attho. taṃ rūpānaṃ anāpāthagatattāpi aññāvihitassapi na hoti, ^b^tajjassā^eb^ti tadanurūpassa. ^b^viññāṇabhāgassā^eb^ti viññāṇakoṭṭhāsassa.

[03] ^b^yaṃ tathābhūtassā^eb^tiādīsu dvāravasena cattāri saccāni ^a^P2.0230^ea^ dasseti. tattha ^b^tathābhūtassā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇena sahabhūtassa, cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅginoti attho. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇassa na rūpajanakattā cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ, tadanantaracittakkhaṇe catusamuṭṭhānampi labbhati. ^b^saṅgahaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti gaṇanaṃ gacchati. vedanādayo cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttāva. viññāṇampi cakkhuviññāṇameva. ettha ca saṅkhārāti cetanāva vuttā. ^b^saṅgaho^eb^ti ekato saṅgaho. ^b^sannipāto^eb^ti samāgamo. ^b^samavāyo^eb^ti rāsi. ^b^yo paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passatī^eb^ti yo paccaye passati. ^b^so dhammaṃ passatī^eb^ti so paṭiccasamuppannadhamme passati, ^b^chando^eb^tiādi sabbaṃ taṇhāvevacanameva ^a^V2.0129^ea^, taṇhā hi chandakaraṇavasena ^b^chando^eb^. ālayakaraṇavasena ^b^ālayo^eb^. anunayakaraṇavasena ^b^anunayo^eb^. ajjhogāhitvā gilitvā gahanavasena ^b^ajjhosāna^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna^eb^nti nibbānasseva vevacanaṃ, iti tīṇi saccāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva maggasaccaṃ āharitvā gahetabbaṃ, yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi bhāvanāpaṭivedho, ayaṃ maggoti. ^b^bahukataṃ hotī^eb^ti ettāvatāpi bahuṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, ^b^ajjhattikañceva, āvuso, sota^eb^ntiādivāresupi eseva nayo.

[03] manodvāre pana ajjhattiko mano nāma bhavaṅgacittaṃ. taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva pavattamānampi ^b^paribhinnaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ ^b^aparibhinnaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^bāhirā ca dhammā^eb^ti dhammārammaṇaṃ. ^b^neva tāva tajjassā^eb^ti idaṃ bhavaṅgasamayeneva kathitaṃ. dutiyavāro paguṇajjhānapaccavekkhaṇena vā, paguṇakammaṭṭhānamanasikārena vā, paguṇabuddhavacanasajjhāyakaraṇādinā vā, aññavihitakaṃ sandhāya vutto. imasmiṃ vāre ^b^rūpa^eb^nti catusamuṭṭhānampi labbhati. manoviññāṇañhi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, vedanādayo manoviññāṇasampayuttā ^a^P2.0231^ea^, viññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇameva. saṅkhārā panettha phassacetanāvaseneva ^a^M2.0134^ea^ gahitā. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. iti mahāthero heṭṭhā ekadesameva sammasanto āgantvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā heṭṭhā parihīnadesanaṃ sabbaṃ taṃtaṃdvāravasena bhājetvā dassento yathānusandhināva suttantaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahāhatthipadopamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0130^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti mahāsāropamasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^acirapakkante^eb^ti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ruhiruppādakammaṃ katvā nacirapakkante saliṅgeneva pāṭiyekke jāte.

[03] ^b^idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto^eb^ti kiñcāpi asukakulaputtoti na niyāmito, devadattaṃyeva pana sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. so hi asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā okkākavaṃse jātattā jātikulaputto. ^b^otiṇṇo^eb^ti yassa jāti anto anupaviṭṭhā, so jātiyā otiṇṇo nāma. jarādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^lābhasakkārādī^eb^supi ^b^lābho^eb^ti cattāro paccayā. ^b^sakkāro^eb^ti tesaṃyeva sukatabhāvo. ^b^siloko^eb^ti vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. ^b^abhinibbattetī^eb^ti uppādeti. ^b^apaññātā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ janānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne na paññāyanti, ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhanti. ^b^appesakkhā^eb^ti appaparivārā, purato vā pacchato vā gacchantaṃ na labhanti.

[03] ^b^sārena sārakaraṇīya^eb^nti rukkhasārena kattabbaṃ akkhacakkayuganaṅgalādikaṃ yaṃkiñci. ^b^sākhāpalāsaṃ aggahesi brahmacariyassā^eb^ti maggaphalasārassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa cattāro paccayā sākhāpalāsaṃ nāma, taṃ aggahesi. ^b^tena ca vosānaṃ āpādī^eb^ti teneva ca alamettāvatā sāro me pattoti vosānaṃ āpanno.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ^b^ñāṇadassanaṃ ārādhetī^eb^ti devadatto pañcābhiñño, dibbacakkhu ca pañcannaṃ abhiññānaṃ matthake ṭhitaṃ, taṃ imasmiṃ sutte ``ñāṇadassana''nti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0135^ea^. ^b^ajānaṃ apassaṃ viharantī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0232^ea^ kiñci sukhumaṃ rūpaṃ ajānantā antamaso paṃsupisācakampi apassantā viharanti.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ^b^asamayavimokkhaṃ ārādhetī^eb^ti, ``katamo asamayavimokkho? cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, nibbānañca, ayaṃ asamayavimokkho''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.213) evaṃ ^a^V2.0131^ea^ vutte navalokuttaradhamme ārādheti sampādeti paṭilabhati. lokiyasamāpattiyo hi appitappitakkhaṇeyeva paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanti, tasmā, ``katamo samayavimokkho? cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpāvacarasamāpattiyo, ayaṃ samayavimokkho''ti evaṃ samayavimokkhoti vuttā. lokuttaradhammā pana kālena kālaṃ vimuccanti, sakiṃ vimuttāni hi maggaphalāni vimuttāneva honti. nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi accantaṃ vimuttamevāti ime nava dhammā asamayavimokkhoti vuttā.

[03] ^b^akuppā cetovimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimutti. ayamattho etassāti ^b^etadatthaṃ,^eb^ arahattaphalatthamidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ. ayaṃ etassa atthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^etaṃ sāra^eb^nti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa sāraṃ. ^b^etaṃ pariyosāna^eb^nti etaṃ arahattaphalaṃ brahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, esā koṭi, na ito paraṃ pattabbaṃ atthīti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahāsāropamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0132^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cūḷasāropamasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^piṅgalakoccho^eb^ti so brāhmaṇo piṅgaladhātuko. ^b^koccho^eb^ti panassa nāmaṃ, tasmā ``piṅgalakoccho''ti vuccati. ^b^saṅghino^eb^tiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti ^b^saṅghino^eb^. sveva gaṇo etesaṃ atthīti ^b^gaṇino^eb^. ācārasikkhāpanavasena tassa gaṇassa ācariyāti ^b^gaṇācariyā. ñātā^eb^ti paññātā pākaṭā. ``appicchā santuṭṭhā, appicchatāya ^a^M2.0136^ea^ vatthampi na nivāsentī''tiādinā nayena samuggato yaso etesaṃ ^a^P2.0233^ea^ atthīti ^b^yasassino. titthakarā^eb^ti laddhikarā. ^b^sādhusammatā^eb^ti ime sādhu sundarā sappurisāti evaṃ sammatā. ^b^bahujanassā^eb^ti assutavato andhabālaputhujjanassa. idāni te dassento ^b^seyyathidaṃ pūraṇo^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pūraṇo^eb^ti tassa satthupaṭiññassa nāmaṃ. ^b^kassapo^eb^ti gottaṃ. so kira aññatarassa kulassa ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamāno jāto, tenassa ``pūraṇo''ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. maṅgaladāsattā cassa ``dukkaṭa''nti vattā natthi, akataṃ vā na katanti. ``so kimahamettha vasāmī''ti palāyi. athassa corā vatthāni acchindiṃsu. so paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi. manussā taṃ disvā, ``ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho, natthi iminā sadiso''ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. so ``mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna''nti tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi, tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesi. tassa santike aññepi pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu, taṃ sandhāyāha ``pūraṇo kassapo''ti.

[03] ^b^makkhalī^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. gosālāya jātattā ^b^gosālo^eb^ti dutiyaṃ nāmaṃ. taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, ``tāta, mā khalī''ti sāmiko āha. so pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho. sāmiko upadhāvitvā sāṭakakaṇṇe aggahesi. sopi sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāyi, sesaṃ pūraṇasadisameva.

[03] ^b^ajito^eb^ti ^a^V2.0133^ea^ tassa nāmaṃ. kesakambalaṃ dhāretīti ^b^kesakambalo^eb^. iti nāmadvayaṃ saṃsanditvā ``ajito kesakambalo''ti vuccati. tattha ^b^kesakambalo^eb^ nāma manussakesehi katakambalo, tato paṭikiṭṭhataraṃ vatthaṃ nāma natthi. yathāha -- ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ, kesakambalo tesaṃ paṭikiṭṭho akkhāyati, kesakambalo, bhikkhave, sīte sīto uṇhe uṇho dubbaṇṇo duggandho dukkhasamphasso''ti (a0 ni0 3.138).

[03] ^b^pakudho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0137^ea^ tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^kaccāyano^eb^ti gottaṃ. iti ^a^P2.0234^ea^ nāmagottaṃ saṃsanditvā, ``pakudho kaccāyano''ti vuccati. sītudakapaṭikkhittako esa, vaccaṃ katvāpi udakakiccaṃ na karoti, uṇhodakaṃ vā kañjiyaṃ vā labhitvā karoti, nadiṃ vā maggodakaṃ vā atikkamma, ``sīlaṃ me bhinna''nti vālikathūpaṃ katvā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati, evarūpo nissirikaladdhiko esa.

[03] ^b^sañjayo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. belaṭṭhassa puttoti ^b^belaṭṭhaputto^eb^. amhākaṃ gaṇṭhanakileso palibujjhanakileso natthi, kilesagaṇṭharahitā mayanti evaṃ vāditāya laddhanāmavasena ^b^nigaṇṭho^eb^. nāṭassa puttoti ^b^nāṭaputto. abbhaññaṃsū^eb^ti yathā tesaṃ paṭiññā, tatheva jāniṃsu. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- sace nesaṃ sā paṭiññā niyyānikā sabbe abbhaññaṃsu. no ce, na abbhaññaṃsu. tasmā kiṃ tesaṃ paṭiññā niyyānikā na niyyānikāti, ayametassa pañhassa attho. atha bhagavā nesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato alanti paṭikkhipitvā upamāya atthaṃ pavedento dhammameva desetuṃ, ^b^dhammaṃ, te brāhmaṇa, desessāmī^eb^ti āha.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti sacchikaraṇatthaṃ. ^b^na chandaṃ janetī^eb^ti kattukamyatāchandaṃ na janayati. ^b^na vāyamatī^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ parakkamaṃ na karoti. ^b^olīnavuttiko ca hotī^eb^ti līnajjhāsayo hoti. ^b^sāthaliko^eb^ti sithilaggāhī, sāsanaṃ sithilaṃ katvā gaṇhāti, daḷhaṃ na gaṇhāti.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ^b^idha, brāhmaṇa bhikkhu, vivicceva kāmehī^eb^ti kathaṃ ime paṭhamajjhānādidhammā ñāṇadassanena uttaritarā jātāti? nirodhapādakattā. heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānādidhammā hi vipassanāpādakā ^a^V2.0134^ea^, idha nirodhapādakā, tasmā uttaritarā jātāti veditabbā. iti bhagavā idampi suttaṃ yathānusandhināva niṭṭhapesi. desanāvasāne brāhmaṇo saraṇesu patiṭṭhitoti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cūḷasāropamasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] tatiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0135^ea^ ^a^P2.0235^ea^ ^a^M2.0138^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cūḷagosiṅgasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^nātike viharatī^eb^ti ^b^nātikā^eb^ nāma ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā, tesu ekasmiṃ gāme. ^b^giñjakāvasathe^eb^ti iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe. ekasmiṃ kira samaye bhagavā mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto vajjiraṭṭhe cārikaṃ caramāno nātikaṃ anuppatto. nātikavāsino manussā bhagavato mahādānaṃ datvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannahadayā, ``satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmā''ti mantetvā iṭṭhakāheva bhittisopānatthambhe vāḷarūpādīni dassento pāsādaṃ katvā sudhāya limpitvā mālākammalatākammādīni niṭṭhāpetvā bhummattharaṇamañcapīṭhādīni paññapetvā satthu niyyātesuṃ. aparāparaṃ panettha manussā bhikkhusaṅghassa rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānamaṇḍapacaṅkamādīni kārayiṃsu. iti so vihāro mahā ahosi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``giñjakāvasathe''ti.

[01] ^b^gosiṅgasālavanadāye^eb^ti tattha ekassa jeṭṭhakarukkhassa khandhato gosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ hutvā viṭapaṃ uṭṭhahi, taṃ rukkhaṃ upādāya sabbampi taṃ vanaṃ ^b^gosiṅgasālavana^eb^nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. ^b^dāyo^eb^ti avisesena araññassetaṃ nāmaṃ. tasmā ^b^gosiṅgasālavanadāye^eb^ti gosiṅgasālavanāraññeti attho. ^b^viharantī^eb^ti sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā viharanti. imesañhi kulaputtānaṃ uparipaṇṇāsake puthujjanakālo kathito, idha khīṇāsavakālo. tadā hi te laddhassādā laddhapatiṭṭhā adhigatapaṭisambhidā khīṇāsavā hutvā sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavamānā tattha vihariṃsu. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattheresu vā asītimahāsāvakesu ^a^V2.0136^ea^ vā, antamaso dhammabhaṇḍāgārikāanandattherampi kañci anāmantetvā sayameva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya anīkā nissaṭo hatthī viya, yūthā nissaṭo kāḷasīho viya ^a^M2.0139^ea^, vātacchinno valāhako viya ekakova upasaṅkami. kasmā panettha bhagavā sayaṃ agamāsīti? tayo kulaputtā ^a^P2.0236^ea^ sāmaggirasaṃ anubhavantā viharanti, tesaṃ paggaṇhanato, pacchimajanataṃ anukampanato dhammagarubhāvato ca. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmī''ti. evaṃ tāva paggaṇhanato agamāsi. aparampissa ahosi -- ``anāgate kulaputtā sammāsambuddho samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ santikaṃ sayaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā tayo kulaputte paggaṇhi, ko nāma samaggavāsaṃ na vaseyyāti samaggavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā khippameva dukkhassantaṃ karissantī''ti. evaṃ pacchimajanataṃ anukampanatopi agamāsi. buddhā ca nāma dhammagaruno honti, so ca nesaṃ dhammagarubhāvo rathavinīte āvikatova. iti imasmā dhammagarubhāvatopi dhammaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti agamāsi.

[01] ^b^dāyapālo^eb^ti araññapālo. so taṃ araññaṃ yathā icchiticchitappadesena manussā pavisitvā tattha pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā niyyāsaṃ vā dabbasambhāraṃ vā na haranti, evaṃ vatiyā parikkhittassa tassa araññassa yojite dvāre nisīditvā taṃ araññaṃ rakkhati, pāleti. tasmā ``dāyapālo''ti vutto. ^b^attakāmarūpā^eb^ti attano hitaṃ kāmayamānasabhāvā hutvā viharanti. yo hi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammadūtakammapahiṇagamanādīnaṃ vasena ekavīsatianesanāhi jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ na attakāmarūpo nāma. yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā ekavīsatianesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sappāyadhutaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmantaṃ pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ kurumāno viharati, ayaṃ attakāmo nāma. tepi tayo kulaputtā evarūpā ahesuṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ``attakāmarūpā viharantī''ti.

[03] ^b^mā tesaṃ aphāsumakāsī^eb^ti tesaṃ mā aphāsukaṃ akāsīti bhagavantaṃ vāresi. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``ime kulaputtā ^a^P2.0237^ea^ samaggā viharanti, ekaccassa ca gataṭṭhāne bhaṇḍanakalahavivādā vattanti, tikhiṇasiṅgo caṇḍagoṇo viya ovijjhanto vicarati, athekamaggena dvinnaṃ gamanaṃ na ^a^M2.0140^ea^ hoti, kadāci ayampi evaṃ karonto imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samaggavāsaṃ ^a^V2.0137^ea^ bhindeyya. pāsādiko ca panesa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo surasagiddho maññe, gatakālato paṭṭhāya paṇītadāyakānaṃ attano upaṭṭhākānañca vaṇṇakathanādīhi imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ appamādavihāraṃ bhindeyya. vasanaṭṭhānāni cāpi etesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibaddhāni paricchinnāni tisso ca paṇṇasālā tayo caṅkamā tīṇi divāṭṭhānāni tīṇi mañcapīṭhāni. ayaṃ pana samaṇo mahākāyo vuḍḍhataro maññe bhavissati. so akāle ime kulaputte senāsanā vuṭṭhāpessati. evaṃ sabbathāpi etesaṃ aphāsu bhavissatī''ti. taṃ anicchanto, ``mā tesaṃ aphāsukamakāsī''ti bhagavantaṃ vāresi.

[03] kiṃ panesa jānanto vāresi, ajānantoti? ajānanto. kiñcāpi hi tathāgatassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu, araññavāsino pana dubbalamanussā sakammappasutā tāni sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti. sammāsambuddho ca nāma yadā anekabhikkhusahassaparivāro byāmappabhāya asītianubyañjanehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasiriyā ca buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento vicarati, tadā ko esoti apucchitvāva jānitabbo hoti. tadā pana bhagavā sabbampi taṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ cīvaragabbhena paṭicchādetvā valāhakagabbhena paṭicchanno puṇṇacando viya sayameva pattacīvaramādāya aññātakavesena agamāsi. iti naṃ ajānantova dāyapālo nivāresi.

[03] ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti thero kira mā samaṇāti dāyapālassa kathaṃ sutvāva cintesi -- ``mayaṃ tayo janā idha viharāma, aññe pabbajitā nāma natthi, ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti, ko nu kho bhavissatī''ti divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya dvāre ṭhatvā maggaṃ olokento bhagavantaṃ addasa. bhagavāpi therassa saha dassaneneva sarīrobhāsaṃ muñci, asītianubyañjanavirājitā byāmappabhā pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭo viya virocittha. thero, ``ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ ^a^P2.0238^ea^ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārento viya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti, aññatarabhikkhunā viya saddhiṃ kathetī''ti nivārento etaṃ, ``mā, āvuso dāyapālā''tiādivacanaṃ avoca.

[03] ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0141^ea^ kasmā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ akatvā upasaṅkami? evaṃ kirassa ahosi ^a^V2.0138^ea^ -- ``mayaṃ tayo janā samaggavāsaṃ vasāma, sacāhaṃ ekakova paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi, samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatī''ti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi. yathā ca bhagavā mayhaṃ piyo, evaṃ sahāyānampi me piyoti, tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami. keci pana tesaṃ therānaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre caṅkamanakoṭiyā bhagavato āgamanamaggo hoti, tasmā thero tesaṃ saññaṃ dadamānova gatoti. ^b^abhikkamathā^eb^ti ito āgacchatha. ^b^pāde pakkhālesī^eb^ti vikasitapadumasannibhehi jālahatthehi maṇivaṇṇaṃ udakaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇesu piṭṭhipādesu udakamabhisiñcitvā pādena pādaṃ ghaṃsanto pakkhālesi. buddhānaṃ kāye rajojallaṃ nāma na upalimpati, kasmā pakkhālesīti? sarīrassa utuggahaṇatthaṃ, tesañca cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ. amhehi abhihaṭena udakena bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi, paribhogaṃ akāsīti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ balavasomanassavasena cittaṃ pīṇitaṃ hoti, tasmā pakkhālesi. ^b^āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavocā^eb^ti so kira tesaṃ vuḍḍhataro.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ tassa saṅgahe kate sesānaṃ katova hotīti theraññeva etaṃ ^b^kacci vo anuruddhā^eb^tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^kaccī^eb^ti pucchanatthe nipāto. ^b^vo^eb^ti sāmivacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kacci anuruddhā tumhākaṃ khamanīyaṃ, iriyāpatho vo khamati? kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci vo jīvitaṃ yāpeti ghaṭiyati? kacci piṇḍakena na kilamatha, kacci tumhākaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sampatte vo disvā manussā uḷuṅkayāguṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ vā dātabbaṃ maññantīti bhikkhācāravattaṃ pucchati. kasmā? paccayena akilamantena hi sakkā samaṇadhammo kātuṃ, vattameva vā etaṃ pabbajitānaṃ. atha ^a^P2.0239^ea^ tena paṭivacane dinne, ``anuruddhā, tumhe rājapabbajitā mahāpuññā, manussā tumhākaṃ araññe vasantānaṃ adatvā kassa aññassa dātabbaṃ maññissanti, tumhe pana etaṃ bhuñjitvā kiṃ nu kho migapotakā viya aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā viharatha, udāhu sāmaggibhāvo vo atthī''ti sāmaggirasaṃ pucchanto, ^b^kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^khīrodakībhūtā^eb^ti yathā khīrañca udakañca aññamaññaṃ saṃsandati, visuṃ na hoti, ekattaṃ viya upeti, kacci evaṃ sāmaggivasena ekattūpagatacittuppādā ^a^M2.0142^ea^ viharathāti pucchati. ^b^piyacakkhūhī^eb^ti mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā olokanacakkhūni piyacakkhūni nāma. kacci tathārūpehi cakkhūhi aññamaññaṃ sampassantā viharathāti pucchati. ^b^tagghā^eb^ti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. ekaṃsena ^a^V2.0139^ea^ mayaṃ, bhanteti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yathā kathaṃ panā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^katha^eb^nti kāraṇapucchā. kathaṃ pana tumhe evaṃ viharatha, kena kāraṇena viharatha, taṃ me kāraṇaṃ brūthāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^mettaṃ kāyakamma^eb^nti mettacittavasena pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃ. ^b^āvi ceva raho cā^eb^ti sammukhā ceva parammukhā ca. itaresupi eseva nayo.
