[03] 464^b^.^eb^ idāni kiṃ nu kho esā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ valañjeti, na valañjeti. ciṇṇavasī vā tattha no ciṇṇavasīti jānanatthaṃ pucchanto, ^b^kathaṃ panāyye, saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti hotī^eb^tiādimāha. tassa vissajjane ^b^samāpajjissanti vā samāpajjāmīti vā^eb^ padadvayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattikālo kathito. ^b^samāpanno^eb^ti padena antonirodho. tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi sacittakakālo kathito, pacchimena acittakakālo. ^b^pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva, ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetī^eb^ti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ tathattāya acittakabhāvāya upaneti.

[03] ^b^paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati vacīsaṅkhāro^eb^ti sesasaṅkhārehi paṭhamaṃ dutiyajjhāneyeva nirujjhati. ^b^tato kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^ti ^a^V2.0260^ea^ tato paraṃ kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne nirujjhati. ^b^tato cittasaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ cittasaṅkhāro antonirodhe nirujjhati. ^b^vuṭṭhahissanti vā vuṭṭhahāmīti vā^eb^ padadvayena antonirodhakālo kathito. ^b^vuṭṭhito^eb^ti padena phalasamāpattikālo. tathā purimehi dvīhi padehi acittakakālo kathito, pacchimena sacittakakālo. ^b^pubbeva tathā cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hotī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattito pubbe addhānaparicchedakāleyeva ettakaṃ kālaṃ acittako hutvā tato paraṃ sacittako bhavissāmīti addhānaparicchedacittaṃ bhāvitaṃ hoti. ^b^yaṃ taṃ tathattāya upanetī^eb^ti yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ puggalaṃ tathattāya sacittakabhāvāya upaneti. iti heṭṭhā nirodhasamāpajjanakālo gahito, idha nirodhato vuṭṭhānakālo.

[03] idāni ^a^P2.0366^ea^ nirodhakathaṃ kathetuṃ vāroti nirodhakathā kathetabbā siyā, sā panesā, ``dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā tayo ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatāpaññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa''nti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbākārena visuddhimagge kathitā. tasmā tattha kathitanayeneva gahetabbā ^a^M2.0265^ea^. ko panāyaṃ nirodho nāma? catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhā appavatti. atha kimatthametaṃ samāpajjantīti. saṅkhārānaṃ pavatte ukkaṇṭhitā sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā sukhaṃ viharissāma, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ nāmetaṃ, yadidaṃ nirodhoti etadatthaṃ samāpajjanti.

[03] ^b^paṭhamaṃ uppajjati cittasaṅkhāro^eb^ti nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa hi phalasamāpatticittaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati. taṃsampayuttaṃ saññañca vedanañca sandhāya, ``paṭhamaṃ uppajjati cittasaṅkhāro''ti āha. ^b^tato kāyasaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasamaye kāyasaṅkhāro uppajjati. kiṃ pana phalasamāpatti assāsapassāse na samuṭṭhāpetīti? samuṭṭhāpeti. imassa pana catutthajjhānikā phalasamāpatti, sā na samuṭṭhāpeti. kiṃ vā etena phalasamāpatti paṭhamajjhānikā vā hotu, dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānikā vā, santāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā honti. tesaṃ abbohārikabhāvo sañjīvattheravatthunā veditabbo. sañjīvattherassa hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya kiṃsukapupphasadise vītaccitaṅgāre maddamānassa gacchato cīvare aṃsumattampi na jhāyi, usumākāramattampi nāhosi, samāpattiphalaṃ nāmetanti vadanti. evamevaṃ santāya ^a^V2.0261^ea^ samāpattiyā vuṭṭhitassa bhikkhuno assāsapassāsā abbohārikā hontīti bhavaṅgasamayenevetaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tato vacīsaṅkhāro^eb^ti tato paraṃ kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakāle vacīsaṅkhāro uppajjati. kiṃ bhavaṅgaṃ vitakkavicāre na samuṭṭhāpetīti? samuṭṭhāpeti. taṃsamuṭṭhānā pana vitakkavicārā vācaṃ abhisaṅkhātuṃ na sakkontīti ^a^P2.0367^ea^ kiriyamayapavattavaḷañjanakālenevataṃ kathitaṃ. ^b^suññato phasso^eb^tiādayo saguṇenāpi ārammaṇenāpi kathetabbā. saguṇena tāva suññatā nāma phalasamāpatti, tāya sahajātaṃ phassaṃ sandhāya suññato phassoti vuttaṃ. ^b^animittāpaṇihitesupi^eb^eseva nayo. ārammaṇena pana nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññattā suññaṃ nāma, rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvā animittaṃ, rāgadosamohappaṇidhīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitaṃ. suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaphalasamāpattiyaṃ phasso suññato nāma. ^b^animittāpaṇihitesupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03] aparā ^a^M2.0266^ea^ āgamaniyakathā nāma hoti, suññatā, animittā, appaṇihitāti hi vipassanāpi vuccati. tattha yo bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccato pariggahetvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti, tassa vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā ^b^animittā^eb^ nāma hoti. yo dukkhato pariggahetvā dukkhato disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti, tassa ^b^appaṇihitā^eb^ nāma. yo anattato pariggahetvā anattato disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti, tassa ^b^suññatā^eb^ nāma. tattha animittavipassanāya maggo animitto nāma, animittamaggassa phalaṃ animittaṃ nāma. animittaphalasamāpattisahajāte phasse phusante animitto phasso phusatīti vuccati. appaṇihitasuññatesupi eseva nayo. āgamaniyena kathite pana suññato vā phasso animitto vā phasso appaṇihito vā phassoti vikappo āpajjeyya, tasmā saguṇena ceva ārammaṇena ca kathetabbaṃ. evañhi tayo phassā phusantīti sameti.

[03] ^b^vivekaninna^eb^ntiādīsu nibbānaṃ viveko nāma, tasmiṃ viveke ninnaṃ onatanti ^b^vivekaninnaṃ^eb^. aññato āgantvā yena viveko, tena vaṅkaṃ viya hutvā ṭhitanti ^b^vivekapoṇaṃ^eb^. yena viveko, tena patamānaṃ viya ṭhitanti ^b^vivekapabbhāraṃ^eb^.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V2.0262^ea^ yā vedanā nirodhetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tā pucchissāmīti pucchanto ^b^kati panāyye, vedanā^eb^ti āha. ^b^kāyikaṃ vā^eb^tiādīsu pañcadvārikaṃ sukhaṃ ^a^P2.0368^ea^ kāyikaṃ nāma, manodvārikaṃ cetasikaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. tattha ^b^sukha^eb^nti sabhāvaniddeso. ^b^sāta^eb^nti tasseva madhurabhāvadīpakaṃ vevacanaṃ. ^b^vedayita^eb^nti vedayitabhāvadīpakaṃ, sabbavedanānaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā^eb^tiādīsu sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukhaṃ, natthibhāvo dukkhaṃ. dukkhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo dukkhaṃ, natthibhāvo sukhaṃ. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya jānanabhāvo sukhaṃ, ajānanabhāvo dukkhanti attho.

[03] ^b^kiṃ anusayo anusetī^eb^ti katamo anusayo anuseti. appahīnaṭṭhena sayito viya hotīti anusayapucchaṃ pucchati. ^b^na kho, āvuso ^a^M2.0267^ea^ visākha, sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī^eb^ti na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti. na sabbāya sukhāya vedanāya so appahīno, na sabbaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha uppajjatīti attho. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^kiṃ pahātabba^eb^nti ayaṃ pahānapucchā nāma.

[03] ^b^rāgaṃ tena pajahatī^eb^ti ettha ekeneva byākaraṇena dve pucchā vissajjesi. idha bhikkhu rāgānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, jhānavikkhambhitaṃ rāgānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samugghāteti. so anāgāmimaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva paṭhamajjhāne nānuseti nāma. tenāha -- ``na tattha rāgānusayo anusetī''ti. ^b^tadāyatana^eb^nti taṃ āyatanaṃ, paramassāsabhāvena patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ arahattanti attho. ^b^iti anuttaresū^eb^ti evaṃ anuttarā vimokkhāti laddhanāme arahatte. ^b^pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato^eb^ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa. ^b^uppajjati pihāpaccayā domanassa^eb^nti patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati. taṃ panetaṃ na patthanāya paṭṭhapanamūlakaṃ uppajjati, patthetvā alabhantassa pana alābhamūlakaṃ uppajjamānaṃ, ``uppajjati pihāpaccayā''ti vuttaṃ. tattha kiñcāpi domanassaṃ nāma ekantena akusalaṃ, idaṃ pana sevitabbaṃ domanassaṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. yogino hi ^a^P2.0369^ea^ temāsikaṃ chamāsikaṃ vā navamāsikaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ gaṇhanti. tesu yo taṃ taṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā antokālaparicchedeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti ghaṭento vāyamanto na sakkoti yathāparicchinnakālena ^a^V2.0263^ea^ pāpuṇituṃ, tassa balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati, āḷindikavāsimahāphussadevattherassa viya assudhārā pavattanti. thero kira ekūnavīsativassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūresi. tassa, ``imasmiṃ vāre arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmi, imasmiṃ vāre visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī''ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontasseva ekūnavīsativassāni atikkantāni. pavāraṇādivase āgate therassa assupātena muttadivaso nāma nāhosi. vīsatime pana vasse arahattaṃ pāṇuṇi.

[03] ^b^paṭighaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0268^ea^ ^b^tena pajahatī^eb^ti ettha domanasseneva paṭighaṃ pajahati. na hi paṭigheneva paṭighappahānaṃ, domanassena vā domanassappahānaṃ nāma atthi. ayaṃ pana bhikkhu temāsikādīsu aññataraṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā iti paṭisañcikkhati -- ``passa bhikkhu, kiṃ tuyhaṃ sīlena hīnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, udāhu vīriyena, udāhu paññāya, nanu te sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ supaggahitaṃ paññā sūrā hutvā vahatī''ti. so evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitvā, ``na dāni puna imassa domanassassa uppajjituṃ dassāmī''ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā antotemāse vā antochamāse vā antonavamāse vā anāgāmimaggena taṃ samugghāteti. iminā pariyāyena paṭigheneva paṭighaṃ, domanasseneva domanassaṃ pajahati nāma.

[03] ^b^na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetī^eb^ti tattha evarūpe domanasse paṭighānusayo nānuseti. na taṃ ārabbha uppajjati, pahīnova tattha paṭighānusayoti attho. ^b^avijjaṃ tena pajahatī^eb^ti idha bhikkhu avijjānusayaṃ vikkhambhetvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, jhānavikkhambhitaṃ avijjānusayaṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattamaggena samugghāteti. so arahattamaggena pahīnopi tathā vikkhambhitattāva catutthajjhāne ^a^P2.0370^ea^ nānuseti nāma. tenāha -- ``na tattha avijjānusayo anusetī''ti.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ idāni paṭibhāgapucchaṃ pucchanto ^b^sukhāya panāyye^eb^tiādimāha. tassa vissajjane yasmā sukhassa dukkhaṃ, dukkhassa ca sukhaṃ paccanīkaṃ, tasmā dvīsu vedanāsu visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito. upekkhā pana andhakārā avibhūtā duddīpanā, avijjāpi tādisāvāti tenettha sabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito. yattakesu pana ṭhānesu avijjā tamaṃ karoti, tattakesu ^a^V2.0264^ea^ vijjā tamaṃ vinodetīti visabhāgapaṭibhāgo kathito. ^b^avijjāya kho, āvuso^eb^ti ettha ubhopete dhammā anāsavā lokuttarāti sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito. ^b^vimuttiyā kho, āvuso^eb^ti ettha anāsavaṭṭhena lokuttaraṭṭhena abyākataṭṭhena ca sabhāgapaṭibhāgova kathito. ^b^accayāsī^eb^ti ettha pañhaṃ atikkamitvā gatosīti attho. ^b^nāsakkhi pañhānaṃ pariyantaṃ gahetu^eb^nti pañhānaṃ paricchedapamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi, appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchi. nibbānaṃ nāmetaṃ appaṭibhāgaṃ ^a^M2.0269^ea^, na sakkā nīlaṃ vā pītakaṃ vāti kenaci dhammena saddhiṃ paṭibhāgaṃ katvā dassetuṃ. tañca tvaṃ iminā adhippāyena pucchasīti attho.

[03] ettāvatā cāyaṃ upāsako yathā nāma sattame ghare salākabhattaṃ labhitvā gato bhikkhu satta gharāni atikkamma aṭṭhamassa dvāre ṭhito sabbānipi satta gehāni viraddhova na aññāsi, evamevaṃ appaṭibhāgadhammassa paṭibhāgaṃ pucchanto sabbāsupi sattasu sappaṭibhāgapucchāsu viraddhova hotīti veditabbo. ^b^nibbānogadha^eb^nti nibbānabbhantaraṃ nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ. ^b^nibbānaparāyana^eb^nti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati, na tato paraṃ gacchatīti attho. nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ avasānaṃ assāti ^b^nibbānapariyosānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṇḍitā^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgatā, dhātukusalā āyatanakusalā paṭiccasamuppādakusalā ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalāti attho. ^b^mahāpaññā^eb^ti mahante atthe mahante dhamme mahantā ^a^P2.0371^ea^ niruttiyo mahantāni paṭibhānāni pariggaṇhanasamatthāya paññāya samannāgatā. ^b^yathā taṃ dhammadinnāyā^eb^ti yathā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā byākataṃ, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyanti. ettāvatā ca pana ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto, na sāvakabhāsito. yathā hi rājayuttehi likhitaṃ paṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañchitaṃ hoti, na tāva rājapaṇṇanti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati; lañchitamattaṃ pana rājapaṇṇaṃ nāma hoti, tathā, ``ahampi taṃ evameva byākareyya''nti imāya jinavacanamuddikāya lañchitattā ayaṃ suttanto āhaccavacanena jinabhāsito nāma jāto. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cūḷavedallasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0265^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^dhammasamādānānī^eb^ti dhammoti gahitagahaṇāni. ^b^paccuppannasukha^eb^nti paccuppanne sukhaṃ, āyūhanakkhaṇe sukhaṃ ^a^M2.0270^ea^ sukaraṃ sukhena sakkā pūretuṃ. ^b^āyatiṃ dukkhavipāka^eb^nti anāgate vipākakāle dukkhavipākaṃ. iminā upāyena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ ^b^natthi kāmesu doso^eb^ti vatthukāmesupi kilesakāmesupi doso natthi. ^b^pātabyataṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti te vatthukāmesu kilesakāmena pātabyataṃ pivitabbataṃ, yathāruci paribhuñjitabbataṃ āpajjantīti attho. ^b^moḷibaddhāhī^eb^ti moḷiṃ katvā baddhakesāhi. ^b^paribbājikāhī^eb^ti tāpasaparibbājikāhi. ^b^evamāhaṃsū^eb^ti evaṃ vadanti. ^b^pariññaṃ paññapentī^eb^ti pahānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paññapenti. ^b^māluvāsipāṭikā^eb^ti dīghasaṇṭhānaṃ māluvāpakkaṃ. ^b^phaleyyā^eb^ti ātapena sussitvā bhijjeyya. ^b^sālamūle^eb^ti sālarukkhassa samīpe. ^b^santāsaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti kasmā āpajjati? bhavanavināsabhayā. rukkhamūle patitamāluvābījato hi latā ^a^P2.0372^ea^ uppajjitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhati. sā mahāpattā ceva hoti bahupattā ca, koviḷārapattasadisehi pattehi samannāgatā. atha taṃ rukkhaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya vinandhamānā sabbaviṭapāni sañchādetvā mahantaṃ bhāraṃ janetvā tiṭṭhati. sā vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante oghanaṃ janetvā tassa rukkhassa sabbasākhāpasākhaṃ bhañjati, bhūmiyaṃ nipāteti. tato tasmiṃ rukkhe patiṭṭhitavimānaṃ bhijjati nassati. iti sā bhavanavināsabhayā santāsaṃ āpajjati.

[03] ^b^ārāmadevatā^eb^ti tattha tattha pupphārāmaphalārāmesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^vanadevatā^eb^ti andhavanasubhagavanādīsu vanesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^rukkhadevatā^eb^ti abhilakkhitesu naḷerupucimandādīsu rukkhesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^osadhitiṇavanappatīsū^eb^ti harītakīāmalakīādīsu osadhīsu tālanāḷikerādīsu tiṇesu vanajeṭṭhakesu ca vanappatirukkhesu adhivatthā devatā. ^b^vanakammikā^eb^ti vane kasanalāyanadāruāharaṇagorakkhādīsu kenacideva ^a^V2.0266^ea^ kammena vā vicarakamanussā. ^b^uddhareyyu^eb^nti khādeyyuṃ. ^b^vilambinī^eb^ti vātena pahatapahataṭṭhānesu keḷiṃ karontī viya vilambantī. ^b^sukho imissā^eb^ti evarūpāya māluvālatāya samphassopi sukho, dassanampi sukhaṃ. ayaṃ me dārakānaṃ āpānamaṇḍalaṃ bhavissati, kīḷābhūmi bhavissati, dutiyaṃ ^a^M2.0271^ea^ me vimānaṃ paṭiladdhanti latāya dassanepi samphassepi somanassajātā evamāha.

[03] ^b^viṭabhiṃ kareyyā^eb^ti sākhānaṃ upari chattākārena tiṭṭheyya. ^b^oghanaṃ janeyyā^eb^ti heṭṭhā ghanaṃ janeyya. upari āruyha sakalaṃ rukkhaṃ paliveṭhetvā puna heṭṭhā bhassamānā bhūmiṃ gaṇheyyāti attho. ^b^padāleyyā^eb^ti evaṃ oghanaṃ katvā puna tato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlā otiṇṇasākhāhi abhiruhamānā sabbasākhā paliveṭhentī matthakaṃ patvā teneva niyāmena puna orohitvā ca abhiruhitvā ca sakalarukkhaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharantī sabbasākhā heṭṭhā katvā sayaṃ upari ṭhatvā ^a^P2.0373^ea^ vāte vā vāyante deve vā vassante padāleyya. bhindeyyāti attho. khāṇumattameva tiṭṭheyya, tattha yaṃ sākhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ hoti, taṃ sākhāsu bhijjamānāsu tattha tattheva bhijjitvā sabbasākhāsu bhinnāsu sabbaṃ bhijjati. rukkhaṭṭhakavimānaṃ pana yāva rukkhassa mūlamattampi tiṭṭhati, tāva na nassati. idaṃ pana vimānaṃ sākhaṭṭhakaṃ, tasmā sabbasākhāsu saṃbhijjamānāsu bhijjittha. devatā puttake gahetvā khāṇuke ṭhitā paridevituṃ āraddhā.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ ^b^tibbarāgajātiko^eb^ti bahalarāgasabhāvo. ^b^rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī^eb^ti tibbarāgajātikattā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe ārammaṇe nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. athassa ācariyupajjhāyā daṇḍakammaṃ āṇāpenti. so abhikkhaṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ karonto dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, natveva vītikkamaṃ karoti. ^b^tibbadosajātiko^eb^ti appamattikeneva kuppati, daharasāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ hatthaparāmāsādīni karontova katheti. sopi daṇḍakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. mohajātiko pana idha kataṃ vā katato akataṃ vā akatato na sallakkheti, tāni tāni kiccāni virādheti. sopi daṇḍakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tibbarāgajātiko^eb^tiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbāni. kasmā panettha koci tibbarāgādijātiko hoti, koci na tibbarāgādijātiko? kammaniyāmena. yassa hi ^a^V2.0267^ea^ kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti, alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto, dosamohā ^a^M2.0272^ea^ mandā, tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti, adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkonti. tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti, sukhasīlo akkodhano paññavā vajirūpamañāṇo.

[03] yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti, alobhādosā mandā, amoho balavā, moho mando, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca, paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
[03] yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca, sukhasīlako ^a^P2.0374^ea^ pana hoti akkodhano.
[03] tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti, alobhādayo mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
[03] yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva appakileso hoti, dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo, duṭṭho pana hoti dandhapañño ca.
[03] yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti sukhasīlako ca, mūḷho pana hoti.
[03] tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti, itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca, duṭṭho pana hoti kodhano.
[03] yassa ^a^V2.0268^ea^ ^a^M2.0273^ea^ pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti, lobhādayo mandā, so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hoti.
[03] sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cūḷadhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0269^ea^ ^b^me sutta^eb^nti mahādhammasamādānasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^evaṃkāmā^eb^ti evaṃicchā. ^b^evaṃchandā^eb^ti evaṃajjhāsayā. ^b^evaṃadhippāyā^eb^ti evaṃladdhikā. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ aniṭṭhavaḍḍhane ceva iṭṭhaparihāne ca. ^b^bhagavaṃmūlakā^eb^ti bhagavā mūlaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃmūlakā. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ime, bhante, amhākaṃ dhammā pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhena uppāditā, tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi, bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā. bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti. ^b^bhagavaṃnettikā^eb^ti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetāti. yathāsabhāvato ^a^P2.0375^ea^ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassitā dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti. ^b^bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā^eb^ti catubhūmakā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. paṭisarantīti osaranti samosaranti. apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati, ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmoti? tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ āgacchati. ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmanti? tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhanto bhagavā dhamme paṭisaratītipi bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. ^b^bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātū^eb^ti bhagavatoyeva etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu, tumheyeva no kathetvā dethāti attho.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ^b^sevitabbe^eb^ti ^a^M2.0274^ea^ nissayitabbe. ^b^bhajitabbe^eb^ti upagantabbe. ^b^yathā taṃ aviddasuno^eb^ti yathā aviduno bālassa andhaputhujjanassa. ^b^yathā taṃ viddasuno^eb^ti yathā viduno medhāvino paṇḍitassa.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādāna^eb^nti purimasutte uppaṭipāṭiākārena mātikā ṭhapitā ^a^V2.0270^ea^, idha pana yathādhammaraseneva satthā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. tattha ^b^dhammasamādāna^eb^nti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ^b^avijjāgato^eb^ti avijjāya samannāgato.
[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijjāgato^eb^ti vijjāya samannāgato paññavā.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahāpi dukkhenā^eb^ti ettha micchācāro abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti. sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasampayuttā vā upekkhāsampayuttā vā hoti. sesā pāṇātipātādayo satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena dukkhavedanā honti. idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenā''ti. domanassameva cettha dukkhanti veditabbaṃ. pariyeṭṭhiṃ vā āpajjantassa pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ dukkhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahāpi^eb^ ^a^P2.0376^ea^ ^b^sukhenā^eb^ti ettha pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādoti ime tāva tayo pubbacetanāya ca aparacetanāya cāti dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā honti. sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana dukkhasampayuttāva hoti. sesā satta tissannampi cetanānaṃ vasena sukhavedanā hontiyeva. ^b^sahāpi somanassenā^eb^ti somanassameva cettha sukhanti veditabbaṃ. iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbasamaṅgino vā pubbabhāgaparabhāgesu kāyikaṃ sukhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ tatiyadhammasamādāne idhekacco macchabandho vā hoti, māgaviko vā, pāṇupaghātaṃyeva nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti. tassa garuṭṭhāniyo bhikkhu akāmakasseva pāṇātipāte ādīnavaṃ, pāṇātipātaviratiyā ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā sikkhāpadaṃ deti. so gaṇhantopi dukkhito domanassitova hutvā gaṇhāti. aparabhāge katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā ^a^M2.0275^ea^ rakkhituṃ asakkontopi dukkhitova hoti, tassa pubbāparacetanā dukkhasahagatāva honti. sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana sukhasahagatā vā upekkhāsahagatā vāti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo ^a^V2.0271^ea^. iti pubbabhāgaparabhāgacetanāva sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ -- ``sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenā''ti. domanassameva cettha dukkhanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ catutthadhammasamādāne dasasupi padesu tissopi pubbabhāgāparabhāgasanniṭṭhāpakacetanā sukhasampayuttā hontiyeva, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ -- ``sahāpi sukhena sahāpi somanassenā''ti. somanassameva cettha sukhanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ ^b^tittakālābū^eb^ti tittakarasālābu. ^b^visena saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti halāhalavisena sampayutto missito luḷito. ^b^nacchādessatī^eb^ti na ruccissati na tuṭṭhiṃ karissati. ^b^nigacchasī^eb^ti gamissasi. ^b^appaṭisaṅkhāya piveyyā^eb^ti taṃ appaccavekkhitvā piveyya.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ ^b^āpānīyakaṃso^eb^ti āpānīyassa madhurapānakassa bharitakaṃso. ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti pānakavaṇṇādīhi sampannavaṇṇo, kaṃse pakkhittapānakavasena pānakakaṃsopi evaṃ vutto. ^b^chādessatī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0377^ea^ tañhi halāhalavisaṃ yattha yattha pakkhittaṃ hoti, tassa tasseva rasaṃ deti. tena vuttaṃ ``chādessatī''ti.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ^b^pūtimutta^eb^nti muttameva. yathā hi manussabhāvo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo pūtikāyotveva, tadahujātāpi galocilatā pūtilatātveva vuccati. evaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ gahitaṃ taruṇampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva. ^b^nānābhesajjehī^eb^ti harītakāmalakādīhi nānosadhehi. ^b^sukhī assā^eb^ti arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhī bhaveyya.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^dadhi ca madhu cā^eb^ti suparisuddhaṃ dadhi ca sumadhuraṃ madhu ca. ^b^ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭha^eb^nti ekato katvā missitaṃ āluḷitaṃ. ^b^tassa ta^eb^nti tassa taṃ catumadhurabhesajjaṃ pivato rucceyya. idañca yaṃ bhagandarasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ pakkhandati, na tassa bhesajjaṃ, āhāraṃ thambhetvā maggaṃ avalañjaṃ karoti. yaṃ ^a^M2.0276^ea^ pana pittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ lohitaṃ, tassetaṃ bhesajjaṃ sītalakiriyāya pariyattabhūtaṃ.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ^b^viddhe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0272^ea^ ubbiddhe. meghavigamena dūrībhūteti attho. ^b^vigatavalāhake^eb^ti apagatameghe, ^b^deve^eb^ti ākāse. ^b^ākāsagataṃ tamagata^eb^nti ākāsagataṃ tamaṃ. ^b^puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇaparappavāde^eb^ti puthūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ paresaṃ vāde. ^b^abhivihaccā^eb^ti abhihantvā. ^b^bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate cā^eb^ti saradakāle majjhanhikasamaye ādiccova obhāsaṃ muñcati tapati vijjotatīti.

[03] idaṃ pana suttaṃ devatānaṃ ativiya piyaṃ manāpaṃ. tatridaṃ vatthu -- dakkhiṇadisāyaṃ kira hatthibhogajanapade saṅgaravihāro nāma atthi. tassa bhojanasāladvāre saṅgararukkhe adhivatthā devatā rattibhāge ekassa daharassa sarabhaññavasena idaṃ suttaṃ osārentassa sutvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi. daharo kiṃ esoti āha. ahaṃ, bhante, imasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatāti. kasmiṃ devate pasannāsi, kiṃ sadde, udāhu sutteti? saddo nāma, bhante, yassa kassaci hotiyeva, sutte ^a^P2.0378^ea^ pasannāmhi. satthārā jetavane nisīditvā kathitadivase ca ajja ca ekabyañjanepi nānaṃ natthīti. assosi tvaṃ devate satthārā kathitadivaseti? āma, bhante. kattha ṭhitā assosīti? jetavanaṃ, bhante, gatāmhi, mahesakkhāsu pana devatāsu āgacchantīsu tattha okāsaṃ alabhitvā idheva ṭhatvā assosinti. ettha ṭhitāya sakkā sutthu saddo sotunti? tvaṃ pana, bhante, mayhaṃ saddaṃ suṇasīti? āma devateti. dakkhiṇakaṇṇapasse nisīditvā kathanakālo viya, bhante, hotīti. kiṃ pana devate satthu rūpaṃ passasīti? satthā mameva oloketīti maññamānā saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkomi, bhanteti. visesaṃ pana nibbattetuṃ asakkhittha devateti. devatā tattheva antaradhāyi. taṃ divasaṃ kiresa devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito. evamidaṃ suttaṃ devatānaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] mahādhammasamādānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0273^ea^ ^a^M2.0277^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti vīmaṃsakasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vīmaṃsakenā^eb^ti tayo vīmaṃsakā -- atthavīmaṃsako saṅkhāravīmaṃsako satthuvīmaṃsakoti. tesu, ``paṇḍitā hāvuso, manussā vīmaṃsakā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.2) ettha atthavīmaṃsako āgato. ``yato kho, ānanda, bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti, āyatanakusalo ca hoti, paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca hoti, ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca hoti, ettāvatā kho, ānanda, paṇḍito bhikkhu vīmaṃsakoti alaṃ vacanāyā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.124) ettha saṅkhāravīmaṃsako āgato. imasmiṃ pana sutte satthuvīmaṃsako adhippeto. ^b^cetopariyāya^eb^nti cittavāraṃ cittaparicchedaṃ. ^b^samannesanā^eb^ti esanā pariyesanā upaparikkhā. ^b^iti viññāṇāyā^eb^ti evaṃ vijānanatthāya.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabbo^eb^ti idha kalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ dasseti. mahā hi esa kalyāṇamittūpanissayo ^a^P2.0379^ea^ nāma. tassa mahantabhāvo evaṃ veditabbo -- ekasmiṃ hi samaye āyasmā ānando upaḍḍhaṃ attano ānubhāvena hoti, upaḍḍhaṃ kalyāṇamittānubhāvenāti cintetvā attano dhammatāya nicchetuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, -- ``upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante, brahmacariyassa, yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā''ti. bhagavā āha -- ``mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ, ānanda, sakalamevidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā, kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, ānanda, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissati. kathañcānanda, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto...pe0... ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaroti. idhānanda, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti...pe0... sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ evaṃ kho, ānanda, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto...pe0... bahulīkaroti, tadamināpetaṃ, ānanda, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ. yathā sakalamevidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā. mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma ^a^V2.0274^ea^ jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti. jarādhammā...pe0... sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammā ^a^M2.0278^ea^ sattā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.2).

[03] bhikkhūnaṃ bāhiraṅgasampattiṃ kathentopi āha -- ``bāhiraṃ, bhikkhave, aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, kalyāṇamittatā. kalyāṇamittatā, bhikkhave, mahato atthāya saṃvattatī''ti (a0 ni0 1.113). mahācundassa kilesasallekhapaṭipadaṃ kathentopi, ``pare pāpamittā bhavissanti, mayamettha kalyāṇamittā bhavissāmāti sallekho karaṇīyo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.83) āha. meghiyattherassa vimuttiparipācaniyadhamme kathentopi, ``aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattanti. katame pañca? idha, meghiya, bhikkhu ^a^P2.0380^ea^ kalyāṇamitto hoti''ti (udā0 31) kalyāṇamittūpanissayameva visesesi. piyaputtassa rāhulattherassa abhiṇhovādaṃ dentopi --
[21] ``mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe, pantañca sayanāsanaṃ.
[22] vivittaṃ appanigghosaṃ, mattaññū hohi bhojane..
[21] cīvare piṇḍapāte ca, paccaye sayanāsane.
[22] etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, mā lokaṃ punarāgamī''ti.. (su0 ni0 340, 341) --

[25] kalyāṇamittūpanissayameva sabbapaṭhamaṃ kathesi. evaṃ mahā esa kalyāṇamittūpanissayo nāma. idhāpi taṃ dassento bhagavā ^b^dvīsu dhammesu tathāgato samannesitabbo^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi. paṇḍito bhikkhu dvīsu dhammesu tathāgataṃ esatu gavesatūti attho. etena bhagavā ayaṃ mahājaccoti vā, lakkhaṇasampannoti vā, abhirūpo dassanīyoti vā, abhiññāto abhilakkhitoti vā, imaṃ nissāyāhaṃ cīvarādayo paccaye labhissāmīti vā, evaṃ cintetvā maṃ nissāya vasanakiccaṃ ^a^V2.0275^ea^ natthi. yo pana evaṃ sallakkheti, ``pahoti me esa satthā hutvā satthukiccaṃ sādhetu''nti, so maṃ bhajatūti sīhanādaṃ nadati. buddhasīhanādo kira nāmesa suttantoti.

[03] idāni ^a^M2.0279^ea^ te dve dhamme dassento ^b^cakkhusotaviññeyyesū^eb^ti āha. tattha satthu kāyiko samācāro vīmaṃsakassa cakkhuviññeyyo dhammo nāma. vācasiko samācāro sotaviññeyyo dhammo nāma. idāni tesu samannesitabbākāraṃ dassento ^b^ye saṃkiliṭṭhā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^saṃkiliṭṭhā^eb^ti kilesasampayuttā. te ca na cakkhusotaviññeyyā. yathā pana udake calante vā pupphuḷake vā muñcante anto maccho atthīti viññāyati, evaṃ pāṇātipātādīni vā karontassa, musāvādādīni vā bhaṇantassa kāyavacīsamācāre disvā ca sutvā ca taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhanti viññāyati. tasmā evamāha. saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa hi kāyavacīsamācārāpi saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva nāma. ^b^na te tathāgatassa saṃvijjantī^eb^ti na te tathāgatassa atthi. na upalabbhantīti evaṃ jānātīti attho. natthitāyeva hi te na upalabbhanti na paṭicchannatāya. tathā hi bhagavā ekadivasaṃ imesu dhammesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ^a^P2.0381^ea^ pavārento āha -- ``handa dāni, bhikkhave, pavāremi vo, na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā''ti. evaṃ vutte āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``na kho mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato kiñci garahāma kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā. bhagavā hi, bhante, anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjānetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido. maggānugā ca, bhante, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchāsamannāgatā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.215). evaṃ parisuddhā tathāgatassa kāyavacīsamācārā. uttaropi sudaṃ māṇavo tathāgatassa kāyavacīdvāre anārādhanīyaṃ kiñci passissāmīti satta māse anubandhitvā likkhāmattampi na addasa. manussabhūto vā esa buddhabhūtassa kāyavacīdvāre kiṃ anārādhanīyaṃ passissati? māropi devaputto bodhisattassa sato mahābhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya chabbassāni gavesamāno kiñci anārādhanīyaṃ nāddasa, antamaso cetoparivitakkamattampi. māro kira cintesi -- ``sacassa vitakkitamattampi akusalaṃ passissāmi, tattheva naṃ muddhani paharitvā pakkamissāmī''ti. so chabbassāni adisvā buddhabhūtampi ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhitvā kiñci vajjaṃ apassanto gamanasamaye vanditvā --
[21] ``mahāvīra ^a^V2.0276^ea^ ^a^M2.0280^ea^ mahāpuññaṃ, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ.
[22] sabbaverabhayātītaṃ, pāde vandāmi gotama''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.159) --
[25] gāthaṃ vatvā gato.

[03] ^b^vītimissā^eb^ti kāle kaṇhā, kāle sukkāti evaṃ vomissakā. ^b^vodātā^eb^ti parisuddhā nikkilesā. ^b^saṃvijjantī^eb^ti vodātā dhammā atthi upalabbhanti. tathāgatassa hi parisuddhā kāyasamācārādayo. tenāha -- ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa arakkheyyāni. katamāni cattāri? parisuddhakāyasamācāro, bhikkhave, tathāgato, natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya, `mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī'ti. parisuddhavacīsamācāro... parisuddhamanosamācāro... parisuddhājīvo, bhikkhave, tathāgato ^a^P2.0382^ea^, natthi tathāgatassa micchājīvo, yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya, mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī''ti (a0 ni0 7.58).

[03] ^b^imaṃ kusalaṃ dhamma^eb^nti imaṃ anavajjaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ. ``ayamāyasmā satthā kiṃ nu kho dīgharattaṃ samāpanno aticirakālato paṭṭhāya iminā samannāgato, udāhu ittarasamāpanno hiyyo vā pare vā parasuve vā divase samāpanno''ti evaṃ gavesatūti attho. ekaccena hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantena bahu micchājīvakammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ tattha kālātikkame paññāyati, pākaṭaṃ hoti. so aññataraṃ paccantagāmaṃ vā samuddatīraṃ vā gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā āraññako viya hutvā viharati. manussā sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā tassa paṇīte paccaye denti. janapadavāsino bhikkhū tassa parihāraṃ disvā, ``atidappito vatāyaṃ āyasmā, ko nu kho eso''ti pariggaṇhantā, ``asukaṭṭhāne asukaṃ nāma micchājīvaṃ katvā pakkantabhikkhū''ti ñatvā na sakkā iminā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā kātunti sannipatitvā dhammena samena ukkhepanīyādīsu aññataraṃ kammaṃ karonti. evarūpāya paṭicchannapaṭipattiyā atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā vīmaṃsāpetuṃ evamāha.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0277^ea^ ^b^jānātī^eb^ti dīgharattaṃ samāpanno, na ittarasamāpannoti jānāti. anacchariyaṃ cetaṃ. yaṃ tathāgatassa etarahi sabbaññutaṃ pattassa dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ ^a^M2.0281^ea^ parisuddhaṃ bhaveyya. yassa bodhisattakālepi evaṃ ahosi.

[03] atīte kira gandhārarājā ca vedeharājā ca dvepi sahāyakā hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā rajjāni puttānaṃ niyyātetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ araññagāmake piṇḍāya caranti. paccanto nāma dullabhaloṇo hoti. tato aloṇaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā ekissāya sālāya nisīditvā pivanti. antarantare manussā loṇacuṇṇaṃ āharitvā denti. ekadivasaṃ eko vedehisissa paṇṇe pakkhipitvā loṇacuṇṇaṃ adāsi ^a^P2.0383^ea^. vedehisi gahetvā upaḍḍhaṃ gandhārisissa-santike ṭhapetvā upaḍḍhaṃ attano santike ṭhapesi. tato thokaṃ paribhuttāvasesaṃ disvā, ``mā idaṃ nassī''ti paṇṇena veṭhetvā tiṇagahane ṭhapesi. puna ekasmiṃ divase yāgupānakāle satiṃ katvā olokento taṃ disvā gandhārisiṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``ito thokaṃ gaṇhatha ācariyā''ti āha. kuto te laddhaṃ vedehisīti? tasmiṃ divase paribhuttāvasesaṃ ``mā nassī''ti mayā ṭhapitanti. gandhārisi gahetuṃ na icchati, aloṇakaṃyeva yāguṃ pivitvā vedehaṃ isiṃ avoca --
[21] ``hitvā gāmasahassāni, paripuṇṇāni soḷasa.
[22] koṭṭhāgārāni phītāni, sannidhiṃ dāni kubbasī''ti.. (jā0 1.7.76).
[03] vedehisi avoca -- ``tumhe rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitā, idāni kasmā loṇacuṇṇamattasannidhikāraṇā pabbajjāya anucchavikaṃ na karothā''ti? kiṃ mayā kataṃ vedehisīti? atha naṃ āha --
[21] ``hitvā gandhāravisayaṃ, pahūtadhanadhāriyaṃ.
[22] pasāsanato nikkhanto, idha dāni pasāsasī''ti.. (jā0 1.7.77).
[03] gandhāro āha --
[21] ``dhammaṃ ^a^V2.0278^ea^ bhaṇāmi vedeha, adhammo me na ruccati.
[22] dhammaṃ me bhaṇamānassa, na pāpamupalimpatī''ti.. (jā0 1.7.78).
[03] vedeho ^a^M2.0282^ea^ āha --
[21] ``yena kenaci vaṇṇena, paro labhati ruppanaṃ.
[22] mahatthiyampi ce vācaṃ, na taṃ bhāseyya paṇḍito''ti.. (jā0 1.7.79).
[03] gandhāro āha --
[21] ``kāmaṃ ruppatu vā mā vā, bhusaṃva vikirīyatu.
[22] dhammaṃ me bhaṇamānassa, na pāpamupalimpatī''ti.. (jā0 1.7.80).
[03] tato vedehisi yassa sakāpi buddhi natthi, ācariyasantike vinayaṃ na sikkhati, so andhamahiṃso viya vane caratīti cintetvā āha --
[21] ``no ^a^P2.0384^ea^ ce assa sakā buddhi, vinayo vā susikkhito.
[22] vane andhamahiṃsova, careyya bahuko jano..
[21] yasmā ca panidhekacce, āceramhi susikkhitā.
[22] tasmā vinītavinayā, caranti susamāhitā''ti.. (jā0 1.7.81-82).

[03] evañca pana vatvā vedehisi ajānitvā mayā katanti gandhārisiṃ khamāpesi. te ubhopi tapaṃ caritvā brahmalokaṃ agamaṃsu. evaṃ tathāgatassa bodhisattakālepi dīgharattaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^uttajjhāpanno ayamāyasmā bhikkhu yasapatto^eb^ti ayamāyasmā amhākaṃ satthā bhikkhu ñattaṃ paññātabhāvaṃ ^a^V2.0279^ea^ pākaṭabhāvaṃ ajjhāpanno nu kho, sayañca parivārasampattiṃ patto nu kho noti. tena cassa paññātajjhāpannabhāvena yasasannissitabhāvena ca kiṃ ekacce ādīnavā sandissanti udāhu noti evaṃ samannesantūti dasseti. ^b^na tāva, bhikkhave^eb^ti, bhikkhave, yāva bhikkhu na rājarājamahāmattādīsu abhiññātabhāvaṃ vā parivārasampattiṃ vā āpanno hoti, tāva ekacce mānātimānādayo ādīnavā na saṃvijjanti upasantūpasanto viya sotāpanno viya sakadāgāmī viya ca viharati. ariyo nu kho puthujjano nu khotipi ñātuṃ na sakkā hoti.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ ^a^M2.0283^ea^ ^b^ca kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti yadā pana idhekacco bhikkhu ñāto hoti parivārasampanno vā, tadā tiṇhena siṅgena gogaṇaṃ vijjhanto duṭṭhagoṇo viya, migasaṅghaṃ abhimaddamāno dīpi viya ca aññe bhikkhū tattha tattha vijjhanto agāravo asabhāgavutti aggapādena bhūmiṃ phusanto viya carati. ekacco pana kulaputto yathā yathā ñāto hoti yasassī, tathā tathā phalabhārabharito viya sāli suṭṭhutaraṃ onamati, rājarājamahāmattādīsu upasaṅkamantesu akiñcanabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chinnavisāṇausabho viya, caṇḍāladārako viya ca sorato nivāto nīcacitto hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ceva sadevakassa ca lokassa, hitāya sukhāya paṭipajjati. evarūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ sandhāya ``nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā''ti āha.

[03] tathāgato pana aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu tādī, so hi lābhepi tādī, alābhepi ^a^P2.0385^ea^ tādī, yasepi tādī, ayasepi tādī, pasaṃsāyapi tādī, nindāyapi tādī, sukhepi tādī, dukkhepi tādī, tasmā sabbākārena nāssa idhekacce ādīnavā saṃvijjanti. ^b^abhayūparato^eb^ti abhayo hutvā uparato, accantūparato satatūparatoti attho. na vā bhayena uparatotipi abhayūparato. cattāri hi bhayāni kilesabhayaṃ vaṭṭabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ upavādabhayanti. puthujjano catūhipi bhayehi bhāyati. sekkhā tīhi, tesañhi duggatibhayaṃ pahīnaṃ, iti satta sekkhā bhayūparatā, khīṇāsavo abhayūparato nāma, tassa hi ekampi bhayaṃ natthi. kiṃ paravādabhayaṃ natthīti? natthi. parānuddayaṃ pana paṭicca, ``mādisaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ paṭicca sattā mā nassantū''ti upavādaṃ rakkhati. mūluppalavāpivihāravāsī yasatthero viya.

[03] thero ^a^V2.0280^ea^ kira mūluppalavāpigāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. athassa upaṭṭhākakuladvāraṃ pattassa pattaṃ gahetvā thaṇḍilapīṭhakaṃ nissāya āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ. amaccadhītāpi taṃyeva pīṭhakaṃ nissāya paratobhāge nīcataraṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi. eko nevāsiko bhikkhu pacchā piṇḍāya paviṭṭho dvāre ṭhatvāva olokento thero amaccadhītarā saddhiṃ ekamañce nisinnoti sallakkhetvā, ``ayaṃ paṃsukūliko vihāreva upasantūpasanto ^a^M2.0284^ea^ viya viharati, antogāme pana upaṭṭhāyikāhi saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīdatī''ti cintetvā, ``kiṃ nu kho mayā duddiṭṭha''nti punappunaṃ oloketvā tathāsaññīva hutvā pakkāmi. theropi bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gantvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisīdi. nevāsikopi katabhattakicco vihāraṃ gantvā, ``taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ niggaṇhitvā vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmī''ti asaññatanīhārena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paribhogaghaṭato uluṅkena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsaddaṃ karonto pāde dhovi. thero, ``ko nu kho ayaṃ asaññatacāriko''ti āvajjanto sabbaṃ ñatvā, ``ayaṃ mayi manaṃ padosetvā apāyūpago mā ahosī''ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalasamīpe pallaṅkena nisīdi. nevāsiko duṭṭhākārena ghaṭikaṃ ukkhipitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto paviṭṭho theraṃ apassanto, ``heṭṭhāmañcaṃ paviṭṭho ^a^P2.0386^ea^ bhavissatī''ti oloketvā tatthāpi apassanto nikkhamituṃ ārabhi. thero ukkāsi. itaro uddhaṃ olokento disvā adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto evamāha -- ``patirūpaṃ te, āvuso, paṃsukūlika evaṃ ānubhāvasampannassa upaṭṭhāyikāya saddhiṃ ekamañce nisīditu''nti. pabbajitā nāma, bhante, mātugāmena saddhiṃ na ekamañce nisīdanti, tumhehi pana duddiṭṭhametanti. evaṃ khīṇāsavā parānuddayāya upavādaṃ rakkhanti.

[03] ^b^khayā rāgassā^eb^ti rāgassa khayeneva. vītarāgattā kāme na paṭisevati, na paṭisaṅkhāya vāretvāti. ^b^tañce^eb^ti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahānaṃ ñatvā tattha tattha ṭhitanisinnakālādīsupi catuparisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvāpi itipi satthā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho vantakileso pahīnamalo abbhā muttapuṇṇacando viya suparisuddhoti evaṃ tathāgatassa kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ vīmaṃsakaṃ bhikkhuṃ pare evaṃ puccheyyuṃ ceti attho.

[03] ^b^ākārā^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^anvayā^eb^ti anubuddhiyo. ^b^saṅghe vā viharanto^eb^ti appekadā aparicchinnagaṇanassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe viharanto. ^b^eko vā viharanto^eb^ti icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0281^ea^, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti, temāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti evaṃ paṭisallāne ceva pālileyyakavanasaṇḍe ca ekako viharanto. ^b^sugatā^eb^ti suṭṭhugatā suppaṭipannā kārakā yuttapayuttā. evarūpāpi hi ekacce bhikkhū atthi. ^b^duggatā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0285^ea^ duṭṭhugatā duppaṭipannā kāyadaḷhibahulā vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā. evarūpāpi ekacce atthi. ^b^gaṇamanusāsantī^eb^ti gaṇabandhanena baddhā gaṇārāmā gaṇabahulikā hutvā gaṇaṃ pariharanti. evarūpāpi ekacce atthi. tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā gaṇato nissaṭā visaṃsaṭṭhā vippamuttavihārinopi atthi.

[03] ^b^āmisesu sandissantī^eb^ti āmisagiddhā āmisacakkhukā catupaccayāamisatthameva āhiṇḍamānā āmisesu sandissamānakabhikkhūpi atthi. āmisena anupalittā catūhi paccayehi ^a^P2.0387^ea^ vinivattamānasā abbhā muttacandasadisā hutvā viharamānāpi atthi. ^b^nāyamāyasmā taṃ tena avajānātī^eb^ti ayaṃ āyasmā satthā tāya tāya paṭipattiyā taṃ taṃ puggalaṃ nāvajānāti, ayaṃ paṭipanno kārako, ayaṃ gaṇato nissaṭo visaṃsaṭṭho. ayaṃ āmisena anupalitto paccayehi vinivattamānaso abbhā mutto candimā viyāti evamassa gehasitavasena ussādanāpi natthi. ayaṃ duppaṭipanno akārako kāyadaḷhibahulo vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno, ayaṃ gaṇabandhanabaddho, ayaṃ āmisagiddho lolo āmisacakkhukoti evamassa gehasitavasena apasādanāpi natthīti attho. iminā kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? tathāgatassa sattesu tādibhāvo kathito hoti. ayañhi --
[21] ``vadhakassa devadattassa, corassaṅgulimālino.
[22] dhanapāle rāhule ca, sabbesaṃ samako munī''ti.. (mi0 pa0 6.6.5).

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatra, bhikkhave^eb^ti tesu dvīsu vīmaṃsakesu. yo, ``ke panāyasmato ākārā''ti pucchāyaṃ āgato gaṇṭhivīmaṃsako ca, yo ``abhayūparato ayamāyasmā''ti āgato mūlavīmaṃsako ca. tesu mūlavīmaṃsakena tathāgatova uttari paṭipucchitabbo. so hi pubbe parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṅgato. paro ca nāma jānitvāpi katheyya ajānitvāpi. evamassa kathā bhūtāpi hoti abhūtāpi, tasmā parasseva kathāya niṭṭhaṃ agantvā tato uttari tathāgatova paṭipucchitabboti attho.

[03] ^b^byākaramāno^eb^ti ^a^V2.0282^ea^ ettha yasmā tathāgatassa micchābyākaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā sammā micchāti avatvā byākaramānotveva vuttaṃ. ^b^etaṃ pathohamasmi^eb^ ^a^M2.0286^ea^ ^b^etaṃ gocaro^eb^ti esa mayhaṃ patho esa gocaroti attho. ``etāpātho''tipi pāṭho, tassattho mayhaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ, svāhaṃ tassa parisuddhabhāvena vīmaṃsakassa bhikkhuno ñāṇamukhe etāpātho, evaṃ āpāthaṃ gacchāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^no ca tena tammayo^eb^ti tenapi cāhaṃ parisuddhena sīlena na tammayo, na sataṇho, parisuddhasīlattāva nittaṇhohamasmīti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^uttaruttariṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0388^ea^ ^b^paṇītapaṇīta^eb^nti uttaruttariṃ ceva paṇītatarañca katvā deseti. ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāga^eb^nti kaṇhaṃ ceva sukkañca, tañca kho sappaṭibhāgaṃ savipakkhaṃ katvā, kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā sukkanti sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhanti evaṃ sappaṭibhāgaṃ katvā kaṇhasukkaṃ deseti. kaṇhaṃ desentopi saussāhaṃ savipākaṃ deseti, sukkaṃ desentopi saussāhaṃ savipākaṃ deseti. ^b^abhiññāya idhekaccaṃ dhammaṃ dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ desite dhamme ekaccaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ abhiññāya tena paṭivedhadhammena desanādhamme niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. ^b^satthari pasīdatī^eb^ti evaṃ dhamme niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddho so bhagavāti satthari pasīdati. tena pana bhagavatā yo dhammo akkhāto, sopi svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo niyyānikattā. yvāssa taṃ dhammaṃ paṭipanno saṅgho, sopi suppaṭipanno vaṅkādidosarahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ dhamme saṅghepi pasīdati. ^b^tañce^eb^ti taṃ evaṃ pasannaṃ tattha tattha tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentaṃ bhikkhuṃ.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi satthuvīmaṃsanakāraṇehi. ^b^imehi padehī^eb^ti imehi akkharasampiṇḍanapadehi. ^b^imehi byañjanehī^eb^ti imehi idha vuttehi akkharehi. ^b^saddhā niviṭṭhā^eb^ti okappanā patiṭṭhitā. ^b^mūlajātā^eb^ti sotāpattimaggavasena sañjātamūlā. sotāpattimaggo hi saddhāya mūlaṃ nāma. ^b^ākāravatī^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ pariyesitvā gahitattā sakāraṇā. ^b^dassanamūlikā^eb^ti sotāpattimaggamūlikā. so hi dassananti vuccati. ^b^daḷhā^eb^ti thirā. ^b^asaṃhāriyā^eb^ti harituṃ na sakkā. ^b^samaṇena vā^eb^ti samitapāpasamaṇena vā. ^b^brāhmaṇena vā^eb^ti bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇena vā. ^b^devena vā^eb^ti upapattidevena vā. ^b^mārena vā^eb^ti vasavattimārena ^a^M2.0287^ea^ vā, sotāpannassa hi vasavattimārenāpi saddhā asaṃhāriyā hoti sūrambaṭṭhassa viya.

[03] so ^a^V2.0283^ea^ kira satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā gehaṃ āgato. atha māro dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ buddharūpaṃ māpetvā tassa ^a^P2.0389^ea^ gharadvāre ṭhatvā -- ``satthā āgato''ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. sūro cintesi, ``ahaṃ idāneva satthu santikā dhammaṃ sutvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī''ti upasaṅkamitvā satthusaññāya vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. māro āha -- ``yaṃ te mayā, sūrambaṭṭha, rūpaṃ aniccaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ aniccanti kathitaṃ, taṃ anupadhāretvāva sahasā mayā evaṃ vuttaṃ. tasmā tvaṃ rūpaṃ niccaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ niccanti gaṇhāhī''ti. sūro cintesi -- ``aṭṭhānametaṃ, yaṃ buddhā anupadhāretvā apaccakkhaṃ katvā kiñci katheyyuṃ, addhā ayaṃ mayhaṃ vibādhanatthaṃ māro āgato''ti. tato naṃ tvaṃ māroti āha. so musāvādaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi, āma mārosmīti paṭijāni. kasmā āgatosīti vutte tava saddhācālanatthanti āha. kaṇha pāpima, tvaṃ tāva ekako tiṭṭha, tādisānaṃ mārānaṃ satampi sahassampi mama saddhaṃ cāletuṃ asamatthaṃ, maggena āgatā saddhā nāma silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitasineru viya acalā hoti, kiṃ tvaṃ etthāti accharaṃ pahari. so ṭhātuṃ asakkonto tatthevantaradhāyi. ^b^brahmunā vā^eb^ti brahmakāyikādīsu aññatarabrahmunā vā. ^b^kenaci vā lokasmi^eb^nti ete samaṇādayo ṭhapetvā aññenapi kenaci vā lokasmiṃ harituṃ na sakkā. ^b^dhammasamannesanā^eb^ti sabhāvasamannesanā. ^b^dhammatāsusamanniṭṭho^eb^ti dhammatāya susamanniṭṭho, sabhāveneva suṭṭhu samannesito hotīti attho. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] vīmaṃsakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0284^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti kosambiyasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kosambiya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇīādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ, tasmā kosambīti saṅkhaṃ agamāsi. kusambassa ^a^P2.0390^ea^ nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattātipi ^a^M2.0288^ea^ eke. ^b^ghositārāme^eb^ti ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme.

[03] pubbe kira addilaraṭṭhaṃ nāma ahosi. tato kotūhalako nāma daliddo chātakabhayena saputtadāro kedāraparicchinnaṃ subhikkhaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchanto puttaṃ vahituṃ asakkonto chaḍḍetvā agamāsi. mātā nivattitvā taṃ gahetvā gatā. te ekaṃ gopālakagāmakaṃ pavisiṃsu, gopālakānañca tadā pahatapāyaso paṭiyatto hoti, tato pāyasaṃ labhitvā bhuñjiṃsu. atha so puriso pahūtapāyasaṃ bhuñjitvā jirāpetuṃ asakkonto rattibhāge kālaṃ katvā tattheva sunakhiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā kukkuro jāto. so gopālakassa piyo ahosi manāpo, gopālako ca paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. paccekabuddhopi bhattakiccāvasāne kukkurassa ekaṃ piṇḍaṃ deti. so paccekabuddhe sinehaṃ uppādetvā gopālakena saddhiṃ paṇṇasālampi gacchati.

[03] so gopālake asannihite bhattavelāya sayameva gantvā kālārocanatthaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre bhussati, antarāmaggepi caṇḍamige disvā bhussitvā palāpeti. so paccekabuddhe mudukena cittena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. tatrassa ghosakadevaputtotveva nāmaṃ ahosi. so devalokato cavitvā kosambiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kulaghare nibbatti. taṃ aputtako seṭṭhi tassa mātāpitūnaṃ dhanaṃ datvā puttaṃ katvā aggahesi. atha so attano putte jāte sattakkhattuṃ mārāpetuṃ upakkami. so puññavantatāya sattasupi ṭhānesu maraṇaṃ appatvā avasāne ekāya seṭṭhidhītāya veyyattiyena laddhajīviko aparabhāge pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ patvā ^b^ghositaseṭṭhi^eb^ nāma ^a^V2.0285^ea^ jāto. aññepi kosambiyaṃ kukkuṭaseṭṭhi pāvārikaseṭṭhīti dve seṭṭhino santi. imehi saddhiṃ tayo ahesuṃ.

[03] tena ^a^P2.0391^ea^ ca samayena tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ seṭṭhīnaṃ kulūpakā pañcasatā isayo pabbatapāde vasiṃsu. te kālena kālaṃ loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ āgacchanti. athekasmiṃ vāre gimhasamaye manussapathaṃ ^a^M2.0289^ea^ āgacchantā nirudakamahākantāraṃ atikkamitvā kantārapariyosāne mahantaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ disvā cintesuṃ -- ``yādiso ayaṃ rukkho, addhā ettha mahesakkhāya devatāya bhavitabbaṃ, sādhu vatassa, sace no pānīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyyā''ti. devatā isīnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmīti attano ānubhāvena viṭapantarato naṅgalasīsamattaṃ udakadhāraṃ pavattesi. isigaṇo rajatakkhandhasadisaṃ udakavaṭṭiṃ disvā attano bhājanehi udakaṃ gahetvā paribhogaṃ katvā cintesi -- ``devatāya amhākaṃ paribhogaudakaṃ dinnaṃ, idaṃ pana agāmakaṃ mahāaraññaṃ, sādhu vatassa, sace no āhārampi dadeyyā''ti. devatā isīnaṃ upasaṃkappanavasena dibbāni yāgukhajjakādīni datvā santappesi. isayo cintayiṃsu -- ``devatāya amhākaṃ paribhogaudakampi bhojanampi sabbaṃ dinnaṃ, sādhu vatassa, sace no attānaṃ dasseyyā''ti.

[03] devatā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā upaḍḍhakāyaṃ dassesi. te āhaṃsu -- ``devate, mahatī te sampatti, kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatāsī''ti? bhante, nātimahantaṃ parittakaṃ kammaṃ katvāti. upaḍḍhauposathakammaṃ nissāya hi devatāya sā sampatti laddhā.

[03] anāthapiṇḍikassa kira gehe ayaṃ devaputto kammakāro ahosi. seṭṭhissa hi gehe uposathadivasesu antamaso dāsakammakāre upādāya sabbo jano uposathiko hoti. ekadivasaṃ ayaṃ kammakāro ekakova pāto uṭṭhāya kammantaṃ gato. mahāseṭṭhi nivāpaṃ labhanamanusse sallakkhento etassevekassa araññaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā assa sāyamāsatthāya nivāpaṃ adāsi. bhattakārikā dāsī ekasseva bhattaṃ pacitvā araññato āgatassa bhattaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adāsi, kammakāro āha -- ``aññesu divasesu imasmiṃ kāle gehaṃ ekasaddaṃ ahosi, ajja ativiya sannisinnaṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta''nti ^a^P2.0392^ea^? tassa sā ācikkhi -- ``ajja ^a^V2.0286^ea^ imasmiṃ gehe sabbe manussā uposathikā, mahāseṭṭhi tuyhevekassa nivāpaṃ adāsī''ti. evaṃ ammāti? āma sāmīti. imasmiṃ kāle uposathaṃ samādinnassa uposathakammaṃ hoti na hotīti mahāseṭṭhiṃ puccha ammāti? tāya gantvā pucchito mahāseṭṭhi āha -- ``sakalauposathakammaṃ na hoti, upaḍḍhakammaṃ pana hoti, uposathiko hotū''ti ^a^M2.0290^ea^. kammakāro bhattaṃ abhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko hutvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nipajji. tassa āhāraparikkhīṇakāyassa rattiṃ vāto kuppi. so paccūsasamaye kālaṃ katvā upaḍḍhauposathakammanissandena mahāvaṭṭaniaṭaviyaṃ nigrodharukkhe devaputto hutvā nibbatti. so taṃ pavattiṃ isīnaṃ ārocesi.

[03] isayo tumhehi mayaṃ buddho, dhammo, saṅghoti asutapubbaṃ sāvitā, uppanno nu kho loke buddhoti? āma, bhante, uppannoti. idāni kuhiṃ vasatīti? sāvatthiṃ nissāya jetavane, bhanteti. isayo tiṭṭhatha tāva tumhe mayaṃ satthāraṃ passissāmāti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nikkhamitvā anupubbena kosambinagaraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu. mahāseṭṭhino, ``isayo āgatā''ti paccuggamanaṃ katvā, ``sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, bhante''ti nimantetvā punadivase isigaṇassa mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. isayo bhuñjitvāva gacchāmāti āpucchiṃsu. tumhe, bhante, aññasmiṃ kāle ekampi māsaṃ dvepi tayopi cattāropi māse vasitvā gacchatha. imasmiṃ pana vāre hiyyo āgantvā ajjeva gacchāmāti vadatha, kimidanti? āma gahapatayo buddho loke uppanno, na kho pana sakkā jīvitantarāyo vidituṃ, tena mayaṃ turitā gacchāmāti. tena hi, bhante, mayampi gacchāma, amhehi saddhiṃyeva gacchathāti. tumhe agāriyā nāma mahājaṭā, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, mayaṃ puretaraṃ gamissāmāti nikkhamitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dvepi divasāni avasitvā turitagamaneneva sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanavihāre satthu santikameva agamaṃsu. satthu madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.

[03] tepi ^a^P2.0393^ea^ tayo seṭṭhino pañcahi pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sappimadhuphāṇitādīni ceva paṭṭunnadukūlādīni ca ādāya kosambito nikkhamitvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanasāmante khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. satthā tiṇṇampi sahāyakānaṃ madhuradhammakathaṃ kathesi. te balavasomanassajātā satthāraṃ nimantetvā ^a^V2.0287^ea^ punadivase mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. puna nimantetvā punadivaseti evaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ dānaṃ datvā, ``amhākaṃ janapadaṃ āgamanāya paṭiññaṃ dethā''ti pādamūle nipajjiṃsu. bhagavā, ``suññāgāre kho gahapatayo tathāgatā abhiramantī''ti āha. ettāvatā paṭiññā dinnā nāma hotīti gahapatayo ^a^M2.0291^ea^ sallakkhetvā dinnā no bhagavatā paṭiññāti dasabalaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge yojane yojane ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāretvā anupubbena kosambiṃ patvā, ``loke buddho uppanno''ti kathayiṃsu. tayopi janā attano attano ārāme mahantaṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā bhagavato vasanatthāya vihāre kārāpayiṃsu. tattha kukkuṭaseṭṭhinā kārito ^b^kukkuṭārāmo^eb^ nāma ahosi. pāvārikaseṭṭhinā ambavane kārito ^b^pāvārikambavano^eb^ nāma ahosi. ghositena kārito ^b^ghositārāmo^eb^ nāma ahosi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``ghositaseṭṭhinā kārite ārāme''ti.

[03] ^b^bhaṇḍanajātā^eb^tiādīsu kalahassa pubbabhāgo bhaṇḍanaṃ nāma, taṃ jātaṃ etesanti ^b^bhaṇḍanajātā^eb^. hatthaparāmāsādivasena matthakaṃ patto kalaho jāto etesanti ^b^kalahajātā^eb^. viruddhabhūtaṃ vādanti vivādaṃ, taṃ āpannāti ^b^vivādāpannā. mukhasattīhī^eb^ti vācāsattīhi. ^b^vitudantā^eb^ti vijjhantā. ^b^te na ceva aññamaññaṃ saññāpenti na ca saññattiṃ upentī^eb^ti te atthañca kāraṇañca dassetvā neva aññamaññaṃ jānāpenti. sacepi saññāpetuṃ ārabhanti, tathāpi saññattiṃ na upenti, jānituṃ na icchantīti attho. nijjhattiyāpi eseva nayo. ettha ca ^b^nijjhattī^eb^ti saññattivevacanamevetaṃ. kasmā panete bhaṇḍanajātā ahesunti? appamattakena kāraṇena.

[03] dve kira bhikkhū ekasmiṃ āvāse vasanti vinayadharo ca suttantiko ca. tesu suttantiko bhikkhu ekadivasaṃ ^a^P2.0394^ea^ vaccakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami. vinayadharo pacchā paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi, āvuso, tayā idaṃ udakaṃ ṭhapitanti? āma, āvusoti. tvamettha āpattibhāvaṃ na jānāsīti? āma na jānāmīti. hoti, āvuso, ettha āpattīti. sace hoti desessāmīti. sace pana te, āvuso, asañcicca asatiyā kataṃ, natthi te āpattīti. so tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi.

[03] vinayadharo ^a^V2.0288^ea^ attano nissitakānaṃ, ``ayaṃ suttantiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī''ti ārocesi. te tassa nissitake disvā -- ``tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī''ti āhaṃsu. te gantvā attano upajjhāyassa ārocesuṃ. so ^a^M2.0292^ea^ evamāha -- ``ayaṃ vinayadharo pubbe `anāpattī'ti vatvā idāni `āpattī'ti vadati, musāvādī eso''ti. te gantvā, ``tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo musāvādī''ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhagavantaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti etaṃ, ``idha, bhante, kosambiyaṃ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tañca kho neva piyakamyatāya na bhedādhippāyena, atha kho atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya. sāmaggikārako kiresa bhikkhu, tasmāssa etadahosi -- ``yathā ime bhikkhū vivādaṃ āraddhā, na sakkā mayā, nāpi aññena bhikkhunā samaggā kātuṃ, appeva nāma sadevake loke appaṭipuggalo bhagavā sayaṃ vā gantvā, attano vā santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khantimettāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāraṇīyadhammadesanaṃ kathetvā sāmaggiṃ kareyyā''ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya gantvā avoca.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ ^b^chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sāraṇīyā^eb^ti heṭṭhā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena desanā āraddhā. imasmiṃ ṭhāne cha sāraṇīyā dhammā āgatāti evamidaṃ kosambiyasuttaṃ yathānusandhināva gataṃ hoti. tattha ^b^sāraṇīyā^eb^ti saritabbayuttā addhāne atikkantepi na pamussitabbā. yo te dhamme pūreti, taṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karontīti ^b^piyakaraṇā^eb^. garuṃ karontīti ^b^garukaraṇā. saṅgahāyā^eb^ti saṅgahaṇatthāya. ^b^avivādāyā^eb^ti avivādanatthāya. ^b^sāmaggiyā^eb^ti samaggabhāvatthāya ^a^P2.0395^ea^. ^b^ekībhāvāyā^eb^ti ekībhāvatthāya ninnānākaraṇāya. ^b^saṃvattantī^eb^ti bhavanti. ^b^mettaṃ kāyakamma^eb^nti mettacittena kattabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ. ^b^vacīkammamanokammesupi^eb^ eseva nayo. imāni bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni, gihīsupi labbhantiyeva. bhikkhūnañhi mettacittena ābhisamācārikadhammapūraṇaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. gihīnaṃ cetiyavandanatthāya bodhivandanatthāya saṅghanimantanatthāya gamanaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe bhikkhū disvā paccuggamanaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ anugamananti evamādikaṃ mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma.

[03] bhikkhūnaṃ ^a^V2.0289^ea^ mettacittena ācārapaññattisikkhāpadaṃ, kammaṭṭhānakathanaṃ dhammadesanā tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ ^b^mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ^eb^ nāma. gihīnañca, ``cetiyavandanatthāya gacchāma, bodhivandanatthāya gacchāma, dhammassavanaṃ karissāma, padīpamālāpupphapūjaṃ karissāma, tīṇi sucaritāni samādāya vattissāma, salākabhattādīni dassāma, vassāvāsikaṃ dassāma, ajja saṅghassa ^a^M2.0293^ea^ cattāro paccaye dassāma, saṅghaṃ nimantetvā khādanīyādīni saṃvidahatha, āsanāni paññāpetha, pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetha, saṅghaṃ paccuggantvā ānetha, paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā chandajātā ussāhajātā veyyāvaccaṃ karothā''tiādikathanakāle mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma.

[03] bhikkhūnaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni ca katvā vivittāsane nisīditvā, ``imasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū sukhī hontu, averā abyāpajjhā''ti cintanaṃ ^b^mettaṃ manokammaṃ^eb^ nāma. gihīnaṃ ``ayyā sukhī hontu, averā abyāpajjhā''ti cintanaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^āvi ceva raho cā^eb^ti sammukhā ca parammukhā ca. tattha navakānaṃ cīvarakammādīsu sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. therānaṃ pana pādadhovanavandanabījanadānādibhedampi sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ tesu avamaññaṃ akatvā attanā ^a^P2.0396^ea^ dunnikkhittānaṃ viya paṭisāmanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. vihāre asantaṃ pana paripucchantassa, kuhiṃ amhākaṃ devatthero, amhākaṃ tissatthero kadā nu kho āgamissatīti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. mettāsinehasiniddhāni pana nayanāni ummīletvā suppasannena mukhena olokanaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma. devatthero, tissatthero arogo hotu appābādhoti samannāharaṇaṃ parammukhā mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^lābhā^eb^ti cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā. ^b^dhammikā^eb^ti kuhanādibhedaṃ micchājīvaṃ vajjetvā dhammena samena bhikkhācariyavattena uppannā. ^b^antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampī^eb^ti pacchimakoṭiyā patte pariyāpannaṃ pattassa antogataṃ dvattikaṭacchubhikkhāmattampi. ^b^appaṭivibhattabhogī^eb^ti ettha dve paṭivibhattāni ^a^V2.0290^ea^ nāma āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ puggalapaṭivibhattañca. tattha, ``ettakaṃ dassāmi, ettakaṃ na dassāmī''ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ āmisapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma. ``asukassa dassāmi, asukassa na dassāmī''ti evaṃ cittena vibhajanaṃ pana puggalapaṭivibhattaṃ nāma. tadubhayampi akatvā yo appaṭivibhattaṃ bhuñjati, ayaṃ ^b^appaṭivibhattabhogī^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^sīlavantehi^eb^ ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ^b^sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī^eb^ti ettha sādhāraṇabhogino idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ labbhati, taṃ taṃ neva lābhena lābhaṃ jigīsanāmukhena gihīnaṃ deti, na attanā paribhuñjati; paṭiggaṇhantova saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti gahetvā gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ saṅghasantakaṃ viya passati. idaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammaṃ ko pūreti, ko na pūretīti? dussīlo tāva na pūreti. na hi tassa santakaṃ sīlavantā gaṇhanti. parisuddhasīlo pana vattaṃ akhaṇḍento pūreti.

[03] tatridaṃ vattaṃ -- yo hi odissakaṃ katvā mātu vā pitu vā ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā deti, so dātabbaṃ deti, sāraṇīyadhammo ^a^P2.0397^ea^ panassa na hoti, palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hoti. sāraṇīyadhammo hi muttapalibodhasseva vaṭṭati, tena pana odissakaṃ dentena gilānagilānupaṭṭhākāagantukagamikānañceva navapabbajitassa ca saṅghāṭipattaggahaṇaṃ ajānantassa dātabbaṃ. etesaṃ datvā avasesaṃ therāsanato paṭṭhāya thokaṃ thokaṃ adatvā yo yattakaṃ gaṇhāti, tassa tattakaṃ dātabbaṃ. avasiṭṭhe asati puna piṇḍāya caritvā therāsanato paṭṭhāya yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ taṃ datvā sesaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, ``sīlavantehī''ti vacanato dussīlassa adātumpi vaṭṭati.

[03] ayaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhammo susikkhitāya parisāya supūro hoti, no asikkhitāya parisāya. susikkhitāya hi parisāya yo aññato labhati, so na gaṇhāti, aññato alabhantopi pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhāti, na atirekaṃ. ayañca pana sāraṇīyadhammo evaṃ punappunaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ dentassāpi dvādasahi vassehi pūrati, na tato oraṃ. sace hi dvādasamepi vasse sāraṇīyadhammapūrako piṇḍapātapūraṃ pattaṃ āsanasālāyaṃ ṭhapetvā nahāyituṃ gacchati, saṅghatthero ca kasseso pattoti? sāraṇīyadhammapūrakassāti vutte -- ``āharatha na''nti sabbaṃ ^a^V2.0291^ea^ piṇḍapātaṃ vicāretvā bhuñjitvā ca rittapattaṃ ṭhapeti. atha so bhikkhu rittapattaṃ disvā, ``mayhaṃ asesetvāva paribhuñjiṃsū''ti domanassaṃ uppādeti, sāraṇīyadhammo bhijjati, puna dvādasa vassāni pūretabbo ^a^M2.0295^ea^ hoti, titthiyaparivāsasadiso hesa. sakiṃ khaṇḍe jāte puna pūretabbova. yo pana, ``lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me pattagataṃ anāpucchāva sabrahmacārī paribhuñjantī''ti somanassaṃ janeti, tassa puṇṇo nāma hoti.

[03] evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassa pana neva issā, na macchariyaṃ hoti, so manussānaṃ piyo hoti, sulabhapaccayo; pattagatamassa dīyamānampi na khīyati, bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati, bhaye vā chātake vā sampatte devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjanti.

[03] tatrimāni vatthūni -- leṇagirivāsī tissatthero kira mahāgirigāmaṃ upanissāya vasati. paññāsa mahātherā nāgadīpaṃ ^a^P2.0398^ea^ cetiyavandanatthāya gacchantā girigāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā nikkhamiṃsu. thero pavisanto te disvā pucchi -- ``laddhaṃ, bhante''ti? vicarimhā, āvusoti. so aladdhabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha -- ``yāvāhaṃ, bhante, āgacchāmi, tāva idheva hothā''ti. mayaṃ, āvuso, paññāsa janā pattatemanamattampi na labhimhāti. nevāsikā nāma, bhante, paṭibalā honti, alabhantāpi bhikkhācāramaggasabhāvaṃ jānantīti. therā āgamiṃsu. thero gāmaṃ pāvisi. dhurageheyeva mahāupāsikā khīrabhattaṃ sajjetvā theraṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā therassa dvāraṃ sampattasseva pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi. so taṃ ādāya therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, ``gaṇhatha, bhante''ti saṅghattheramāha. thero, ``amhehi ettakehi kiñci na laddhaṃ, ayaṃ sīghameva gahetvā āgato, kiṃ nu kho''ti sesānaṃ mukhaṃ olokesi. thero olokanākāreneva ñatvā -- ``dhammena samena laddhapiṇḍapāto, nikkukkuccā gaṇhatha bhante''tiādito paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ datvā attanāpi yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji.

[03] atha naṃ bhattakiccāvasāne therā pucchiṃsu -- ``kadā, āvuso, lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhī''ti? natthi me, bhante, lokuttaradhammoti. jhānalābhīsi, āvusoti? etampi me, bhante, natthīti. nanu, āvuso, pāṭihāriyanti? sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito, tassa me ^a^V2.0292^ea^ dhammassa pūritakālato ^a^M2.0296^ea^ paṭṭhāya sacepi bhikkhusatasahassaṃ hoti, pattagataṃ na khīyatīti. sādhu sādhu, sappurisa, anucchavikamidaṃ tuyhanti. idaṃ tāva ^b^pattagataṃ na khīyatī^eb^ti ettha vatthu.

[03] ayameva pana thero cetiyapabbate giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāya dānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā, ``imasmiṃ ṭhāne kiṃ varabhaṇḍa''nti pucchati. dve sāṭakā, bhanteti. ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantīti. taṃ sutvā amacco rañño ārocesi -- ``eko daharo evaṃ vadatī''ti. ``daharassevaṃ cittaṃ, mahātherānaṃ pana sukhumasāṭakā vaṭṭantī''ti vatvā, ``mahātherānaṃ dassāmī''ti ṭhapesi. tassa bhikkhusaṅghe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite dentassa matthake ṭhapitāpi te sāṭakā hatthaṃ nārohanti, aññeva ārohanti. daharassa dānakāle pana hatthaṃ āruḷhā. so ^a^P2.0399^ea^ tassa hatthe ṭhapetvā amaccassa mukhaṃ oloketvā daharaṃ nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ datvā saṅghaṃ vissajjetvā daharassa santike nisīditvā, ``kadā, bhante, imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhitthā''ti āha. so pariyāyenapi asantaṃ avadanto, ``natthi mayhaṃ, mahārāja, lokuttaradhammo''ti āha. nanu, bhante, pubbeva avacutthāti? āma, mahārāja, sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahaṃ, tassa me dhammassa pūritakālato paṭṭhāya bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātīti. sādhu sādhu, bhante, anucchavikamidaṃ tumhākanti vanditvā pakkāmi. idaṃ ^b^bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne aggabhaṇḍaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ettha vatthu.

[03] brāhmaṇatissabhaye pana bhātaragāmavāsino nāgattheriyā anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu. therī paccūsakāle, ``ativiya appanigghoso gāmo, upadhāretha tāvā''ti daharabhikkhuniyo āha. tā gantvā sabbesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theriyā ārocesuṃ. sā sutvā, ``mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayittha, attano uddesaparipucchāyonisomanasikāresuyeva yogaṃ karothā''ti vatvā bhikkhācāravelāya pārupitvā attadvādasamā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. rukkhe adhivatthā devatā dvādasannampi bhikkhunīnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā, ``ayye, aññattha mā gacchatha, niccaṃ idheva ethā''ti āha. theriyā pana kaniṭṭhabhātā ^a^M2.0297^ea^ nāgatthero nāma atthi. so, ``mahantaṃ bhayaṃ, na sakkā idha yāpetuṃ, paratīraṃ gamissāmāti attadvādasamova attano vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhanto theriṃ disvā gamissāmī''ti bhātaragāmaṃ āgato. therī, ``therā āgatā''ti sutvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā, kiṃ ayyāti pucchi. so taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. sā, ``ajja ekadivasaṃ vihāreyeva vasitvā sveva gamissathā''ti āha. therā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.

[03] therī ^a^V2.0293^ea^ punadivase rukkhamūle piṇḍāya caritvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjathā''ti āha. thero, ``vaṭṭissati therī''ti vatvā tuṇhī aṭṭhāsi. dhammiko tātā piṇḍapāto ^a^P2.0400^ea^ kukkuccaṃ akatvā paribhuñjathāti. vaṭṭissati therīti. sā pattaṃ gahetvā ākāse khipi, patto ākāse aṭṭhāsi. thero, ``sattatālamatte ṭhitampi bhikkhunībhattameva, therīti vatvā bhayaṃ nāma sabbakālaṃ na hoti, bhaye vūpasante ariyavaṃsaṃ kathayamāno, `bho piṇḍapātika bhikkhunībhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vītināmayitthā'ti cittena anuvadiyamāno santhambhetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, appamattā hotha theriyo''ti maggaṃ āruhi.

[03] rukkhadevatāpi, ``sace thero theriyā hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjissati, na naṃ nivattessāmi, sace pana na paribhuñjissati, nivattessāmī''ti cintayamānā ṭhatvā therassa gamanaṃ disvā rukkhā oruyha pattaṃ, bhante, dethāti pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ rukkhamūlaṃyeva ānetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā piṇḍapātaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ paṭiññaṃ kāretvā dvādasa bhikkhuniyo, dvādasa ca bhikkhū satta vassāni upaṭṭhahi. idaṃ ^b^devatā ussukkaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti ettha vatthu, tatra hi therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi.

[03] ^b^akhaṇḍānī^eb^tiādīsu yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti, tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya ^b^khaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma. yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ, tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya ^b^chiddaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. yassa pana paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni, tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā kucchiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññataravaṇṇā gāvī viya ^b^sabalaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. yassa pana antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa ^a^M2.0298^ea^ antarantarā visabhāgabinducitrā gāvī viya ^b^kammāsaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti. yassa pana sabbena sabbaṃ abhinnāni, tassa tāni sīlāni ^b^akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni^eb^ nāma honti. tāni panetāni taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇato ^b^bhujissāni^eb^. buddhādīhi viññūhi pasatthattā ^b^viññuppasatthāni^eb^. taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā, ``idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpannapubbo''ti kenaci parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ca ^b^aparāmaṭṭhāni^eb^. upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikānī^eb^ti vuccanti. ^b^sīlasāmaññagato^eb^ ^a^P2.0401^ea^ ^b^viharatī^eb^ti tesu tesu disābhāgesu viharantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samānabhāvūpagatasīlo viharati ^a^V2.0294^ea^. sotāpannādīnañhi sīlaṃ samuddantarepi devalokepi vasantānaṃ aññesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ sīlena samānameva hoti, natthi maggasīle nānattaṃ, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^yāyaṃ diṭṭhī^eb^ti maggasampayuttā sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^ariyā^eb^ti niddosā. ^b^niyyātī^eb^ti ^b^niyyānikā. takkarassā^eb^ti yo tathākārī hoti. ^b^dukkhakkhayāyā^eb^ti sabbadukkhakkhayatthaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhisāmaññagato^eb^ti samānadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ upagato hutvā viharati. ^b^agga^eb^nti jeṭṭhakaṃ. sabbagopānasiyo saṅgaṇhātīti ^b^saṅgāhikaṃ^eb^. sabbagopānasīnaṃ saṅghāṭaṃ karotīti ^b^saṅghāṭanikaṃ^eb^. saṅghāṭaniyanti attho. ^b^yadidaṃ kūṭa^eb^nti yametaṃ kūṭāgārakaṇṇikāsaṅkhātaṃ kūṭaṃ nāma. pañcabhūmikādipāsādā hi kūṭabaddhāva tiṭṭhanti. yasmiṃ patite mattikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe patanti. tasmā evamāha. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti yathā kūṭaṃ kūṭāgārassa, evaṃ imesampi sāraṇīyadhammānaṃ yā ayaṃ ariyā diṭṭhi, sā aggā ca saṅgāhikā ca saṅghāṭaniyā cāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ^b^kathañca, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ diṭṭhī^eb^ti ettha, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti vuttā, sā kathaṃ kena kāraṇena niyyātīti attho. ^b^pariyuṭṭhitacittova hotī^eb^ti ettāvatāpi pariyuṭṭhitacittoyeva nāma hotīti attho. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^suppaṇihitaṃ me mānasa^eb^nti mayhaṃ cittaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^saccānaṃ bodhāyā^eb^ti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ bodhatthāya. ^b^ariya^eb^ntiādīsu taṃ ñāṇaṃ yasmā ariyānaṃ hoti, na puthujjanānaṃ, tasmā ^b^ariya^eb^nti vuttaṃ. yesaṃ pana lokuttaradhammopi atthi, tesaṃyeva hoti, na ^a^M2.0299^ea^ aññesaṃ, tasmā ^b^lokuttara^eb^nti vuttaṃ. puthujjanānaṃ pana abhāvato ^b^asādhāraṇaṃ puthujjanehī^eb^ti vuttaṃ. esa nayo sabbavāresu.
[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ^b^labhāmi paccattaṃ samatha^eb^nti attano citte samathaṃ labhāmīti attho. ^b^nibbutiyampi^eb^ eseva nayo. ettha ca ^b^samatho^eb^ti ekaggatā. ^b^nibbutī^eb^ti kilesavūpasamo.
[03] 495^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti evarūpāya sotāpattimaggadiṭṭhiyā.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvena. ^b^dhammatā esā^eb^ti sabhāvo ^a^P2.0402^ea^ esa. ^b^vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyatī^eb^ti saṅghakammavasena ^a^V2.0295^ea^ vā desanāya vā vuṭṭhānaṃ dissati. ariyasāvako hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto garukāpattīsu kuṭikārasadisaṃ, lahukāpattīsu sahaseyyādisadisaṃ acittakāpattiṃyeva āpajjati, tampi asañcicca, no sañcicca, āpannaṃ na paṭicchādeti. tasmā ^b^atha kho naṃ khippamevā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^kumāro^eb^ti na mahallako. ^b^mando^eb^ti cakkhusotādīnaṃ mandatāya mando. ^b^uttānaseyyako^eb^ti atidaharatāya uttānaseyyako, dakkhiṇena vā vāmena vā passena sayituṃ na sakkotīti attho. ^b^aṅgāraṃ akkamitvā^eb^ti ito cito ca pasāritena hatthena vā pādena vā phusitvā. evaṃ phusantānaṃ pana manussānaṃ na sīghaṃ hattho jhāyati, tathā hi ekacce hatthena aṅgāraṃ gahetvā parivattamānā dūrampi gacchanti. daharassa pana hatthapādā sukhumālā honti, so phuṭṭhamatteneva dayhamāno cirīti saddaṃ karonto khippaṃ paṭisaṃharati, tasmā idha daharova dassito. mahallako ca dayhantopi adhivāseti, ayaṃ pana adhivāsetuṃ na sakkoti. tasmāpi daharova dassito. ^b^desetī^eb^ti āpattipaṭiggāhake sabhāgapuggale sati ekaṃ divasaṃ vā rattiṃ vā anadhivāsetvā rattiṃ caturaṅgepi tame sabhāgabhikkhuno vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā desetiyeva.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ^b^uccāvacānī^eb^ti uccanīcāni. ^b^kiṃ karaṇīyānī^eb^ti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni. tattha uccakammaṃ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhigharesu kattabbakammanti evamādi. avacakammaṃ nāma pādadhovanamakkhanādikhuddakakammaṃ, atha vā cetiye ^a^M2.0300^ea^ sudhākammādi uccakammaṃ nāma. tattheva kasāvapacanaudakānayanakucchakaraṇa niyyāsabandhanādi avacakammaṃ nāma. ^b^ussukkaṃ āpanno hotī^eb^ti ussukkabhāvaṃ kattabbataṃ paṭipanno hoti. ^b^tibbāpekkho hotī^eb^ti bahalapatthano hoti. ^b^thambañca^eb^ ^a^P2.0403^ea^ ^b^ālumpatī^eb^ti tiṇañca ālumpamānā khādati. ^b^vacchakañca apacinātī^eb^ti vacchakañca apaloketi. taruṇavacchā hi gāvī araññe ekato āgataṃ vacchakaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipannaṃ pahāya dūraṃ na gacchati, vacchakassa āsannaṭṭhāne caramānā tiṇaṃ ālumpitvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā ekantaṃ vacchakameva ca viloketi, evameva sotāpanno uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni karonto tanninno hoti, asithilapūrako tibbacchando bahalapatthano hutvāva karoti.

[03] tatridaṃ ^a^V2.0296^ea^ vatthu -- mahācetiye kira sudhākamme kariyamāne eko ariyasāvako ekena hatthena sudhābhājanaṃ, ekena kucchaṃ gahetvā sudhākammaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruḷho. eko kāyadaḷhibahulo bhikkhu gantvā therassa santike aṭṭhāsi. thero aññasmiṃ sati papañco hotīti tasmā ṭhānā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato. sopi bhikkhu tattheva agamāsi. thero puna aññaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃ katipayaṭṭhāne āgataṃ, -- ``sappurisa mahantaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ kiṃ aññasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ na labhathā''ti āha. na itaro pakkāmīti.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ^b^balatāya samannāgato^eb^ti balena samannāgato. ^b^aṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti atthikabhāvaṃ katvā, atthiko hutvāti attho. ^b^manasikatvā^eb^ti manasmiṃ karitvā. ^b^sabbacetasā samannāharitvā^eb^ti appamattakampi vikkhepaṃ akaronto sakalacittena samannāharitvā. ^b^ohitasoto^eb^ti ṭhapitasoto. ariyasāvakā hi piyadhammassavanā honti, dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā niddāyamānā vā yena kenaci saddhiṃ sallapamānā vā vikkhittacittā vā na nisīdanti, atha kho amataṃ paribhuñjantā viya atittāva honti dhammassavane, atha aruṇaṃ uggacchati. tasmā evamāha.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammatā^eb^ ^a^M2.0301^ea^ ^b^susamanniṭṭhā hotī^eb^ti sabhāvo suṭṭhu samannesito hoti. ^b^sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti karaṇavacanaṃ ^a^P2.0404^ea^, sotāpattiphalasacchikatañāṇenāti attho. ^b^evaṃ sattaṅgasamannāgato^eb^ti evaṃ imehi sattahi mahāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇehi samannāgato. ayaṃ tāva ācariyānaṃ samānakathā. lokuttaramaggo hi bahucittakkhaṇiko nāma natthi.

[03] vitaṇḍavādī pana ekacittakkhaṇiko nāma maggo natthi, ``evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī''ti hi vacanato sattapi vassāni maggabhāvanā honti. kilesā pana lahu chijjantā sattahi ñāṇehi chijjantīti vadati. so suttaṃ āharāti vattabbo, addhā aññaṃ suttaṃ apassanto, ``idamassa paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti, idamassa dutiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ...pe0... idamassa sattamaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hotī''ti imameva āharitvā dassessati. tato vattabbo kiṃ panidaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthaṃ nītatthanti. tato vakkhati -- ``nītatthatthaṃ, yathāsuttaṃ tatheva attho''ti. so vattabbo -- ``dhammatā susamanniṭṭhā hoti sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyāti ettha ko attho''ti? addhā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāyatthoti vakkhati. tato pucchitabbo, ``maggasamaṅgī ^a^V2.0297^ea^ phalaṃ sacchikaroti, phalasamaṅgī''ti. jānanto, ``phalasamaṅgī sacchikarotī''ti vakkhati. tato vattabbo, -- ``evaṃ sattaṅgasamannāgato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpattiphalasamannāgato hotīti idha maggaṃ abhāvetvā maṇḍūko viya uppatitvā ariyasāvako phalameva gaṇhissati. mā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā avaca. pañhaṃ vissajjentena nāma ācariyasantike vasitvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā attharasaṃ viditvā vattabbaṃ hotī''ti. ``imāni satta ñāṇāni ariyasāvakassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇāneva, lokuttaramaggo bahucittakkhaṇiko nāma natthi, ekacittakkhaṇikoyevā''ti saññāpetabbo. sace sañjānāti sañjānātu. no ce sañjānāti, ``gaccha pātova vihāraṃ pavisitvā yāguṃ pivāhī''ti uyyojetabbo. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] papañcasūdaniyā majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] kosambiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0298^ea^ ^a^P2.0405^ea^ ^a^M2.0302^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti brahmanimantanikasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigata^eb^nti lāmakā sassatadiṭṭhi. ^b^idaṃ nicca^eb^nti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ ``nicca''nti vadati. ^b^dhuvādīni^eb^ tasseva vevacanāni. tattha ^b^dhuva^eb^nti thiraṃ. ^b^sassata^eb^nti sadā vijjamānaṃ. ^b^kevala^eb^nti akhaṇḍaṃ sakalaṃ. ^b^acavanadhamma^eb^nti acavanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^idañhi na jāyatī^eb^tiādīsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā natthīti sandhāya vadati. ^b^ito ca panañña^eb^nti ito saha kāyakā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti evamassa thāmagatā sassatadiṭṭhi uppannā hoti. evaṃvādī pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ paṭibāhati. ^b^avijjāgato^eb^ti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo nāma.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā^eb^ti māro kathaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa? so kira attano bhavane nisīditvā kālena kālaṃ satthāraṃ āvajjeti -- ``ajja samaṇo gotamo katarasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā vasatī''ti. imasmiṃ pana kāle āvajjanto, ``ukkaṭṭhaṃ nissāya subhagavane viharatī''ti ñatvā, ``kattha nu kho gato''ti olokento brahmalokaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā, ``samaṇo gotamo brahmalokaṃ gacchati, yāva tattha dhammakathaṃ kathetvā brahmagaṇaṃ mama visayā nātikkameti, tāva gantvā dhammadesanāyaṃ vichandaṃ karissāmī''ti satthu padānupadiko gantvā brahmagaṇassa antare adissamānena kāyena aṭṭhāsi. so, ``satthārā bakabrahmā apasādito''ti ñatvā brahmuno upatthambho hutvā aṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``atha kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā''ti.

[03] ^b^brahmapārisajjaṃ anvāvisitvā^eb^ti ekassa brahmapārisajjassa sarīraṃ pavisitvā. mahābrahmānaṃ pana brahmapurohitānaṃ vā anvāvisituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^metamāsado^eb^ti mā ^a^P2.0406^ea^ etaṃ apasādayittha. ^b^abhibhū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0299^ea^ abhibhavitvā ṭhito jeṭṭhako. ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^ti aññehi anabhibhūto. ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsavacane ^a^M2.0303^ea^ nipāto. dassanavasena ^b^daso,^eb^ sabbaṃ passatīti dīpeti. ^b^vasavattī^eb^ti sabbajanaṃ vase vatteti. ^b^issaro^eb^ti loke issaro. ^b^kattā nimmātā^eb^ti lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca, pathavīhimavantasinerucakkavāḷamahāsamuddacandimasūriyā ca iminā nimmitāti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^seṭṭho sajitā^eb^ti ayaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca. ``tvaṃ khattiyo nāma hohi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇo nāma, vesso nāma, suddo nāma, gahaṭṭho nāma, pabbajito nāma, antamaso oṭṭho hohi, goṇo hohī''ti evaṃ sattānaṃ visajjetā ayanti dasseti. ^b^vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna^eb^nti ayaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya vasī, ayaṃ pitā bhūtānañca bhabyānañcāti vadati. tattha aṇḍajajalābujā sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca ^b^bhabyā^eb^ nāma, bahi nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya ^b^bhūtā^eb^. saṃsedajā paṭhamacittakkhaṇe bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtā. opapātikā paṭhamairiyāpathe bhabyā, dutiyato paṭṭhāya bhūtāti veditabbā. te sabbepi etassa puttāti saññāya, ``pitā bhūtabhabyāna''nti āha.

[03] ^b^pathavīgarahakā^eb^ti yathā tvaṃ etarahi, ``aniccā dukkhā anattā''ti pathaviṃ garahasi jigucchasi, evaṃ tepi pathavīgarahakā ahesuṃ, na kevalaṃ tvaṃyevāti dīpeti. ^b^āpagarahakā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^hīne kāye patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti catūsu apāyesu nibbattā. ^b^pathavīpasaṃsakā^eb^ti yathā tvaṃ garahasi, evaṃ agarahitvā, ``niccā dhuvā sassatā acchejjā abhejjā akkhayā''ti evaṃ pathavīpasaṃsakā pathaviyā vaṇṇavādino ahesunti vadati. ^b^pathavābhinandino^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pathaviyā abhinandino. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^paṇīte kāye patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti brahmaloke nibbattā. ^b^taṃ tāha^eb^nti tena kāraṇena taṃ ahaṃ. ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. ^b^upātivattittho^eb^ti atikkamittha. ``upātivattito''tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^daṇḍena paṭippaṇāmeyyā^eb^ti catuhatthena muggaradaṇḍena pothetvā palāpeyya. ^b^narakapapāte^eb^ti sataporise mahāsobbhe. ^b^virādheyyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0407^ea^ hatthena gahaṇayutte vā pādena patiṭṭhānayutte vā ṭhāne gahaṇapatiṭṭhānāni kātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. ^b^nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasī^eb^ti bhikkhu nanu tvaṃ imaṃ brahmaparisaṃ sannipatitaṃ obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ passasīti brahmuno ovāde ṭhitānaṃ ^a^M2.0304^ea^ iddhānubhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^iti kho maṃ, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā brahmaparisaṃ upanesī^eb^ti, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0300^ea^, māro pāpimā nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu passasi brahmaparisaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca obhāsamānaṃ virocamānaṃ jotayamānaṃ, yadi tvampi mahābrahmuno vacanaṃ anatikkamitvā yadeva te brahmā vadati, taṃ kareyyāsi, tvampi evamevaṃ yasena ca siriyā ca viroceyyāsīti evaṃ vadanto maṃ brahmaparisaṃ upanesi upasaṃhari. ^b^mā tvaṃ maññittho^eb^ti mā tvaṃ maññi. ^b^māro tvamasi pāpimā^eb^ti pāpima tvaṃ mahājanassa māraṇato ^b^māro^eb^ nāma, pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mahājanassa ayasaṃ karaṇato ^b^pāpimā^eb^ nāmāti jānāmi.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ ^b^kasiṇaṃ āyu^eb^nti sakalaṃ āyuṃ. ^b^te kho evaṃ jāneyyu^eb^nti te evaṃ mahantena tapokammena samannāgatā, tvaṃ pana purimadivase jāto, kiṃ jānissasi, yassa te ajjāpi mukhe khīragandho vāyatīti ghaṭṭento vadati. ^b^pathaviṃ ajjhosissasī^eb^ti pathaviṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gaṇhissasi. ^b^opasāyiko me bhavissasī^eb^ti mayhaṃ samīpasayo bhavissasi, maṃ gacchantaṃ anugacchissasi, ṭhitaṃ upatiṭṭhissasi, nisinnaṃ upanisīdissasi, nipannaṃ upanipajjissasīti attho. ^b^vatthusāyiko^eb^ti mama vatthusmiṃ sayanako. ^b^yathākāmakaraṇīyo bāhiteyyo^eb^ti mayā attano ruciyā yaṃ icchāmi, taṃ kattabbo, bāhitvā ca pana jajjharikāgumbatopi nīcataro lakuṇḍaṭakataro kātabbo bhavissasīti attho.

[03] iminā esa bhagavantaṃ upalāpeti vā apasādeti vā. ^b^upalāpeti^eb^ nāma sace kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, taṇhādīhi pathaviṃ ajjhosissasi, opasāyiko me bhavissasi, mayi gacchante gamissasi, tiṭṭhante ṭhassasi, nisinne nisīdissasi, nipanne nipajjissasi, ahaṃ taṃ sesajanaṃ paṭibāhitvā vissāsikaṃ abbhantarikaṃ ^a^P2.0408^ea^ karissāmīti evaṃ tāva ^b^upalāpeti^eb^ nāma. sesapadehi pana ^b^apasādeti^eb^ nāma. ayañhettha adhippāyo -- sace tvaṃ pathaviṃ ajjhosissasi, vatthusāyiko me bhavissasi, mama gamanādīni āgametvā gamissasi vā ṭhassasi vā nisīdissasi vā nipajjissasi vā, mama vatthusmiṃ mayhaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhissasi, ahaṃ pana taṃ yathākāmaṃ karissāmi bāhitvā ^a^M2.0305^ea^ ca jajjharikāgumbatopi lakuṇḍakataranti evaṃ apasādeti nāma. ayaṃ pana brahmā mānanissito, tasmā idha apasādanāva adhippetā. ^b^āpādīsupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^apica^eb^ ^a^V2.0301^ea^ ^b^te ahaṃ brahme^eb^ti idāni bhagavā, ``ayaṃ brahmā mānanissito `ahaṃ jānāmī'ti maññati, attano yasena sammatto sarīraṃ phusitumpi samatthaṃ kiñci na passati, thokaṃ niggahetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^gatiñca pajānāmī^eb^ti nipphattiñca pajānāmi. ^b^jutiñcā^eb^ti ānubhāvañca pajānāmi. ^b^evaṃ mahesakkho^eb^ti evaṃ mahāyaso mahāparivāro.
